OrgNotes: Abra is a cryptocurrency exhcange that offers many different services such as buying, selling and holding 30 cryptocurrencies, 50 fiat currencies, and the first of its kind crypto index (the BIT10). They also offer an affiliate program where users can offer a $25 joining bonus to their personal audience and in turn receive $25 for each new user who makes a deposit to their Abra wallet (some conditions apply). They currently offer %0 Interest on cryptocurrency loans as well.Abra was founded in 2014 by Bill Barhydt and has a team headquartered in Silicon Valley California with an additional office in Manila, Philippines. Services for US-persons are offered by Plutus Financial Inc., doing business as “Abra”. Services for non-US-persons are offered by Plutus Technologies Philippines Corporation, doing business as “Abra PTPC”, incorporated and licensed by Philippines Securities and Exchange Commission. Any dispute between the parties will be governed by the terms and conditions and the laws of California.Currently they have a social media presence on Twitter, Facebook, TikTok, and LinkedIn, as well as a YouTube Channel.

Warning: ACX seems to be involved in a scam that started with HyperFund and HyperVerse. The co-founders, Ryan Xu and Samuel Lee are missing/in hiding after the scam took place. They are also the co-founders of Blockchain Global. This scam was operating in Australia and now the Supreme Court is looking to recover $21 million. Xu and Lee are also being sued for over $10 million in losses which is in relation to the exchange ACX.https://andreskindred.com/hyperverse-scamAt time of review (October 18, 2021) https://acx.io still claims to be going through an audit that was announced on Jan 10th, 2021. They are determined to be no longer operating. Blockchain Australia has kicked them out of the organization for lack of insight into their disciplinary process.https://micky.com.au/blockchain-australia-disciplines-acx-exchange-over-frozen-crypto/ACX allows buyers and sellers to buy and sell digital currencies with each other. Services to the platform where previously offered by company “Blockchain Global Limited”, however, TC’s presently indicate that ACX refers to the company “PEAK Trading Group PTY Ltd”, a company incorporated under the laws of Australia. However, apparently AUSTRAC has revoked the digital currency registration of the platform on 23 Dec 2020  https://www.austrac.gov.au/digital-currency-exchange-provider-registration-actions. Relevant articles in the news indicate that ACX has ceased operating and froze the accounts of its users. Source: https://www.afr.com/companies/financial-services/collapse-of-crypto-platform-a-cautionary-tale-20210228-p576hn and https://www.lexology.com/library/detail.aspx?g=4a0277b2-7855-46a4-a0a1-9aeb69ffadc9

ADSS, ADS Securities LLC, is a limited liability company incorporated under United Arab Emirates law. The company is registered with the Department of Economic Development of Abu Dhabi, and has its principal place of business at 8th Floor, CI Tower, Corniche Road, P.O. Box 93894, Abu Dhabi, United Arab Emirates. Their trading includes Forex Trading, CFD Trading, and Bitcoin Trading.ADSS is a regulated international financial services company, providing institutional, private and retail clients with the highest quality investment opportunities. Owned and based in Abu Dhabi, they also have offices in London and Hong Kong, where our market experts offer wealth and asset management, capital market and trading services. ADSS was founded in 2011 with the mission of creating a global financial services company delivering the highest quality products and services. Through significant investment into proprietary multi-asset trading technology, this has enabled access to liquidity and instruments to meet such a goal. Investment in developing experienced, highly qualified teams has helped place ADSS as a leader in global business. ADSS is regulated by the Central Bank of the UAE, the Financial Conduct Authority (FCA) in the UK and the Securities & Futures Commission (SFC) in Hong Kong.At ADSS they offer forex and CFD trading across a wide range of currencies and financial asset classes on an institutional, private and retail level. A choice of trading accounts, platforms, market analysis and educational tools means we offer the best solutions whether you’re an experienced trader looking to diversify your portfolio, or a new trader about to begin. There are many reasons to trade with ADSS: • Trade with MT4, the world’s most popular platform • One-click trading allows for fast response to market movements • Customizable leverage up to 500:1, with flexible lot sizes including mini, micro and standard lots • Advanced charting and analysis with over 50 indicators available on MT4 and the EA builder to develop your own • Demo accounts to practice trading or test your strategy • Access to trading tools including an economic and earnings calendar, currency converter and other educational resources • Institutional standards of excellence when it comes to customer care and service

The ADVCash Wallet has been in business since 2014 as Advanced Cash Limited. They are domiciled in Belize, and are licensed there as well with numbers: 000107/97, PPS 000107/98. They are also governed by the applicable laws of Belize.Advcash offers the buying and selling of various cryptocurrencies, sending and receiving of crypto, an ADV card to spend anywhere, convert currencies, as well as the ability to deposit and withdraw on merchant websites. At this time they support 9 different currencies in the same account. They support cryptocurrencies such as Bitcoin, Ethereum, Litecoin, Bitcoin Cash, Ripple, Z Cash, TRX, SHIB, Binance Coin, Tether, and USD Coin as well as fiat currencies USD, EUR, GBP, RUB, BRL, TRY, VND, and KZT."Both individual and business clients are provided with fast KYC/KYB verification, 24/7 customer support, and a smooth and dependable user experience."They are partnered with BitGo, Binance, OKCoin, Kraken, Bitstamp, Refinitiv, SumSub, Crystal, and Protectimus.Currently they have a social media presence on Twitter, Facebook, and LinkedIn.

Altcoin Trader is a cryptocurrency exchange company based in South Africa, with its head office in Johannesburg. Altcoin Trader allows users to purchase and trade up to 22 cryptocurrencies, and has expanded its trading platform to include precious metals such as gold and silver. Altcoin Trader (Pty) Ltd. is the owner and operator of the platform. They are governed by the applicable laws of South Africa.Currently they have a social media presence on Twitter, Instagram, Facebook, and LinkedIn.

Amber was started in late 2017 and originally built their services so that users could turn their spare change, from purchases, into Bitcoin. In 2019, it was decided that being deeply involved with users Bank accounts went against their belief of financial privacy. With this belief, Amber was reinvented to become a Decentralized Exchange, based out of Brisbane Australia, where users could buy, sell, and trade their BTC.In order to create an account you will need a phone number and email address. Wallet services are provided by 1 of 5 of the following providers: SR Global Solutions Pty Ltd (trading as "Merchant Warrior"), Assembly Payments Platform Pty. Ltd. (trading as "Assembly Payments"), Checkout Ltd., Wyre Payments, Inc., or Plaid Inc.Amber operates a membership service known as Amber Black that is accessible via subscription on the website that can be billed monthly or annually. Amber Black allows users to trade their BTC unlimitedly, free of any fees. https://amber.app/amber-blackUsers are only allowed from Australia and the United States, with the exception of these states: Connecticut, Hawaii, New York, New Hampshire, Texas, Vermont, and Virginia.

Anycoin Direct is a platform for buying and selling cryptocurrencies, including privacy coins Monero and Zcash. The platform also supports Ontology (ONT) and Ontology Gas tokens (ONG), part of the ‘Ontology blockchain’, a public blockchain bringing decentralized identity and data solutions to Web3. Ontology is designed to allow companies with little to no knowledge on cryptocurrencies to integrate blockchain technology in their business. Through encryption, Ontology protects users data from malicious actions.https://ont.io/Anycoin Direct also offers Cryptocurrency Investment Services for entrepreneurs, private investors, asset managers, etc. with a minimum investment requirement of €100K. Anycoin has been established in the Netherlands since 2013, and is an official partner of Dutch football club PSV Eindhoven and basketball club Heroes den Bosch. Services are provided via Phoenix Payment B.V. a company located in Veghel, the Netherlands, with DNB Registration number: R179338. Any resident of a member state of the European Union, or SEPA country can register with Anycoin Direct, with the exception of German residents, due to German law restrictions. Applicable law: Dutch.

At the time of this review 04/02/2022 the web domain is no longer accessible, nor is the Twitter account or Facebook associated with this exchange. There are no news article on the web relating to this exchange closing and the last active archive on the Wayback Machine is from 01/15/2022. It is presumed they have closed.Artis Turba is a cryptocurrency exchange launched in 2018, operated by Artis Turba (Pty) Ltd, incorporated under the laws of South Africa. They support a variety of cryptocurrencies i.e. Bitcoin, Ethereum, EOS, TRON (TRX), Stellar (XLM), Binance Coin (BNB), Ripple (XRP) and others. ArtisTurba processes deposits and withdrawals in South Africa, Namibia, Botswana, Eswatini (Swaziland) and supports fiat currencies and South African Rand. ARTIS Turba (ARTIS) is the exchanges native token, which is an ERC-20 token with a fixed supply of 350 million. By utilizing ARTIS as an intermediary, the Artis Turba platform will enable cross-pairing between novel pairs that have not been available in the market due to lack of liquidation in such markets, plus will offer revenues (50% of the trading fee revenue) generated on the Artis Turba exchange (whitepaper: https://github.com/ArtisTurba/Central/blob/master/documentation/Artis%20Turba%20Whitepaper%20V4.1.pdf). Usually associated with low trading volumes source: https://coinmarketcap.com/exchanges/artis-turba/

ATAIX is a centralized cryptocurrency trading platform and digital asset exchange. Supports 49 cryptocurrencies and digital assets (no privacy coins). The term "ATAIX" refers to the group of companies that includes: DeFi Solutions LTD a company in St. Vincent and the Grenadines (reg. nr. 1147LLC2021), or, EUROTOKEN OU a company in Tallinn, Estonia (reg. nr. 14454785). Provides fiat-to-crypto and crypto-to-crypto conversions, in accordance with the EU licence FVT000327. Governing law: Estonia. EUR deposits are automatically converted to EURT, a Euro-pegged stablecoin supported by Tether, the company that operates USDT and credited to the user's account. All internal transactions by the user on our platform, such as exchange, transfer, trade, are conducted using EURT. Upon client’s withdrawal request, EURT is exchanged to EUR and is sent to the Client's bank account.

Previously known as AIS (Athena Investor Services), ACE is a decentralized personalizable, OTC (over-the-counter) cryptocurrency exchange designed for individuals and institutions. Buy and sell cryptocurrencies swiftly, safely and with live experts to expedite users needs. They offer Ace Vida SV for users to purchase real estate in El Salvador using Bitcoin.At this time they support Bitcoin, Litecoin, and Ethereum and do require a 10,000 minimum per coin per transaction. Bank wires are the only accepted payment form at this time.Currently they have no social media presence on any platform.

Founded in 2006 and headquartered in Dublin, Ireland, AVA Trade EU Limited (AvaTrade) is an online broker with seven regulations across six continents. They have over 300,000 registered customers globally.AvaTrade clients have the choice of trading platforms and more ways to trade. They offer a selection of manual trading platforms – MetaTrader 4/MetaTrader 5, WebTrader and AvaTradeGo – that offer full mobile trading support. Users can also choose from a variety of automated trading platforms, including their AvaSocial App, Zulu Trade, DupliTrade through MT4/MT5 and more.Office locations of Ava Trade include: Australia, Chile, Malaysia, Italy, Japan, Mexico, Mongolia, Poland, South Africa, and United Arab Emirates.The terms and conditions are governed by the laws of Ireland. Any disputes will be exclusively in the jurisdiction of the Irish Courts.Cryptocurrencies supported on the site are: BTC, BCH, Bitcoin Gold, ETH, LTC EOS, Ripple, DASH, Chainlink, Uniswap and CFDs. AvaTrade is a member of the Ava Group, regulated across five continents, which consists of:AVA Trade EU Ltd, trading as "AvaTrade", a company regulated by the Central Bank of Ireland (No C53877). Applicable law: Ireland. Ava Trade Markets Ltd, regulated by the B.V.I (British Virgin Islands) Financial Services Commission (No SIBA/L/13/1049)Ava Capital Markets Australia Pty Ltd, regulated by the ASIC (No 406684)Ava Capital Markets Pty, regulated by the South African Financial Sector Conduct Authority (FSCA No 45984)Ava Trade Japan K.K., licensed and regulated in Japan by the (License No.1662 ), the (License No. 1574)Ava Trade Middle East Ltd, regulated by the Abu Dhabi Global Markets (ADGM) Financial Regulatory Services Authority (FRSA) (No.190018)DT Direct Investment Hub Ltd., regulated by the Cyprus Securities and Exchange Commission (No. 347/17)ATrade Ltd, regulated in Israel by the Israel Securities Authority (No. 514666577).

They offer a selection of manual trading platforms – MetaTrader 4/MetaTrader 5, WebTrader and AvaTradeGo – that offer full mobile trading support. Users can also choose from a variety of automated trading platforms, including their AvaSocial App, Zulu Trade, DupliTrade through MT4/MT5 and more.Office locations of Ava Trade include: Australia, Chile, Malaysia, Italy, Japan, Mexico, Mongolia, Poland, South Africa, and United Arab Emirates.The terms and conditions are governed by the laws of Ireland. Any disputes will be exclusively in the jurisdiction of the Irish Courts.Cryptocurrencies supported on the site are: BTC, BCH, Bitcoin Gold, ETH, LTC EOS, Ripple, DASH, Chainlink, Uniswap and CFDs. AvaTrade is a member of the Ava Group, regulated across five continents, which consists of:AVA Trade EU Ltd, trading as "AvaTrade", a company regulated by the Central Bank of Ireland (No C53877). Applicable law: Ireland. Ava Trade Markets Ltd, regulated by the B.V.I (British Virgin Islands) Financial Services Commission (No SIBA/L/13/1049)Ava Capital Markets Australia Pty Ltd, regulated by the ASIC (No 406684)Ava Capital Markets Pty, regulated by the South African Financial Sector Conduct Authority (FSCA No 45984)Ava Trade Japan K.K., licensed and regulated in Japan by the (License No.1662 ), the (License No. 1574)Ava Trade Middle East Ltd, regulated by the Abu Dhabi Global Markets (ADGM) Financial Regulatory Services Authority (FRSA) (No.190018)DT Direct Investment Hub Ltd., regulated by the Cyprus Securities and Exchange Commission (No. 347/17)ATrade Ltd, regulated in Israel by the Israel Securities Authority (No. 514666577).

Founded in 2017 and headquartered in Estonia, Digital Exchange OU (B2BX) is a cryptocurrency exchange platform that offers multiple trading options and a crypto wallet service. B2BX is licensed by the Financial Intelligence Unit (FIU) of Estonia. Individual and corporate clients are allowed to create a trading account with registration required.B2BX offers crypto-crypto and crypto-fiat trading pairs which enables users to trade major digital assets and cryptocurrencies, including Bitcoin, Ethereum, NEM, Litecoin, Ripple, NEO, Monero, NEM and Dash. They require 2FA and KYC to secure their services.The agreement is governed by the laws of Estonia. Any disputes will be settled exclusively in the jurisdiction of Estonia.Services are not available to residents of the United States, Afghanistan, the Bahamas, Barbados, Botswana, Cambodia, Democratic People's Republic of Korea (DPRK), Ghana, Iran, Iraq, Jamaica, Mauritius, Myanmar, Nicaragua, Pakistan, Panama, Syria, Trinidad and Tobago, Uganda, Vanuatu, Yemen, or Zimbabwe.They have social media presence on Twitter, Facebook, and Linkedin.

At the time of this review 05/05/2022, the web domain is no longer accessible. There are no articles online relating to this organization closing or rebranding and they have not been active on any on their social media accounts since before April of 2021. The last active archive on the Wayback Machine is from 09/10/2021. This organization is presumed closed as of that date. B4U Wallet is equivalent to a bank account. B4U Wallet makes it possible for you to receive a store or spend directly through your wallet. Similar to your bank account B4U wallet also becomes your interface to the Bitcoin network. Our wallet is secure with private keys & security codes & it is useful to spend your coins whenever & wherever you want.

Babb Platform Ltd (“Babb Platform”) is a company registered and incorporated in England and Wales with company number 10803612 and registered office at 40 Bank Street, 18th Floor, London, England, E14 5NR. Babb Platform will be providing the Cryptocurrency Services under this Agreement and has also entered into an agency agreement with Babb Remit Ltd. Babb aims to deliver accessible, secure, convenient and cost-effective peer-to-peer mobile financial services designed to empower the global micro-economy.They are currently in the process of building the platform and mobile app. They are also seeking to form relationships with partner organizations and merchants who will accept Babb card payments.BABB specializes in Blockchain, FinTech, Mobile App, Financial inclusion, Financial services, Banking, Mobile banking, and Challenger bank.BABB back in 2016 because they believe in financial inclusion. They believe that every single one of us deserves to have access to basic resources such as water, food, a shelter, but they also believe that everyone should have access to basic financial services. Fueled by the need of creating a platform that removes the middleman, creates fairness and connects people globally, Babb was born. We are now building the dream of bringing financial services for the world!

Banexcoin is a platform for the exchange of cryptocurrencies and fiat money in Latin America. The platform is compliant with PCI DSS, a globally recognized information security standard, and provides traders superior security and reliability. Banexcoin is based in Lima, Peru and are in the process of developing an e-commerce application so that merchants can accept cryptocurrency, the US Dollar, and Latin American currencies, such as the Peruvian Sol.US citizens are restricted from accessing any services on this platform regardless of their current country of residence as well as citizens of Afghanistan, Democratic Republic of the Congo, North Korea, Cuba, Eritrea, Guinea-Bissau, Iran, Iraq, Lebanon, Libya, Mali, Namibia, Central African Republic, Syria, Sudan, Somalia, South Sudan, Tajikistan and Yemen.The mobile application is available for users to download on Google Play and The Apple App Store. Currently they have a social media presence on Twitter, LinkedIn, Instagram, and Facebook.

Banxa is a financial payment platform that is used to connect traders with exchanges and wallets. Founded in 2014, the company aims to provide people around the world with a gateway to cryptocurrencies, facilitating entry-level coin swaps whereby traders can purchase cryptocurrencies such as Bitcoin (BTC), Ripple (XRP) and Tether (USDT) using fiat currencies.

BC Bitcoin is a professional Lithuania based cryptocurrency brokerage. BC Bitcoin buys and sells all major cryptocurrencies including Bitcoin, Bitcoin Cash, Ethereum, Litecoin and Ripple as well as a wide range of alt coin trading, up to 1000 different coins in addition to deep pools of liquidity and OTC trading. BC Bitcoin is an execution only Broker, managing and tailoring each order to the client’s specific needs and instruction.BC Bitcoin goes by the legal name of UAB JM Trading as of 04/01/2022, previously they went by J&M Trading Limited.Currently they have a social media presence on Twitter, Facebook, and LinkedIn.

Belfrics International Limited (Belfrics), founded in 2014 and headquartered in Malaysia, is a smart digital asset trading platform. Users are able to buy and sell cryptocurrencies such as: BTC, BEL, SOL, PAXG, Dogecoin, USDT, SHIB, Dash, ETH, XRP, ADA, Matic, etc. For a full list see the link below:https://belfrics.io/#/signinThe company has a growing presence in Asia, Africa, Middle East, and the Asia-Pacific regions. They currently have office locations in Mexico, India, Nigeria, Singapore, Tanzania, Bahrain, and Kenya.Their terms are governed by the laws of Malaysia. Any disputes will be settled in accordance with the Arbitration Rules of the Malaysia International Arbitration Center.They have a social media presence on Twitter, Facebook, and LinkedIn.

BeQuant is a cryptocurrency trading platform that caters more to advanced traders.BeQuant offers spot trading, futures, and margin trading. They support numerous cryptocurrencies on their platform that includes, Bitcoin, Bitcoin Cash, Ethereum, Cardano, Litecoin, TRON, True USD, Tether, DAI, and many more.BEQUANT Exchange is a retail and institutional multi-exchange trading platform, enabling professional traders to invest in a diverse range of digital assets https://bequant.io/about-us. According to the terms and conditions, services on the exchange platform are provided via ‘Bequant Exchange Ltd’, a company located in Malta with registration number C 88067 https://registry.mbr.mt/ROC/index.jsp#/ROC/companyDetailsRO.do?action=companyDetails&companyId=C%2088067. Nevertheless, applicable law is England. A London/UK address also appears in the TCs for customer support/complaints/compliance: Bequant Exchange Ltd., 2, America House, London, EC3N 2LU, United Kingdom.However, on the privacy policy, the platform states that “This website is owned and operated by ‘Bequant Technologies Limited. They are registered in England and Wales under registration number 07548042, and their registered office is at America House, 2 America Square, London EC3N 2LU" https://bequant.io/privacy-policy. The address appears the same, but research indicates that mentioned registration number 07548042 (presumed outdated) belongs to previous name 'Sequant Technologies Limited' dissolved via compulsory strike-off https://find-and-update.company-information.service.gov.uk/company/11341868/officersBeQuant has social media presence in Twitter, Facebook, and LinkedIn. They are subpoenable and domiciled in United Kingdom.

At time of review (December 17, 2021), https://hbtc.com. Through months of monitoring both BHEX and HBTC, they swapped between both exchanges, but seemed to finally end up with BHEX being the last exchange in operation. On September 25, 2021, BHEX announced on twitter that due to regulatory requirements, they will be permanently shutting down.https://twitter.com/bhexofficial/status/1441943707532480522BHex is the crypto trading platform built on top of the Bluehelix family technology solutions, jointly invested by Huobi, OKEx and other 56 first class institutions (Yintai Group, City Holdings, Plum Ventures, Node Capital, Genesis Group, Imagination Fund, Coldlar, Danhua Capital, Dfund, BlockVC, etc). BHex founding team developed the Bluehelix decentralized asset custody and clearing technology solutions, based on blockchain technologies and community consensus mechanisms. BHex does not hold any of investor assets as an exchange itself. It focuses on core trading business including cash trading, margin trading, futures trading and OTC market. BHEX Chain is proclaimed as the next generation Decentralized Cross-chain DeFi Infrastructure. BHT token is the ERC20 token issued by BHex, for supporting operations of BHex and Bluehelix custody and clearing ecosystem. BHT token holders enjoy privileges (among other): receive 80% of the trading commissions from BHex exchange, have exclusive rights to vote for custody and clearing association when depositing BHT as collateral to the platform. Decentralized exchanged allow peer-to-peer transactions, without the need of an intermediary and usually lack (still) full KYC process, thus being assigned a red KYC grade. Source: https://static.coinpaprika.com/storage/cdn/whitepapers/10496539.pdf
Bibo Echange last social media post was on, 3/10/2021. Considered closed.

Binance is a global online platform for Digital Assets trading and refers to an ecosystem comprising Binance websites, mobile applications, clients, applets and other applications that are developed to offer Binance Services. It includes independently operated platforms, websites and clients within the ecosystem (e.g. Binance’s Open Platform, Binance Launchpad, Binance Labs, Binance Charity, Binance DEX, Binance X, JEX, Trust Wallet, and fiat gateways). Binance recently created a new Binance NFT Marketplace owned and operated by Hash Muse Pte Ltd, whose address is at 531A Upper Cross Street, #04-95 Hong Lim Complex, Singapore. Binance Charity is the world’s first transparent donation platform blockchain Charity Foundation is unlocking the power of blockchain to help alleviate poverty, fight inequality and ensure the health of people and our planet.The Binance Card, allows users to spend their favorite cryptocurrencies at more than 60 million merchants worldwide. Just transfer crypto from the spot wallet to the funding wallet and spend that crypto anytime, anywhere. Get up to 8% cashback on all eligible purchases made with a Binance Visa Card.Binance Labs invests in technical teams that build and support the decentralised web. Binance Labs identifies, invests, and empowers viable blockchain entrepreneurs, startups, and communities, providing financing to industry projects that help grow the larger blockchain ecosystem.Binance Launchpad and Launchpool are platforms that help and advise project teams on how to best issue and launch their token. They provide a full service offering starting from advisory services from before the token is even issued, to post-listing and marketing support. Their goal is to allow project teams to focus on their project development and continue building products, while hey handle the marketing, exposure and initial user base.Binance Research provides institutional-grade analysis, in-depth insights, and unbiased information to all participants in the digital asset industry.Binance Pay is a contactless, borderless and secure cryptocurrency payment technology designed by Binance. Binance Angels are Binances most active and passionate community builders, who help make a difference by sharing Binance’s vision with the world. There are currently 300+ Binance Angels across 70+ cities, who help fellow Binance users lead the crypto conversation, share local insights and trends, organize online and offline events, and more.Governing law is that of Hong Kong. Any disputes, claims, etc. will be determined by binding individual arbitration. There is no judge or jury in arbitration and court review of an arbitration award is limited. The arbitration will be administered by the Hong Kong International Arbitration Centre (HKIAC). For fiat trading and transactions available (Bank Card, GBP deposit/withdraw): BINANCE UAB registered in Vilnius Lithuania, while BINANCE DIGITAL LIMITED, registered in the UK, will only be responsible for receiving/transferring GBP on behalf of Binance UAB and will not be responsible for providing any Digital Assets exchange or custody services.BNB is the native asset on Binance Chain, a blockchain software system developed by Binance and the community. BNB has multiple forms of utility and powers the Binance Ecosystem as its underlying gas.Currently they have a social media presence on Twitter, Instagram, Facebook, and LinkedIn.In May 2021 it was reported that Binance was under investigation by both the Internal Revenue Service and the United States Department of Justice on allegations of money laundering and tax offenses. https://www.bloomberg.com/news/articles/2021-05-13/binance-probed-by-u-s-as-money-laundering-tax-sleuths-bore-inWithin 2021, several regulatory authorities have issued public warnings regarding Binance: Malta MFSA, FCA UK, the Polish Supervision Authority (PFSA), the Bank of Lithuania, Malaysia's Security Commission, DeNederlandsche Bank, Thailand’s Securities and Exchange Commission, Cayman Islands Monetary Authority, while SEC also files a criminal complaint against Binance for operating digital asset business without a license. https://www.sec.or.th/EN/Pages/News_Detail.aspx?SECID=9017In March 2022, amidst the Russian invasion on Ukraine, Binance's CEO Changpeng Zhao, refused refused to ban the users from Russia, citing "financial freedom." https://www.bbc.com/news/technology-60576373In 2022, Binance has applied for and been granted licenses in Dubai, Bahrain, Abu Dhabi, France, Italy, and Spain with plains to obtain licenses in The Philippines. They also plan on expanding services to the United Kingdom.

For fiat trading and transactions available (Bank Card, GBP deposit/withdraw): BINANCE UAB registered in Vilnius Lithuania, while BINANCE DIGITAL LIMITED, registered in the UK, will only be responsible for receiving/transferring GBP on behalf of Binance UAB and will not be responsible for providing any Digital Assets exchange or custody services.BNB is the native asset on Binance Chain, a blockchain software system developed by Binance and the community. BNB has multiple forms of utility and powers the Binance Ecosystem as its underlying gas.Currently they have a social media presence on Twitter, Instagram, Facebook, and LinkedIn.In May 2021 it was reported that Binance was under investigation by both the Internal Revenue Service and the United States Department of Justice on allegations of money laundering and tax offenses. https://www.bloomberg.com/news/articles/2021-05-13/binance-probed-by-u-s-as-money-laundering-tax-sleuths-bore-inWithin 2021, several regulatory authorities have issued public warnings regarding Binance: Malta MFSA, FCA UK, the Polish Supervision Authority (PFSA), the Bank of Lithuania, Malaysia's Security Commission, DeNederlandsche Bank, Thailand’s Securities and Exchange Commission, Cayman Islands Monetary Authority, while SEC also files a criminal complaint against Binance for operating digital asset business without a license. https://www.sec.or.th/EN/Pages/News_Detail.aspx?SECID=9017In March 2022, amidst the Russian invasion on Ukraine, Binance's CEO Changpeng Zhao, refused refused to ban the users from Russia, citing "financial freedom." https://www.bbc.com/news/technology-60576373In 2022, Binance has applied for and been granted licenses in Dubai, Bahrain, Abu Dhabi, France, Italy, and Spain with plains to obtain licenses in The Philippines. They also plan on expanding services to the United Kingdom.

(Binance.US) is a digital asset marketplace, powered by matching engine and wallet technologies licensed from the cryptocurrency exchange, Binance.Binance is a global online platform for Digital Assets trading and refers to an ecosystem comprising Binance websites, mobile applications, clients, applets and other applications that are developed to offer Binance Services, and includes independently operated platforms, websites and clients within the ecosystem (e.g. Binance’s Open Platform, Binance Launchpad, Binance Labs, Binance Charity, Binance DEX, Binance X, JEX, Trust Wallet, and fiat gateways). Their terms are governed by the laws the State of California, United States.They have social media presence on Twitter, Facebook, and Linkedin.

Bit2C was established as a cryptocurrency exchange platform in March 2013. The trading platform enables users to buy and sell leading cryptocurrencies against the shekel, alongside custodial services and an OTC liquidity desk. Supports BTC, ETH, LTC, and USDC. Bit2c denominates its prices in NIS (Israeli New Shekels).Services are provided by Bitusi Ltd. a company located in Israel. Bit2C holds a permit (No. 56980) to provide financial services according to the Financial Services Inspection Law 2016 and is pending to receive its permanent license from The Capital Market Authority. Bit2C is domiciled in, subpeonable in, and only allows users from Israel. Currently they have a social media presence on Twitter, LinkedIn, and Facebook as well as a YouTube Channel.

Founded in 2014 and headquartered Spain, BitcoinForMe S.L. (Bit2me) is a financial technology company. They offer 21 products, 90 currencies (including privacy coins Monero and Zcash), to 700K+ users in 100+ countries. Services include providing a wallet, sell, buy, convert, supporting crypto and fiat, OTC, multi-currency blockchain explorer etc. They have social media presence on Twitter, Facebook, and Linkedin.

Bit4Coin has announced that they are no longer offering BTC gift cards or vouchers. Closed. Bit4Coin is a cryptocurrency exchange founded in 2013, owned and operated by B4C Markets B.V. a company incorporated in Amsterdam, Netherlands and regulated by the Dutch Central Bank as a cryptocurrency service provider. https://www.dnb.nl/openbaar-register/registerdetailpagina/?registerCode=WWFTAC&relationNumber=R179444

EU Exchangebit4you is one of the first crypto exchange operating from Belgium at European level. At bit4you they work continuously to comply with all existing regulations and strive to be in line with all anti-money laundering and terrorism financing processes. bit4you operates from Brussels (Belgium) in collaboration with law firm eubelius The first activities launched on 29 August are not subject to a licence by the regulators under the current Belgian and European legislation.

Headquartered in Japan, Bitbank is a cryptocurrency exchange platform that allows users to trade cryptocurrency.Bitbank currently offers 18 cryptocurrencies to trade, they are Bitcoin, Ripple, Ethereum, Litecoin, Bitcoin Cash, Monacoin, Ethereum, Stellar, Quantum, Basic Attention Token, OMG, Symbol, Chainlink, Maker, Boba network, Enjin Coin, Polygon, Polkadot, and Dogecoin.Services are offered by Bitbank.co Ltd, licensed by the Kanto Local Finance Bureau and regulated by the Japanese Financial Services Agency (JFSA) Brave New Coin. Fiat deposits and withdrawals can only be made in JPY (Japanese Yen). Bitbank is domiciled and subpoenable in Japan. They have a social media presence on Twitter, Facebook, and LinkedIn.

Bitblinx is a cryptocurrency exchange from Estonia. Supports 17+ cryptocurrencies and 25 cryptocurrency pairs to trade and does not support privacy coins Monero and Zcash.. Services are provided by BitBlinx OÜ, a company registered in Tallinn, Estonia (company registration number 14753654). BitBlinx has an Estonian license FVT000390 to provide virtual currency services. USA and Japan (among other countries) are prohibited jurisdictions. Fiat deposits/withdrawals are not available for citizens of: India, Israel, China, South Korea, Hong Kong, Singapore, Australia, the Netherlands (among other countries). Applicable law: Estonia.List of Restricted Countries: Afghanistan, Algeria, Bangladesh, Bolivia, Democratic People’s Republic of Korea (North Korea), Ecuador, Ethiopia, Iceland, Iran, Kyrgyzstan, Macedonia, Morocco, Nepal, Pakistan, Qatar, Saudi Arabia, Serbia, Sri Lanka, Syria, Trinidad and Tobago, Tunisia, and the USA , Vanuatu, Vietnam, Yemen, Japan

Bitbns is a cryptocurrency exchange platform that allows users to buy, sell, trade, send, receive, and manage their crypto assets in one place.Popular cryptocurrencies like Bitcoin, Ethereum, Tether, Ripple, Tron, and Shiba are supported on this platform.Other features on this platform include peer-to-peer exchange, coin swap, margin trading, futures trading, pools, launchpads, hardware wallets, and trading contests.Bitbns is domiciled and subpoenable in India. They have a social media presence on Twitter, LinkedIn, and Facebook.

BITCAMBIO is a cryptocurrency exchange founded in 2013, operating in Brazil, headquartered at Niterói, Rio de Janeiro. Services are provided by “Citar Tech EIRELI-ME” a company incorporated and registered under the laws of the Federal Republic of Brazil, registered with the CNPJ (Cadastro Nacional de Pessoas Jurídicas) 19.004.882/0001-91. Applicable law: Brazil. BITCAMBIO provides a virtual portfolio in favor of the user that can be (1) withdrawn by the user and transferred to another virtual portfolio; (2) stored (3) made available for possible purchases and sales. The user may store their bitcoins in their virtual wallet, only for the sole and exclusive purpose of trading on the BITCAMBIO platform (TCs in general recommend such wallets to be used for trading and not only for storing/custody of funds, indicating that non-custodial wallets should be used for storing funds that are not traded frequently). To buy Bitcoin, the user must have a balance in Brazilian Reals on the platform. Brazil is no longer included in FATF's AML deficiencies list, but has published statements re AML deficiencies.

Bitci is an online trading cryptocurrency platform where users can buy or sell cryptocurrency in pairs. Users can trade popular cryptocurrency such as Bitcoin, Ethereum, Dash, Monero, Tether, and more. $BITCI tokens is the native token and users can get $BITCI tokens to utilize the crypto trading pairs. Another investment tool users can use is staking.Bitci is a Registered National Crypto Exchange with Fiat integration to National Banks. The Bitci.com exchange permits trading with the fiat currencies of USD and TRY. Bitci is registered in Turkey. Only Turkey residents are allowed to use this exchange.

At the time of this review 07/15/2022, the web domain is accessible, however there is no way to register for an account at this time. They are presumed closed as of today, 07/15/2022.BitcoinsExpress allows users to exchange Bitcoin to PayPal at 4% higher exchange rate than the market price. The minimum transaction amount is just $1. They do not require an ID verification to confirm any transactions. Users must however create a free account and calculate a desirable amount.They usually transfer money to users PayPal account within a few hours.Currently they have no presence on any social media platform.

Founded in 2010 and incorporated in Seychelles, B2U Limited (Bitcointoyou) is an international broker for Bitcoin and altcoins. They offer a way for people to buy and sell cryptocurrencies using blockchain technology. Bitcointoyou has about 400,000 active customers. With a variety of more than 20 cryptocurrencies, the main ones are: Bitcoin, Ethereum, USDT, USDC and Litecoin.Their terms are governed by the laws of the Republic of Seychelles.Bitcointoyou has a social media presence on Twitter, Facebook, and Linkedin.

BitcoinTrade is a cryptocurrency exchange founded in 2017, operating in Brazil, headquartered in Rio de Janeiro. The website and all its contents is operated and owned exclusively by PeerTrade Digital Ltda, a company registered with the CNPJ/MF (Cadastro Nacional de Pessoas Jurídicas) under n. 28.640.024/0001-24. Applicable law is also that of Brazil. BitcoinTrade claims to comply with PCI DSS Level 2 certification standards. Bitcoin Trade provides an online platform which allows its users to buy, sell and store cryptocurrencies. Research indicates that Argentina’s Ripio has acquired BitcoinTrade, to increase its footprint across Latin America crypto market. Ripio (formerly knowns as BitPagos), is a financial payments company that provides electronic payment solutions for businesses in Latin America. More on. this can be found here: https://finance.yahoo.com/news/argentina-ripio-acquires-second-largest-130021256.htmlCurrently they have a social media presence on both LinkedIn and Facebook.

BitcoinUK is part of a worldwide network that includes bitcoin.com.au, bitcoin.ca, and bitcoin.eu. It allows people to buy BTC with a card or Bank Account and deposits the crypto into a wallet specified by the user.In addition, users can read educational content and blogs about Bitcoin.BitcoinUK is registered in the Netherlands

BankName: Vietnam Prosperity Joint Stock Commercial Bank
OrgNotes: BitcoinVN, headquartered in Vietnam, was founded with the mission to provide Vietnamese & Vietnam-based people an easy access to the Digital Asset economy and its wider applications.The firm was founded in late 2013 by the Vietnamese-German founding team around Nguyen Tran Bao Phuong, Dominik Weil and Aleksander Winter and Phil Trinh (the latter left the firm on good terms in 2018 to focus more on his private life).BitcoinVN is still owned and operated by its original founding team.BitcoinVN specializes in Digital currency, Remittance, BTC, Cryptocurrency, Exchange, Buy/Sell Bitcoin, Bitcoin ATM, BTM, Blockchain, Bitcoin Saigon, Brokerage, Financial Service, Digital Asset, Online exchange platform, Remittance service, Digital Money, Fintech, Meetup, and Bitcoin.Most legal information is redacted for privacy.Bitcoin Vietnam is a cryptocurrency exchange.

BankName: Vietnam Prosperity Joint Stock Commercial Bank
OrgNotes: BitcoinVN is a Vietnamese cryptocurrency exchange. They support a variety of cryptocurrencies including Bitcoin, Bitcoin Cash, Ethereum, Tether, USD Coin, DASH, Dogecoin, DAI, ADA, TRX, Ripple, privacy coins XMR (Monero) and fiat VND (Vietnamese Dong). Not only do they offer the swapping of crypto, but they also offer the staking on 8 different cryptos. BitcoinVN is owned operated by CTY TNHH BVN STAR, domiciled in Viet Nam. They do not specify what applicable laws they are governed by and do not seem to restrict the residents of any country at this time. Vietnam is not on the FATF List of Countries that have been identified as having strategic AML deficiencies, while there are no international sanctions currently in force against this country https://www.knowyourcountry.com/vietnam1111.Currently they have a social media presence on Facebook, Twitter, and LinkedIn.

Bitcoiva was launched in 2020 and is domiciled in India. They are a cryptocurrency exchange that supports various forms of transactions such as fiat to crypto trading, crypto to crypto trading and direct purchase options. They also offer staking, peer to peer trading and futures trading. They support many different cryptocurrencies at this time such as Bitcoin, Bitcoin Cash, Ripple, Binance Coin, Dogecoin, Litecoin and many others. Bitcoiva offers its users a mobile application that is available to download on GooglePlay. Bitcoiva Private Limited is domiciled in India. They state in their terms and conditions that any disputes shall be governed by the Terms and conditions, the laws of India and applicable Indian law.Currently they have social media presence on Twitter, Facebook and LinkedIn.

Bitcoiva was launched in 2020 and is domiciled in India. They are a cryptocurrency exchange that supports various forms of transactions such as fiat to crypto trading, crypto to crypto trading and direct purchase options. They also offer staking, peer to peer trading and futures trading. They support many different cryptocurrencies at this time such as Bitcoin, Bitcoin Cash, Ripple, Binance Coin, Dogecoin, Litecoin and many others. Bitcoiva offers its users a mobile application that is available to download on GooglePlay. Bitcoiva Private Limited is domiciled in India. They state in their terms and conditions that any disputes shall be governed by the Terms and conditions, the laws of India and applicable Indian law.Currently they have social media presence on Twitter, Facebook and LinkedIn.

Bitcove is a cryptocurrency exchange domiciled in Ireland. They allow users to purchase, trade, and sell cryptocurrencies such as Bitcoin, Ethereum, Tether, Ripple, Litecoin, and Dogecoin among others. They also have Bitcoin ATMs located throughout Ireland in Dublin, Cork, Galway, Waterford and Limerick. To use ATMs customers will need to provide a valid form of ID, have a working cell phone with texting capabilities, and the ATM will need to record a selfie.Bitcove also offers a Refer a Friend Program where users can earn Bitcoin by sharing a link on their social media accounts.Millcove Digital Solutions Ltd. is a company registered in Ireland under company number 554001 with a registered office address at 73 Francis Street, Dublin 8. They operate their online services via their Bitcove website. They are governed by the applicable laws of Ireland.Currently they have a social media presence on Twitter, Instagram, Facebook, and LinkedIn.

Bitex is a cryptocurrency exchange that offers trading accounts to individuals, corporates, and joint accounts. The platform currently supports Bitcoin, USD Tether, DAI, BNB, Bitcoin Cash, Ethereum, Polkadot, FTX coin, USD Coin, Uniswap, DogeCoin, Chainlink Soy Token, Yearn Finance and SushiSwap. The fiat currencies supported on this platform are: USD, ARS, CLP, PYG, and PEN. Bitex currently prohibits the residents of the following countries from registering an account with the platform: Afghanistan, Aland Islands, Albania, American Samoa, Angola, Antartica, Aruba, Bahamas, Barbados, Benin, Bonaire Sint Eustatius and Saba, Botswana, Burkina Faso, Burundi, Cambodia, Cape Verde, Central African Republic, Christmas Island, Cocos Icerling Island, Comoros, Congo, Cook Islands, Cote d’Ivoire, Corea del Norte, Cuba, Curaçao, Djibouti, Egypt, Equatorial Guinea, Eritrea, Ethiopia, French Guiana, French Polynesia, French Southern Territories, Gabón, Gambia, Ghana, Greenland, Guadalupe, Heard Island and McDonald Islands, Holy see Vatican City State, Iceland, India, Iran, Iraq, Jamaica, Kazakhstan, Kenya, Lesotho, Liberia, Libyan Arab Jamahiriya, Madagascar, Malawi, Mali, Mauritania, Mauritius, Mayotte, Mongolia, Morocco, Mozambique, Myanmar, Namibia, Netherlands, Netherlands Antilles, New Caledonia, Niger, Nigeria, Nive, Norfolk Island, Omán, Pakistan, Palestinian Occupied Territory, Pitcairn, Puerto Rico, Reunión, Russia, Saint Helena Ascension and Tristan da Cunha, Saint Martin, Saint Pierre and Miquelon, Sao Tome and Principe, Senegal, Seychelles, Sierra Leone, Sint Maarten, Solomon Islands, Somalia, South Georgia and the South Sandwich Islands, South Sudan, Sudan, Switzerland, Syrian Arab Republic, Tanzania, Togo, Tokelau, Trinidad and Tobago, Tunisia, Turkey, Turkmenistan, Turks and Caicos Islands, Uganda, United States, United States Minor Outlying Islands, Venezuela, Virgin Islands (US), Wallis and Futuna, Western Sahara, Yemen, Zambia and Zimbabwe.Bitex.la is domiciled in Curacao. They have a social media presence on Twitter and Facebook.

BITEXBOOK is an online cryptocurrency exchange that is based in Saint Vincent and the Grenadines.Popular cryptocurrencies like Bitcoin, Ethereum, Dogecoin, Monero, Litecoin, and Dash are supported on this exchange platform. Fiat currencies supported on this platform are USD, RUB and UAHBitexPaymentCoin (BPCoin) is the native token of BITEXBOOK exchange offering various benefits to its holders (https://bitexbook.com/en/bpcoin/public). BPCoin token is launched on TRON blockchain of TRC10 standard (https://tronscan.org/#/token/1002434). Services are provided by StreamCapital Group Ltd, with legal address in St. Vincent and Grenadines (Registered number: 22537 IBC 2015) Following the declared bankruptcy of the Bitflip exchange, StreamCapital Group company (BITEXBOOK cryptocurrency exchange) became a legal successor of the rights and duties of BitFlip. The BITEXBOOK Exchange undertakes to record BitFlip customers balances in its system by issuing debt tokens in the equivalent of the currency in which balances have been remaining on BitFlip customers’ wallets (tokens are issued with the “bf” prefix) (https://bitexbook.com/en/bitflip). Applicable law is not clearly stated in the TCs: The 'Dispute settlement' section in the Terms and Conditions stipulates that '...in case the parties are not able to reach consensus, the dispute will be subject to resolution in court in location where the Service Provider resides, presumed St. Vincent and the Grenadines. Under the 'Prevention of illegal Site and System use' section of the TCs it is stipulated that for ID and KYC purposes ‘The User is obliged to go fulfill the requirements stipulated by UK law in the field of counteraction of laundering (legitimization) proceeds of crime.’ (https://bitexbook.com/en/legal/user-agreement)

Founded in 2018, Bitex UAE is a digital currency exchange and a professional trading platform operating in United Arab Emirates. Although the platform Bitex UAE is accessible, having relevant information regarding the company, at the time of the (21 Feb 2022) the exchange does not appear to have any activity, or list any cryptocurrency, thus it is presumed not operational.

Bitfinex, founded in 2012, is a cryptocurrency trading platform providing services for digital currency traders and liquidity providers. Bitfinex is a sister company to the Tether stablecoin. Services for US persons transacting are provided via company BFXNA In., and for all others via company BFXWW Inc. Together both companies and the platform are owned and operated by iFinex Inc. They are governed by the applicable laws of The British Virgin Islands.Bitfinex allows users to purchase cryptocurrencies with credit cards. They support Tether, Tether Gold, Tezos, TRON, Ethereum, and many other ERC20 tokens with a minimum purchase requirement of $25.Prohibited Jurisdiction means any part of Cuba, North Korea, Iran, Syria, Crimea, Donetsk People’s Republic (a region of Ukraine), or the Luhansk People’s Republic (another region of Ukraine). Prohibited persons are any U.S. residents; any Ontario residents; the Government of Venezuela; any resident of, or Government or Government Official of, any prohibited jurisdiction; and any sanctioned persons.Currently they have a social media presence on Twitter, Facebook, and LinkedIn.

BitFlyer Inc is a Bitcoin exchange and marketplace, established on 01/09/2014. They offer customers to buy and sell bitcoins. They are licensed to operate across Europe, the US and Japan combined, full audited by Ernst & Young. BitFlyer is domiciled and subpoenabled in Japan, they haves social media presence on all the major platforms like Twitter, Facebook and LinkedIn. They support crypto currencies like Bitcoin, Ethereum, Litecoin, Bitcoin Cash and many More.

BitFlyer Inc is a Bitcoin exchange and marketplace, established on 01/09/2014. They offer customers to buy and sell bitcoins. They are licensed to operate across Europe, the US and Japan combined, full audited by Ernst & Young. BitFlyer is domiciled and subpoenabled in Japan, they haves social media presence on all the major platforms like Twitter, Facebook and LinkedIn. They support crypto currencies like Bitcoin, Ethereum, Litecoin, Bitcoin Cash and many More.

Opened in January 2018, bitFlyer Europe S.A. is headquartered in Luxembourg. It is a virtual currency exchange and blockchain developer in the US, supplementing technology, insights, and security practices. They are a subsidiary of bitFlyer Inc., which is a worldwide bitcoin exchange.The terms for bitFlyer Europe S.A. are governed by the laws of the Grand Duchy of Luxembourg. Any disputes subject to arbitration will be submitted to the exclusive jurisdiction of the the Courts of Luxembourg, Grand Duchy of Luxembourg, unless bitFlyer chooses an alternative court location.They have social media presence on Twitter and Facebook.

Started in 2016, bitFlyer USA Inc. is headquartered in San Francisco, CA. It is a virtual currency exchange and blockchain developer in the US, supplementing technology, insights, and security practices. They are a subsidiary of bitFlyer Inc., which is a worldwide bitcoin exchange.The terms for bitFlyer USA Inc. are governed by the laws of the state of California, US. Any disputes subject to arbitration will be submitted to the exclusive jurisdiction of the state or federal courts of California and the United States.They have social media presence on Twitter and Facebook.

With the launch of its messenger in 2011, LINE quickly grew into a global leader among IT companies. Today, the LINE app is one of the world’s most popular messengers, with 185 M+ users. More, than just a chat app, LINE has also evolved into a “smart portal,” offering various services to its users, by bringing blockchain technology to the LINE platform.As a blockchain network based on Interchain, LINE Blockchain Network will be integrated into LINE to serve as a platform for a wide range of LINE services and accelerate the LINE Token Economy. LINK (LN), the general-purpose base (native) coin of the LINE Blockchain Network. The result is BITFRONT, a revolutionary digital currency exchange serving as the main exchange platform for the core products in LINE's blockchain business. Presently BITFRONT supports 5 BTC pairs, 5 USDT pairs and fiat: USD.LVC USA Inc. runs the “BITFRONT” exchange. Governing law: State of California USA. Affiliated companies: Naver Corporation, LINE Corporation, LINE TECH PLUS PTE. LTD. in Singapore.Bitfront and Bitbox use shared deposit addresses. For details on Bitfront and Bitbox interactions, see Bitfront.

Headquartered in Israel, Bitin is a service that offers buy and sell options for Bitcoin, Ethereum, and Litecoin, and more. They also offer hard wallets for users, as well as help, courses, and advice for new crypto users. They have a social media presence on Facebook, and a community on Telegram.

BitInka Limited , headquartered in Hong Kong, started operations in November 2014, with the sole purpose of becoming one of the largest Blockchain and Fintech startups in Latin America. It owns both Bitinka Exchange, an international cryptocurrencies exchange, and Inkapay, a cross-border payments & remittance solution based on Blockchain. Currently operates in 40+ countries (in Latin America, Europe and Asia) has corporate offices in Argentina, Brazil, Peru, and Spain. Also has 120+ markets and accept 10+ FIAT currencies.The operator of the website and governing law are not clearly indicated in the Terms and Conditions, which would indicate being cautious if wishing to transact.

Founded in 2013 and headquartered in Split, Croatia, Digital Assets d.o.o (Bitkonan) is a small Bitcoin exchange that allows users to trade Bitcoin, Litecoin and Ethereum for USD. They have a partnership with Bitcoin Store.Their Terms are governed by the laws of Croatia. Any disputes will be settled in the exclusive jurisdiction of Split, Croatia courts.They have social media presence on Twitter.

Bitkub founded in 2018 and headquartered in Bangkok, is a digital asset exchange where users can buy, sell, store, and trade cryptocurrency. Their platform supports popular crypto like Bitcoin, Ethereum, Litecoin, Ripple, Bitcoin Cash and others. Other features of this website include staking and live updates of crypto news.Bitkub Coin ($KUB), the native digital currency of Bitkub Chain, was launched in May 2021. $KUB is a utility coin, with the ability to be redeemed for fee credits on the Bitkub exchange. It can also be used for gas fees or a transaction fee for generic transactions on blockchain.Services are provided by Bitkub Online Co Ltd. The company is domiciled and subpoenable in Thailand. They have social media presence on Twitter, Facebook, and LinkedIn.In Feb 2021 Bitkub announced the suspension of new client registration following an order from the Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC), more on this can be found here:https://www.bangkokpost.com/business/2063359/sec-bars-bitkub-from-registering-new-clientsThe Siam Commercial Bank Public Company Limited has passed a resolution approving SCBS, a subsidiary of the Bank, to enter into the share purchase agreement for the acquisition of shares in Bitkub Online Co. Ltd., from Bitkub Capital Group Holdings Co. Ltd., in the proportion representing 51% of the total shares in Bitkub, at the total value of approximately THB $17,850 million. More on this can be found in the article below: https://www.marketscreener.com/quote/stock/THE-SIAM-COMMERCIAL-BANK-6491602/news/Investment-in-Bitkub-Online-Co-Ltd-by-SCB-Securities-Co-Ltd-36867280

Bitladon (Coin Meester B.V.) is a cryptocurrency exchange that allows users to buy, sell, and trade over 200 cryptocurrencies. They have an internal wallet where users can store their cryptocurrencies. Minimum trading amount is 5 Euros.Bitladon is an international brand of Bitcoin Meester; both are owned by Coin Meester B.V. which is registered with the Dutch Chamber of Commerce (KVK) under number 68955820. They are domiciled in The United States. They do not permit any residents or citizens of The United States to access the services provided on their platform.They support Bitcoin, Bitcoin Cash, Ethereum, USD Coin, Ripple, Litecoin, Dogecoin, Cardano, Terra, Solana, Polygon, Chainlink, and many other cryptocurrencies.Currently they have a social media presence on Twitter and Facebook.

At the time of this review, 08/09/2022, the web domain is no longer accessible. They have no presence on any social media platforms and there are no articles relating to this organization rebranding, closing, or being a scam. They restricted the residents of Lebanon, Libya, Yemen, Iran, Afghanistan, Burundi, Central African Republic, Congo, Guinea, Iraq, North Korea, Sudan, Somalia, United States, Zimbabwe, and South Sudan.

They restricted the residents of Lebanon, Libya, Yemen, Iran, Afghanistan, Burundi, Central African Republic, Congo, Guinea, Iraq, North Korea, Sudan, Somalia, United States, Zimbabwe, and South Sudan.

At the time of this review, 08/09/2022, the web domain is no longer accessible. They have no presence on any social media platforms and there are no articles relating to this organization rebranding, closing, or being a scam. BitMart, founded in 2017 and headquartered in the United States, is a trading platform diversified system functions including spot trading, futures contract trading, and over-the-counter trading. They offer trade of BTC, Ethereum, Litecoin, BCH, Dash, and more. For full information of their markets, see link: https://www.bitmart.com/markets/enTheir user agreement is governed by the laws of the Cayman Islands.Restricted jurisdictions from their services include: Afghanistan, Balkans, Belarys, Burma, China (Mainland), Cote D’Ivoire (Ivory Coast), Cuba, Crimea, Democratic Republic of Congo, Iran, Iraq, Liberia, North Korea, Sudan, Syria, Zimbabwe and the United States.Partners of Bitmart include: Circle, Gemini, Tron, Certik, Paxful, George Mason University, Blockchain Business Lab, Columbia University, Boston College, Simplex, Talenta, and more. For full list see link: https://www.bitmart.com/partner/enThey have social media presence on Twitter, Facebook and Linkedin.

Bitmymoney BV (Bitmymoney), founded in 2013, is a cryptocurrency exchange that allows users to buy, sell, trade, transfer, and store currencies.The company is domiciled in the Netherlands, with the headquarters located at: The Hague Security Delta (HSD), Wilhelmina van Pruisenweg 104, 2595AN Den Haag, Netherlands. Their terms are governed by Dutch laws.US persons are prohibited from using the services of their website.Bitmymoney supports purchases from a SEPA bank account and iDEAL an online payment method that allows consumers to pay online through their personal bank.Bitmymoney offers the currencies Bitcoin, Ethereum, and Litecoin for purchase.They have social media presence on Twitter, Facebook, and Linkedin.

Founded in 2013, BitNational offers both a cryptocurrency exchanging platform and a network of Bitcoin ATMs that are located mainly in Vancouver, Calgary, and Edmonton, in Canada. The BitNational exchange and ATMs can exchange Bitcoin, Ethereum, Litecoin, and Bitcoin Cash among other cryptocurrencies.BitNational's main headquarters office is located in Calgary, Alberta and they are domiciled in Canada. They are governed by the applicable laws of The Province of British Columbia, as well as any applicable federal laws of Canada.In 2018, BitNational opened their online cryptocurrency platform for users to execute transactions and manage their digital currency wallet.In May of 2021, Bitnational ATM was involved with four criminals performing double spend attacks on Bitcoin ATMs.https://www.ccn.com/bitcoin-atm-double-spenders-police-need-help-identifying-four-criminalsCurrently they have a social media presence on Twitter, Instagram, Facebook, and LinkedIn as well as a YouTube Channel.

Bitnetlab OU (Bitnetlab) is a fintech company that provides worldwide cryptocurrency payment processing. They enable users to purchase crypto from an exchange. Cryptocurrencies can also be purchased by Mastercard, Visa, VISA Electron, and Mastero as well as by wire transfers. Users will need to download their app and connect a wallet in order to have access to their markets.They are headquartered in Tallinn, Estonia. Their terms are governed by the laws of Estonia, and any disputes will be submitted to the exclusive jurisdiction of the courts of Estonia. Bitnetlab is not providing services for the residents of following countries: Bangladesh, Bolivia, Bosnia and Herzegovina, Central African Republic, China, Congo, Cuba, Ecuador, Ethiopia, Iceland, Indonesia, Iran (Islamic Republic of), Japan, Korea (Democratic People's Republic of), Kuwait, Kyrgyzstan, Lebanon, Libya, Mali, Martinique, Myanmar, Nepal, Nigeria, Pakistan, Palau, Palestine (State of), Philippines, Somalia, Sri Lanka, Sudan, Syrian Arab Republic, Trinidad and Tobago, Tunisia, Uganda, United States, Vanuatu, Venezuela, Yemen, or Zimbabwe.Currently the only social media presence they have online is on LinkedIn.

Money Flow OU (Bitnomics) is a cryptocurrency exchangem that offers users to buy, sell, and trade currencies. They have served over 13,000 customers. Users can purchasee currencies, using their personal credit card, wire transfer from their personal bank account and local payment solutions.Bitnomics is headquartered in Estonia. Their terms are governed by all applicable laws of Estonia.Any United States legal entities are not permitted to use any service provided by Bitnomics however residents are not currently restricted. https://bitnomics.co/en/terms-and-conditionsThey offer users the opportunity to purchase or sell Bitcoin and Ethereum. Visa and Mastercard are accepted for payments. They accept fiat currencies of EUR, GBP, USD, and CAD at this time. Supported cryptocurrencies include: Bitcoin, Ethereum, Litecoin, Ripple, Bitcoin Cash, and Dogecoin.Bitnomics has a social media presence on Facebook, LinkedIn, and Twitter.

Bitnovo is a financial institute where they provide digital banking to exchange cryptocurrency. Bitnovo started back in 2015 and they're headquartered in Valencia, SpainAccount holders can easily register by linking up their bank accounts or credit cards to add funds to exchange for cryptocurrency, The popular cryptocurrencies you can exchange with Bitnovo are Bitcoin, Ethereum, Monero, Ripple, and many more alternatives. Another option is getting the "Bitcard". Bitcard is a pre-paid debit card issued from Bitnovo. This route allows users to not have to sign up or register and cancel the card whenever without being binded to a certain time. Bitnovo offers physical bank location where you can buy or exchange cryptocurrency with physical cash or through a voucher. How vouchers work is buy purchasing a voucher through Bitnovo and it will generate a code. Then the buyer will redeem the code online with their account and the funds will appear online for user to buy whichever cryptocurrency they desire.

Founded in April, 2018, Bitnuk (Bitnuk AG), is a Swiss Bitcoin exchange and wallet service. Members can have as many wallets as they want and each will be completely separate. Users have the option to make deposits with credit and debit cards for crypto purchases as well as the option to set up recurring deposits with those cards. At this time they accept Mastercard and Visa; however, Bitnuk only supports deposits in Euros, so if a deposit is made in another currency, it will automatically be converted to Euros reflecting the current exchange rate. They offer their services to their members with no additional fees. They also offer the trading of precious metals.Bitnuk offers their users a Bitnuk physical Mastercard upon request. Debit cards do have plans upon which they are regulated, but they can be used at ATMs and to make purchases. They are currently working on a limit order feature for their users. Bitnuk is governed by the applicable laws of Switzerland and operates under the regulatory supervision of ARIF Genf (Member No.: 3097), a self-regulating body approved by the Swiss Financial Market Supervisory Authority (FINMA) for the supervision of the financial intermediaries referred to in article 2, paragraph 3, of the Swiss Federal Law on combating money laundering and terrorism financing in the financial sector (AMLA). Bitnuk is not subject to direct FINMA supervision, any regulatory issues should be addressed to ARIF.The Bitnuk app is available for users on both Google Play and the Apple App store. Currently they have a social media presence on Twitter, LinkedIn, and Facebook.

BitoPro International Digital Asset Exchange is a digital asset exchange from Taiwan, targeting global investors. Established by BitoEX, BitoPro aims to establish a world-class blockchain asset exchange platform to provide global investors with a safer, more convenient, professional, trustworthy and excellent blockchain asset exchange service. Plans to establish operations first in India, Singapore, Malaysia, Philippine and Japan, in order to lower the barriers to trading and the investment risks for users in these countries. Eventually, BitoEX aims to reach out globally and provide digital financial services on a global scale https://bito.bitopro.com/docs/whitepaper-en.pdfAt present, the company does not accept the registration of users with nationalities of China, Hong Kong, Macau and the United States.Bintuo is committed to expanding the market scale and influence, and is always looking for a group of suitable corporate partners to provide users with the best quality services. Partners: FamilyMart, Hybrid Decentralized Exchange JOYSO, CoinGecko, Dow Jones, Bee Check, BitUniverse.They specialize in blockchain, Cryptocurrency, Cybersecurity , Software, Fintech, Algorithms, Data Mining, and System Deploy.BitoPro refers to the Taiwan branch of Virgin Islands Business Bito Technology Co.Ltd. Supports crypto-crypto, fiat-crypto transactions, margin trading and OTC (over-the-counter) support. Applicable law: Republic of China and Taiwan/ Taipei District Court. BITO Coin is the native (ERC20) token issued via BitoPro exchange, associated with benefits and discounts for its token holders.

Founded in 2014, Bitpanda is a cryptocurrency exchange that also allows user to invest in Stocks, ETFs, Precious Metals, and Indices. They allow users to buy, sell or swap 100+ digital assets and support EUR, CHF, GBP, USD and TRY. They also have an affiliate program where members can earn 20% revenue for each person they refer. Bitpanda also provides and operates a central limit order book online trading platform called Bitpanda Pro. Bitpanda also offers services in cooperation with third parties, e.g. Bitpanda Metals GmbH, Bitpanda Financial Services GmbH and/or Bitpanda Payments GmbH.Bitpanda offers a Bitpanda Card that allows users to spend crypto, stocks and other digital assets anywhere, having partnered with "UAB Finansins paslaugos", a company in Lithuania. Contis is the issuer of the Bitpanda Card and is a member of the Visa card schemes, which will be used to enable your Bitpanda Card to operate as a regular debit card. Services are offered by Bitpanda GmbH, a registered digital assets service provider with the Austrian Financial Market Authority (FMA) under FM-GwG and with the French Autorité des marchés financiers (AMF) under PACTE law. The Bitpanda Payments GmbH holds a PSD2 license. They are governed by the applicable laws of Austria.Bitpanda has an app available on iOs and Android devices.Currently they have a social media presence on Twitter, Discord, Instagram, Facebook, and LinkedIn.

Founded in 2013, BitPesa is a digital foreign exchange and payment platform, that provides wholesale cryptocurrency liquidity for individuals and institutions across Africa. Proclaims to have 26K customers and to be a market-maker in every major African currency. Launched in Nairobi, BitPesa now has offices in Lagos, London, Luxembourg, Madrid, and Dakar. After you have established a BitPesa Account, you may initiate a transaction to buy or sell virtual currencies, by using one of the supported fiat currencies and/or provide your payment order or remittance order instructions. Fiat currencies supported: Nigerian Naira (NGN), Ugandan Shilling (UGX), Ghanaian Cedi (GHS), Tanzanian Shilling (TZS), West African CFA Franc (XOF). Services are provided by BTC Africa S.A. a company having its office in Luxembourg, in the Grand Duchy of Luxembourg and registered with the number B 211.963. Applicable law: The Grand Duchy of Luxembourg. BTC Africa S.A. is a registered PSD agent of B Transfer Service Limited, a Payments Services Provider registered in the United Kingdom and regulated by the UK Financial Conduct Authority and located at 1-3 Brixton Road, London SW9 6DE in the United Kingdom.

Founded in 2014, Bitplus is a Bitcoin exchange service and ATM network domiciled in Czechia, provided by WBTCB. They offer buying and selling of Bitcoin, Ethereum and gold up to CZK25,000 without registration. The limit at Bitplus after proving the origin of the funds, is up to CZK 2,500,000 per day. Cash can be deposited or withdrawn at 300+ checkouts in the GECO store network or Bitcoin ATMs throughout Czechia. They offer a mobile application for users to download on both Google Play and The Apple App Store.IP wBTCb Solutions, s.r.o. is registered at Svedska 19, Prague 5, 150 00, Czechia, with Company ID: 03058417, data box ID: dkvixk7, and registered at the Commercial Register under the file number C 291104 at the Municipal Court in Prague. They do not disclose what laws they are governed by at this time.They are partnered with Bitperia, Expobank, Fintech, FXStreet and Ceska Fintech Associates. They also have an exclusive merger with Expobank CZ allowing investors to buy and sell BTC in a current bank account (NEO account). Currently they have a social media presence on LinkedIn and Facebook.

PA BPoint Inc (Bitpoint), headquartered in Panama, is an extended crypto exchange in Latin America. They allow users to buy, sell, and trade the main nine crypto assets of the market with local currency and USD, becoming an on-ramp and off-ramp crypto platform.Any dispute between the parties will be governed by their terms and the laws of Panama.Bitpoint Panama operates the platform in Panama, while Bitpoint Panama INC is in control of data for the users outside of Panama and acts as the hub operations for Latin America.

BitRoyal is a cryptocurrency exchange and trading platform supporting fiat currency (i.e. EUR, USD, GBP). The Badger Technology Company Limited (Bitso), founded January 4, 2014, is a cryptocurrency exchange that allows users to deposit, trade, and withdraw their funds. Bitso is incorporated in Gibraltar. Their terms are governed by the laws of Gibraltar. Any disputes will be settled by the exclusive jurisdiction of the courts of Gibraltar.Prohibited Jurisdictions include: Afghanistan, Belarus, Bosnia and Herzegovina, Burundi, Central African Republic, China, Cuba, Democratic People's Republic of Korea (DPRK), Democratic Republic of Congo, Ethiopia, Guinea, Guinea Bissau, Iran, Iraq, Kosovo, Lebanon, Libya, Macedonia, Mali, Montenegro, Myanmar (Burma), Nicaragua, Russia, Serbia, Somalia, South Sudan, Sudan, Syria, Ukraine, United States of America, Venezuela, Yemen, and Zimbabwe.Their cryptocurrencies include: Bitcoin, Ethereum, Litecoin, Solana, Polkadot, Uniswap, Matic Token, XRP, Dogecoin, Gala, Shiba Inu, and more. For a full list, see link: https://bitso.com/They have social media presence on Twitter, Facebook, and Linkedin.

Founded in 2013 and headquartered in Israel, Bits of Gold Ltd. is a private company engaged in cryptocurrencies trading and brokerage. They offer buying and selling services of Bitcoin and Ethereum in exchange for ILS, USD and EUR via bank transfers, cash and credit cards. They also offer an affiliate marketing program.Bits of Gold is partnered with Leumi Bank, Bitcoin Embassy, the Bitcoin Association,Edge, Simplex, Changelly, Mycelium, and StormGain. Their Terms and Conditions is governed by the laws of Israel. The courts of Tel Aviv, Israel has exclusive jurisdiction regarding disputes.They also have a social media presence on Twitter, Facebook, and Linkedin.

Bitstamp Limited (Bitstamp), founded in 2011 and headquartered in England and Wales, is a cryptocurrency exchange that allows users to buy, sell and trade different cryptocurrencies. Bitstamp offers users to buy cryptocurrencies, using fiat currencies such as USD and EUR.They offer cryptocurrency coins: BTC, ETH, USDT, USD Coin, XRP, Solana, Polkadot, Shiba Inu, Polygon, Avalanche, Uniswap, Litecoin, and more. They also offer tokens: Nexo, Loopring, 1inch, Gala, yearn.finance, Kyber Network, Celsius Network, Ethereum Name Service, Immutable X, and more. For a full list of coins and tokens, see the following link: https://www.bitstamp.net/markets/ Bitstamp operates under a payment institution license in the EU and is present in over 100 countries, with offices in UK, Luxembourg, and the USA.Their terms are governed by the laws of England and Wales. Any disputes will be settled in the exclusive jurisdiction of the courts of England and Wales.They have social media presence on Twitter, Facebook, and Linkedin.

Bittastic provides hundreds of token & futures trading pairs to help traders to optimize their strategy. Their BTC futures trade has nearly $1.5B of volume daily.

Bittrex, Inc. (Bittrex Global), founded in 2014 and headquartered in the United States, is a cryptocurrency exchange that offers users to buy, sell, and trade BTC, ETH, USDT, Ethereum, TrueUSD, Dogecoin, Litecoin, Nexus, Polygon, Uniswap, TRX, Polkadot, and more. For a full list, see the link below: https://bittrex.com/home/marketsTheir terms are governed by the laws of the State of Washington. Any disputes will be settled by the exclusive jurisdiction of the federal and state courts in King County, Washington.Jurisdictions that are embargoed by the United States: Iran, Cuba, North Korea, Syria, and the Crimea region of Ukraine, and sanctions blocked by the United States, are restricted from their services.They were formally Bittrex Global GmbH, domiciled and subpoenable in Liechtenstein, changed their legal name to Bittrex Inc. and new URL: https://bittrex.com/ They have social media presence on Twitter, Facebook, and Linkedin.

Bittylicious is a cryptocurrency exchange established in 2013. They support many different cryptocurrencies such as Bitcoin, Ethereum, Litecoin, Dogecoin, Dash, DigiByte, and Groestlcoin (GRS) a coin proclaiming itself multi-platform, SEGWIT, TAPROOT and Lightning Network ready.Services are provided by Bittylicious Limited, a company registered and domiciled in The Isle of Man with company number 134003C and registered with the Isle of Man Financial Services Authority as a Designated Business. BitUBU is a cryptocurrency trading platform that is headquartered in Turkey. On this platform, users can trade the cryptocurrency like Bitcoin, Bitcoin Cash, Dash, Ethereum, Litecoin, and more.BitUBU's legal name is BITUBU Technological Anonymous Company. They are located in the Sancaktepe District of Istanbul Province, Abdurrahmangazi District, Ebubekir Street, No:26 D:2. They are subpoenable in Turkey. They have a social media presence on Twitter and Facebook. The platform's native token is known as $UBU Token. The token runs on the Ethereum blockchain and users can earn rewards by staking the token.

Bitvavo is a cryptocurrency exchange from the Netherlands that launched in 2018. Services are provided by Bitvavo B.V., a limited liability company registered at the Dutch Chamber of Commerce (number 68743424), registered with the Dutch Central Bank (DNB) and Bitvavo Custody B.V. a limited liability company incorporated under the Dutch Law and registered with the Dutch Chamber of Commerce (number 80118844).Bitvavo offers its clients 175+ assets, in 27 countries in Europe, which can be traded with eight payment methods including SEPA, Visa, Mastercard, Sofort, etc. They also offer an affiliate partnership where users can receive commissions, starting at 15%, on all trading fees paid by users they have referred.Native Bitvavo E-Tokens are exclusively offered by Bitvavo and could only be used within the Bitvavo platform. They are designed for support and facilitation of user payments. They are automatically issued by Bitvavo upon receipt of a payment in Euro by the "Foundation" on behalf of Bitvavo and without delay with a parity of 1 Bitvavo E-Token = 1 Euro. “Foundation” indicates Stichting Bitvavo Payments, a foundation incorporated under Dutch law (number 69228922) operating exclusively for Bitvavo.They currently have a social media presence on most major platforms including Twitter, LinkedIn, Instagram, and Facebook.

Bitvo Inc. (Bitvo), headquartered in Canada, is a cryptocurrency exchange platform. Facilitates its uses to purchase, sale and trade cryptocurrencies for fiat currencies and crypto-to-crypto transactions. They also offer the Bitvo Cash Card, a Visa debit card that allows its users to spend from their fiat balance at over 2 million ATMs worldwide, or users can make purchases almost anywhere Visa or Plus is accepted.Their agreement is governed by the laws of the Province of Alberta and the laws of Canada. Any disputes will be submitted to the jurisdiction of the courts of the Province of Alberta.Restricted jurisdictions include: Afghanistan, Albania, Bahrain, Barbados, Belarus, Botswana, Burkina Faso, Cambodia, Cayman Islands, Central African Republic, Cuba, Democratic Republic of the Congo, Egypt, Haiti, Iran, Iraq, Israel, Jamaica, Jordan, Kuwait, Lebanon, Libya, Mali, Mauritius, Morocco, Myanmar, Nicaragua, North-Korea, Oman, Pakistan, Panama, Qatar, Russia, Saudi Arabia, Senegal, Somalia, South Sudan, Sudan, Syria, Tunisia, Turkey, Uganda, Ukraine-Crimea Region, United Arab Emirates, Venezuela, Yemen, and Zimbabwe.They have social media presence on Twitter, Facebook, and Linkedin.
