Any disputes will be submitted to the jurisdiction of the courts of the Province of Alberta.Restricted jurisdictions include: Afghanistan, Albania, Bahrain, Barbados, Belarus, Botswana, Burkina Faso, Cambodia, Cayman Islands, Central African Republic, Cuba, Democratic Republic of the Congo, Egypt, Haiti, Iran, Iraq, Israel, Jamaica, Jordan, Kuwait, Lebanon, Libya, Mali, Mauritius, Morocco, Myanmar, Nicaragua, North-Korea, Oman, Pakistan, Panama, Qatar, Russia, Saudi Arabia, Senegal, Somalia, South Sudan, Sudan, Syria, Tunisia, Turkey, Uganda, Ukraine-Crimea Region, United Arab Emirates, Venezuela, Yemen, and Zimbabwe.They have social media presence on Twitter, Facebook, and Linkedin.

BitX allows users to buy, deposit, withdraw and spend various cryptocurrencies. They support Bitcoin, Ether, Litecoin and PAY Token. BitX delivers a platform for crypto-to-fiat conversion, a wallet service and a BitX debit card that users can use to spend their crypto anywhere and withdraw local currencies from ATMs.At the time of this review, 08/10/2022, the app has still not been released on The Apple App Store or on Google Play.There is a complete lack of any legal information on the platform due to the organization not providing a terms and conditions or any other legal policies at this time.Currently they have no presence on any social media platform.

Bity is a platform from Switzerland which allows its customers to easily buy, sell or trade cryptocurrencies . Supports BTC, ETH and USDC, and fiat currencies: EUR, CHF (Swiss Francs). Bity has three types of customer ID levels: Standard: Daily limit: 1,000 CHF-Annual volume limit: 100K CHF. Required info: a telephone number and an email (transfers to unverified public addresses not accepted). Advanced: Annual volume limit 100K+ CHF. Required info: ID, recent photo, proof of residence, first payment made via a bank account, Bity registration form. Expert: Limit per transaction: 500K CHF, annual volume: None. Required info: Proof of origin of funds from a tax declaration, income, bank statement etc.Bity is owned and operated by Bity SA. Applicable law: Switzerland.

BL3P is a trading platform that enables its users to buy and sell cryptocurrencies as well as withdraw and deposit both euros and cryptocurrencies. Predominantly supports BTC. BL3P is a product of Bitonic, an experienced Bitcoin company founded in 2012 as the first Bitcoin-company in the Netherlands. BL3P is available in all European countries and proclaims itself as the only cryptocurrency exchange based in the Netherlands that holds Dutch bank accounts to process euro transactions. It also has applied for a license at the DNB (Dutch Central Bank). BL3P is developed and maintained by "Bitonic B.V.". Applicable law: Dutch.In a bold move, Bitonic objected and a Dutch court has ruled in favor of Bitonic in April 2021, stating it no longer needs to fulfill crypto wallet-verification requirements implemented by the De Nederlandsche Bank (DNB), the central bank of the Netherlands, reversing earlier DNB requirement to verify the destination and originator's wallets for all transactions. The Dutch Central Bank has increased flexibility towards crypto-serivce providers, which must continue screening transactions, but are allowed to assess for themselves which transactions impose a high risk, such as money laundering, thus it will no longer be necessary to conduct the same intensive check for each transaction as previously required. https://www.coindesk.com/markets/2021/05/20/dutch-court-rules-bitonic-no-longer-requires-crypto-wallet-verification/ and https://www.lexology.com/library/detail.aspx?g=3384d144-dfc7-4010-853d-3027fc480a24

Founded in 2011, Blockchain.com is a cryptocurrency exchange that supports the buying, selling, and trading of various cryptocurrencies. They also offer a Blockchain.com explorer and a non-custodial, private key wallet. The Blockchain.com explorer allows users to navigate the Bitcoin, Ethereum, and Bitcoin Cash blockchains for balances and transactions.Currently the supported currencies, which can be received to, sent from, stored in, bought, sold, and swapped in the Blockchain.com wallet are: Bitcoin, Bitcoin Cash, Ether, Stellar, USD Digital (previously referred to as USD PAX), Tether, Aave, and YFI. The Blockchain.com Wallet also currently supports Polkadot (DOT) and Algorand (ALGO) for buying, selling, swapping, and storing within the wallet's trading account. Services on the platform are provided by different entities depending on what country the users are residents. The private key wallet is provided by Blockchain Access (Ireland) Limited for all users and all rewards are provided by Blockchain.com (BVI) Limited. The website, trading account, and exchange are provided by Blockchain (LT), UAB for all UK, EEA, or Switzerland Residents, by Blockchain.com, Inc. for US residents, Blockchain.com (BVI) II Limited for Latam residents, and Blockchain (LT), UAB for residents of the rest of the world.Any disputes shall be settled by arbitration. The arbitration will be conducted by a single, neutral JAMS arbitrator mutually agreed upon by the parties and shall take place in the United States.Blockchain.com announced in June, 2021 that it has moved its U.S. headquarters from New York City to Miami, as part of Blockchain.com's aggressive efforts to scale. The new address is not found anywhere online. https://www.prnewswire.com/news-releases/crypto-company-blockchaincom-moves-us-headquarters-to-miami-301304969.htmlBLockchain.com announced on 03/22/2022, that they have acquired Altonomy to expand their OTC network. They state only Altonomy’s OTC desk was transferred and Altonomy will now focus on venture investments and proprietary trading. More on this can be found in the articles below: https://www.finextra.com/pressarticle/91984/blockchaincom-acquires-otc-trading-and-executions-business-of-singapore-based-altonomyhttps://www.coindesk.com/business/2022/03/21/crypto-exchange-blockchaincom-acquires-altonomys-otc-deskhttps://www.financemagnates.com/cryptocurrency/news/blockchaincom-acquires-altonomy-to-accelerate-institutional-growthCurrently they have a social media presence on Twitter, Facebook, and LinkedIn.

About Blockchain.comFounded in 2011, Blockchain.com is one of the oldest cryptocurrency platforms, offering a variety of services:Blockchain.com explorer: Allows users to navigate the Bitcoin, Ethereum, and Bitcoin Cash blockchains for balances and transactions. It also provided interesting charts, graphs and statistics regarding Bitcoin supply, average block size, hash rate etc. Blockchain.com exchange: Offers its users the ability to purchase and sell Virtual Currency for other Virtual Currency or fiat currency. Blockchain.com exchange is presently ranked #31 in terms of volume. https://coinmarketcap.com/rankings/exchanges/,Claiming to have over 31 million verified clients in over 200 countries. https://www.cnbc.com/2021/03/24/blockchain-com-rides-bitcoin-mania-to-a-5-2-billion-valuation.htmlCurrently the supported currencies, which can be received to, sent from, stored in, bought, sold, and swapped in the Blockchain.com Wallet, are: bitcoin (BTC), bitcoin cash (BCH), ether (ETH), stellar (XLM), USD Digital (USD-D), which was previously referred to as USD PAX, Tether (USDT), Aave, and YFI. The Blockchain.com Wallet also currently supports Polkadot (DOT) and Algorand (ALGO) for buying, selling, swapping, and storing within the wallet's Trading Account. https://support.blockchain.com/hc/en-us/articles/115005883426-What-currencies-are-supported-in-the-Blockchain-com-Wallet-Services for the exchange are provided exclusively by Blockchain Access UK Ltd.(for users living outside the United States) a company registered in England and Wales under registration 11337627. Applicable law: London, England and English Law if you live outside of the United States. State of New York (via arbitration) if you live in the United States Blockchain.com wallet: The wallet is provided exclusively by Blockchain Luxembourg S.A. a Luxembourg company whose primary business is the publication of open-source downloadable wallet software, which is capable of supporting certain Virtual Currencies. The wallet is generally made available on a non-custodial basis enabling users to self-custody their Virtual Currency. When creating a non-custodial wallet, the user is responsible to store and backup all wallet credentials, including passphrases, identifiers, backup phrases, private keys, otherwise may lose access to the funds. Any Virtual Currency purchased using fiat currency in the Wallet will be held in the Trading Wallet (exclusively provided by Blockchain Access UK Ltd.), held on trust by Blockchain.com for your benefit on a custodial basis. The trading wallet supports USD, GBP, EUR. Blockchain.com institutional custody, and over-the-counter trading services: services are offered by Blockchain Access UK Ltd, a UK company whose primary business is the custody and exchange of virtual currencies.Blockchain.com announced in June, 2021 that it has moved its U.S. headquarters from New York City to Miami, as part of Blockchain.com's aggressive efforts to scale. https://www.prnewswire.com/news-releases/crypto-company-blockchaincom-moves-us-headquarters-to-miami-301304969.htmlCEO Peter Smith

With BlockFi Trading you can buy, sell, and trade a variety of cryptoassets at competitive prices and store them in one convenient place. Proclaims to have 1M+ clients and $10B+ in assets and is backed by industry-leading investors including Valar Ventures, Morgan Creek Capital Management, Coinbase Ventures, Galaxy Digital, Susquehanna Government Products, Winklevoss Capital, and more. Provides API rates for 19 cryptocurrencies.If you are a US resident, services are provided by BlockFi, Inc., a Delaware corporation. BlockFi Inc., is registered with the U.S. Department of Treasury Financial Crimes Enforcement Network (“FinCEN”) as a money services business and holds a number of licenses in the United States. Governing law: State of New Jersey, USA. If you are a resident outside the United States, services are provided by and BlockFi International Ltd., a Bermuda exempted company. Governing law: Bermuda. BlockFi International Ltd. holds a Class F digital assets business license under the Digital Assets Business Act, 2018 (as amended) and is licensed by the Bermuda Monetary Authority to conduct the following digital assets business activities: (i) issuing, selling or redeeming virtual coins, tokens or any other form of digital assets (ii) operating as a digital asset exchange (iii) providing custodial wallet services (iv) operating as a digital asset derivative exchange provider and (v) operating as a digital assets services vendor.BlockFi Interest Accounts (BIA) have not been registered under the Securities Act of 1933 and may not be offered or sold in the United States, to U.S. persons, for the account or benefit of a U.S. person or in any jurisdiction in which such offer would be prohibited. As of February 14, 2022, the BlockFi Interest Account (BIA) is no longer available to new clients who are US persons or persons located in the US and existing US clients with BIA accounts are unable to transfer new assets to their BIAs.

Blocktrade is a Europe based digital assets exchange that allows you to buy, store, and sell Bitcoin, Ethereum and other crypto-assets while being able to deposit funds through bank transfers, wire transfers, or digital currencies.A current list of all non-supported countries/states can be found here: https://support.blocktrade.com/support/solutions/articles/36000183676-countries-blocktrade-does-not-operate-inFintech Operations OÜ (FinOps) distributes the electronic money for Blocktrade. They are issued by UAB PayrNet, a company incorporated in Lithuania (company number: 305264430) with its registered office at Giruliu str. 20, 12123 Vilnius, Lithuania. UAB PayrNet is an Electronic Money Institution (“EMI”) and are authorized by the Bank of Lithuania under license number 72 (LB001994), issued on 28 August 2020.

BrasilBitcoin is a cryptocurrency exchange domiciled in Brazil. They offer buying, selling, and exchanging of many popular cryptocurrencies including Bitcoin, Bitcoin Cash, Ethereum, Litecoin, USD Tether, Dogecoin, Ripple, and many more. They also offer a debit card, OTC trading, and an affiliate program where users can earn a percentage of the fees collected from the users they refer.They offer a mobile application that is available on Google Play and the Apple App Store. They also currently have a presence on most social media platforms including Twitter, LinkedIn, Facebook, Instagram and Discord.

LegalName: BRAZILIEX INTERMEDIAÇÃO DE EmpresCIOS LTDA ME
OrgNotes: Braziliex is a cryptocurrency exchange to buy/sell cryptocurrencies. Founded in May 2017, Braziliex is operating in Brazil. Services are provided by “BRAZILIEX INTERMEDIAÇÃO DE NEGÓCIOS LTDA-ME”, a company incorporated and registered under the laws of the Federal Republic of Brazil, registered with the CNPJ (Cadastro Nacional de Pessoas Jurídicas) under No. 27.433.963/0001-35. Applicable law: Brazil. Supported currencies: BTC, ETH, Ripple, Monero and 21 other digital currencies. BRZX Token is the native on the Braziliex exchange, associated with privileges and discounts for its holders.Braziliex has recently announced (May 2021) that it is closing its operations, asking its customers to withdraw their crypto and Brazilian Reals.

BTCBIT Sp. z.o.o. (BTCBit.net), incorporated in the Republic of Poland, is a cryptocurrency exchange. The BTCBIT OU office is located in Estonia.BTCBIT provides a platform to buy and sell various cryptocurrencies including Bitcoin, Ethereum, Litecoin, Ripple, Dash, Bitcoin Cash, Ethereum Classic, Zcash, Stellar/Lumen and Cardano.They offer encryption, on-site real-time market data, and a cold storage policy for transaction processing.All rules are governed by the laws of the Polish Republic and the Russian version of the terms.BTCBIT does not provide services to: Albania, Algeria, Barbados, Bahamas, Benin, Bolivia, Botswana, Burkina Faso, Cambodia, Cameroon, Cayman Islands, Central African Republic, Chad, China, Congo, Crimea, Cuba, Democratic Republic of the Congo, Democratic People’s Republic of Korea, Ecuador, Ethiopia, Ghana, Iran, Iraq, Islamic Republic of Afghanistan, Japan, Jamaica, Kenya, Kuwait, Lebanon, Libya, Mali, Mozambique, Myanmar, Nepal, Nicaragua, Pakistan, Panama, Rwanda, Senegal, Somalia, South Sudan, State of Palestine, Sudan, Syria, Tanzania, Togo, Uganda, Venezuela, Yemen, Zambia, Zimbabwe, Pridnestrovian Moldavian Republic, Donetsk Oblast (Ukraine), Luhansk Oblast (Ukraine), United States of America from the following states: New York (NY), Georgia (GA), Connecticut (CT), New Mexico (NM), Washington (WA), Hawaii (HI), Vermont (VT), Texas (TX), and Nevada (NV).

Founded on March 6, 2014 and headquartered in Japan, BTC Box Co., Ltd. (BtcBox) is a Japanese multi-cryptocurrency exchange where users can buy BTC, LTC, Ether, and BCH. Trading Fees range from 0.05% to 0.1% depending on the coins being traded. BTCBOX accepts JPY deposits and withdrawals.Their terms are governed by the laws of Japan. Any disputes will be settled at the exclusive jurisdiction of the Tokyo District Court.They have social media presence on Twitter, Facebook and Twitter.

Founded in 2013, BTCDirect supports BTC, LTC, ETH, BCH, XRP and fiat transactions via third party payment/card providers (Visa, MasterCard, Giropay, Sofort and bank transfers. They offer buying and selling of cryptocurrencies. Users are able to connect their own preffered type of wallet or the wallet provided. They also offer an affiliate program with referral rewards. For each purchase or sale that a referral makes on their platform, affiliates receive 0.5% of the amount in question.BTC Direct is both domiciled and subpoenable in The Netherlands. They have a presence on all social media platforms.Services are provided by BTC Direct Europe B.V, a private company under Dutch law, located in Nijumegen and registered with the Chamber of Commerce under no. 59383607, and registered with the Dutch Central Bank (De Nederlandsche Bank N.V. or DNB) as a provider of crypto services. Residents or citizens of the United States of America are prohibited from using the services of this platform. The Stichting derdengelden BTC Direct, on behalf of BTC Direct, is responsible for the management of User's E-Money Credits and cryptocurrencies.

LegalName: Eliptik Yazilim ve Ticaret Anonim Sirketi
OrgNotes: Founded on July 1, 2013 and headquartered in Turkey, BTCTurk is a cryptocurrency exchange that offers buying and selling Bitcoin. Their platform is protected by a system security method and is constantly subject to the audit of international independent audit companies. Users can buy and sell Bitcoin 24/7 with Turkish lira, and withdraw Turkish lira to their bank accounts in Turkey or to their wallets connected to contracted payment institutions at any time. BTCTurk only serves citizens of the Republic of Turkey.Their agreement is governed by the laws of Turkey. Any disputes will be settled in the exclusive jurisdiction of the Istanbul Courts.They currently have a social media presence on Facebook, LinkedIn, Twitter, and Instagram.

Goobit AB (BTCX), founded in January of 2012 and headquartered in Sweden, is a cryptocurrency exchange. They support BTC and ETH, which can be bought and sold for fiat currencies: SEK (Swedish Krona) and EUR.Their Terms are governed by the laws of Sweden. Any disputes will be settled by a Swedish court.They have social media presence on Twitter, Facebook and Linkedin.

BTSE is a trading platform supporting various cryptocurrencies that allows users to sell, buy, or trade cryptocurrencies. Cryptocurrencies supported on this platform include Bitcoin, Ethereum, Litecoin, Monero, Ripple, and more. Users could also exchange between fiat and crypto. Fiat currencies that are exchangeable include $USD, $JPY, $EUR, $GPB, $HKD, $AUD, $CAD and more.Users who are citizens or nationals or residents in these countries cannot use their services: United States of America, Belarus, Cuba, Eritrea, Iran, North Korea, Syria, Singapore, Taiwan and Venezuela.Services are provided via "BTSE Holdings Limited", a company located in the British Virgin Islands with registration number 2023577. BTSE Holding Limited owns and operates the BTSE VFA Exchange Platform. Applicable law: British Virgin Islands. US nationals or residents are prohibited from accessing BTSE exchange. The British Virgin Islands is not on the FATF List of Countries that have been identified as having strategic AML deficiencies and there are no international sanctions currently in force against this country https://www.knowyourcountry.com/bvi1111.BTSE Payment Services Provider (Registration No.: 814678) for which no licensing information appears available under the Department of Economic Development, Government of Dubai Research also reveals that BTCE Exchange Ltd has been registered in Malta (registration nr C89132), however, status appears struck-off effective April 2021 https://registry.mbr.mt/ROC/index.jsp#/ROC/companiesReport.do?action=companyDetails&fKey=62f4f478-819a-45df-96b5-927c0b732144In addition, research reveals a similar company name in the UK company registry "BTSE HOLDINGS LIMITED", with registration number 12866732, located in London. It is not clear how the UK company is related to the BTSE exchange as it does not appear on the website, however, it appears to have missed the deadline for providing confirmation statement to the British authorities (https://find-and-update.company-information.service.gov.uk/company/12866732). The platform has its native ‘BTSE' (ERC20) token, designed to augment the user experience on the BTSE exchange and within the BTSE ecosystem. BTSE proclaims itself as being the first exchange token running on Liquid, a Bitcoin sidechain-based settlement network for traders and exchanges (https://www.btse.com/en/token/).BTSE is domiciled in British Virgin Islands and subpoenable in Singapore. They have a social media presence on Twitter, LinkedIn and Facebook.
Originally known as DoveWallet, BTX gives users the ability to purchase cryptocurrency, trade, and provides a wallet for them to store all their funds. BTX does business as MPH Corporation.

SurBTC SpA (Buda.com), founded in 2015, is a platform that allows users to buy, sell, save, receive payments, and transfer cryptocurrencies.Buda.com is headquartered in Chile, with other locations in Colombia, Peru and Argentina. Their terms stipulate that their laws are regulated by the jurisdictions of where BUDA.com operates as an incorporated company.Depending on the country, services are provided by SurBTC SpA in Chile, SurBTX SAA in Colombia and SurBTC SA in Peru. They do allow citizens and residents of the United States to use their services.Bitcoin, Ethereum, Litecoin, and other cryptocurrencies are offered.They offer crypto to fiat supporting CLP (Chilean Peso), COP (Colombian Peso), PEN (Peruvian Sol) or ARS (Argentine Peso).They have social media presence on Twitter and Linkedin.In Aug 2021, Buda exchange reportedly started requesting selfie verification for withdrawals to new Bitcoin addresses https://news.bitcoin.com/buda-exchange-starts-requesting-selfie-verification-for-withdrawals-to-new-bitcoin-addresses/ In August 2021, the National Bank of Bogota reportedly will admit transactions from the Buda.com platform https://www.cryptopolitan.com/bogota-bank-and-buda-crypto-services/ Chile, Peru and Colombia are not in the FATFs list of countries identified as having strategic AML deficiencies https://www.knowyourcountry.com/chile1111,https://www.knowyourcountry.com/peru1111 and https://www.knowyourcountry.com/colombia1111

BuenBit is a cryptocurrency trading platform operating in Argentina, Mexico, and Peru. Depending on the country selection, users are redirected to the platform’s country-specific website.BuenBit Argentina: Supports deposits/withdrawals of: Bitcoin, Ethereum, DAI, BUSD, USDC or USDT and customers can exchange pesos, dollars or DAI for other cryptocurrencies.BuenBit Peru: Supports deposits/withdrawals of: Bitcoin, Ethereum, DAI, BUSD, USDC or USDT. Customers may also deposit soles and dollars by using their bank account.BuenBit Mexico: Supports deposits/withdrawals of: Bitcoin, Ethereum, DAI, BUSD, USDC or USDT. Exchanges may be made for other coins using DAI.Loans and Prepaid Cards are accessible for Argentine users only. Prepaid cards are supported by Mastercard and customers can use them for purchases made in pesos; BuenBit will then refund them 2% in cryptocurrencies. https://productos.buenbit.com/tarjeta-buenbit?_ga=2.44909216.520019908.1635436233-745090333.1635436233Argentine and Peru users have access to their account through either the Web or an App that can be downloaded on Android or iOS. The website for account log-in can be found here: https://app.buenbit.comServices are provided via Fiat Flow Solutions Ltd., a company incorporated in the United Kingdom in 2019 with registration number 11939140. According to the Companies House website, on November 30, 2021 the physical address of this company was changed to 100 Avebury Boulevard, Milton Keynes, United Kingdom, MK9 1FH (not to take affect until December 14, 2021). https://find-and-update.company-information.service.gov.uk/company/11939140BuenBit has a social media presence on Twitter, Facebook, and Linkedin

BUX Crypto is a crypto exchange and investment platform that offers users the simplicity to buy, sell, and trade cryptocurrency.Their platform allows users to buy crypto with a credit card in $EUR. Popular cryptocurrencies like Bitcoin, Bitcoin Cash, Ethereum, Ripple, and Chainlink are supported on this platform. The platform has their own native token, $BUX and its main benefit is it allows users to trade commission free.The company is subpoenable in the Netherlands. Currently, they have social media presence on Twitter.

BuyABitcoin's goal is to become known as the major supplier of Bitcoin in Australia. Therefore, their main focus lies on a secure provision of bitcoins, transparency and accessibility. They suppoprt the purchase of BTC and BSV. Clients may use payment methods such as Visa and Mastercard however the exchange does only support fiat AUD.Buyabitcoin.com.au is a wholly Australian owned and operated company based in the heart of Melbourne, Australia. They are governed by the applicable laws of Victoria, Australia. They currently have a social media presence on Twitter and Facebook, as well as a Youtube Channel.

Buyex is a cryptocurrency exchange from Estonia, which enables its users to store, purchase, withdraw and exchange virtual currency that can be accessed through the platform. Buyex supports Bitcoin, Ethereum,, Bitcoin Cash, Litecoin, BSV, USD Tether and EURS (a Euro-pegged stablecoin) at this time. They do accept Visa and Mastercard payments for the purchase of cryptocurrencies as well. At the time of this review (04/24/2022) an announcement on the platform appears that Buyex services are on sale.Services are provided by Buyer Exchanger OÜ, a limited liability company registered in Estonia, registration number 14552708, with the following licenses: FVT000213 to provide virtual currency services, , FIU000354 to provide trust management and corporate services and FFA000376 to operate as a financial institution. Buyex is governed by the applicable laws of Estonia.Services are not available in all countries at this time, however the site does not state that any countries are restricted.Countries that are currently supported can be viewed here:https://buyex.exchange/legal/countriesTo register an account on Buyex, the user will need to provide their full legal name, date of birth, residential address, valid identification document, proof or residence, payment method information, as well as proof of the source of the funds involved in a transaction.Currently Buyex has a social media presence on Twitter, LinkedIn, and Facebook but no others are indicated.

Founded in July 2016 and headquartered in India, I Block Technologies Private limited (BuyUcoin) is a cryptocurrency exchange and blockchain wallet. They offer users the option to buy, sell, store digital currencies, P2P transfers (send-receive) and use digital currencies for purchasing goods. Prices are all denominated in Indian Rupees (INR).Their terms are governed by the laws of India. Any disputes will be submitted to the exclusive jurisdiction of the Courts in Noida (Uttar Pradesh).They have social media presence on Twitter, Facebook, and Linkedin.

BX.in.th has been a Thailand-based exchange by Bitcoin Co. Ltd., a company that has been providing services Bitcoin and other cryptocurrencies, such as Ethereum, Ripple, and ICO tokens, since 2013. Bitcoin Co. Ltd. has decided to discontinue offering digital exchange services and wallet services as of Sept 2019, in order to focus on other business opportunities.https://www.cryptocompare.com/exchanges/bxinth/overviewThe company will not seek to hold a Securities and Exchange Commission [SEC] licence for digital asset exchanges for 2020, and we ask all customers to withdraw their funds before Nov 1, 2019," Bitcoin Co said on its website. https://www.bangkokpost.com/business/1741419/bx-to-stop-services-at-months-endWebsite https://bx.in.th appears no longer operational.

Byte Power X Pty Ltd (BPX) is an Australian fintech company, incorporated on February 15, 2018. The company operates a utility cryptocurrency exchange in Australia which commenced trading in January of 2019. Byte Power X is 100% fully owned subsidiary of a public company "Byte Power Group Limited" (BPG) listed on the Australian Stock Exchange (ASX).Their terms are governed by the laws of Australia. Any disputes will be submitted to the courts of Queensland, Australia.Just before Christmas 2019, Byte Power Group was suspended from trading its shares by the ASX. Read more at: https://www.asx.com.au/asxpdf/20191001/pdf/449304r0yfzkvq.pdfThey have a social media presence on Twitter, LinkedIn, and Facebook.

C-Patex is a cryptocurrency exchange in Patagonia, Argentina launched in 2017. C-Patex is owned by company "Cripto Patagonia S.A', which is approved by the authorities in 2019 and registered with the Argentine federal tax agency AFIP with the number of CUIT 30-71641341-8. C-Patex is a business unit of MAG Sistemas. Patex Shares (PATS) were issued and offered as an investment opportunity, representing 40% of C-Patex's fee income. PatexShares (PATS) were converted in an ERC20 token (most likely to be considered security tokens) https://etherscan.io/token/0x3310f5acb5df71da3b15a27230122bfbf3f7b9a0In Argentina, crypto-assets are not prohibited nor heavily regulated. No legal framework has been enacted regarding cryptocurrency, there are only some very specific regulations mostly related to reporting and tax regimes. However, two bills were recently introduced before the Argentine Congress, which intend to institutionalize and regulate crypto-assets in Argentina. https://www.dentons.com/en/insights/articles/2021/may/28/the-joint-statement-of-the-argentinas-central-bankIn April 2021 Argentinean Central bank asks local banks for information on customers who deal with cryptocurrencies, taking regulation a step forward. https://news.bitcoin.com/argentinean-central-bank-asks-local-banks-for-information-on-customers-who-deal-with-cryptocurrencies/Argentina Authorities in May 2021 asks cryptocurrency exchanges to provide transaction data on a monthly basis. No visible terms and conditions are available on the website. Founder and President: Miguel Angel. https://www.nasdaq.com/articles/argentina-authorities-require-bitcoin-exchanges-to-provide-transaction-data-2021-05-14

Founded in 2017, Calfin Global Crypto Exchange CGCX proclaims itself as the world's first fully insured hybrid trading platform. Unlike most exchanges that offer only cryptocurrency trading, CGCX.io offers multiple services, like Crypto Exchange, Token Listing, Merchant Solutions, and Smart Contracts. Services are provided by CGXC Limited, a company incorporated under Labuan/Malaysia, registered with Labuan Financial Services Authority under registration number LL15388. Applicable law: Labuan/Malaysia. Citizens or residents of the People’s Republic of China, United States of America, Canada, Malaysia (excluding Labuan) among others, are not eligible to use the services of this platform. CGX is Calfin Global Crypto Exchange's native token. CGX is an Ethereum based ERC20 token, associated with benefits and discounts for its users. CEO: Anandh Swami

Capital.com is headquartered and subpoenable in Cyprus. Countries restricted from services include: USA, Canada, Japan, Turkey, Belgium, Pakistan, Iraq, Iran, DPRK, Mainland China, Palestine, Afghanistan, Syria, Somali, Botswana, Bahamas, Ethiopia, Ghana, Sri Lanka, Serbia, Tunisia, Trinidad and Tobago,United States Minor Outlying Islands, Yemen. Spain, Portugal (accepted with limitations, you can find more information in Legal).Capital.com benefits included: With more than 70 technical analysis indicators — from Bollinger bands to Ichimoku cloud — and extensive drawing tools, you can better calculate your potential trading opportunity.Harness your inner trader with deep insights and analysis. Get free trading education with handy trading courses, info-rich trading videos, trading webinars by industry experts and an easy-to-understand glossary of terms.Hedging mode is available: go long or short in the same market. It’s that simple. The AI-enabled technology that powers our platform isn’t just unique – it’s award-winning

Cardbit allows users to purchase Bitcoin with credit cards and SEPA transfers. They also offer their users a prepaid Visa card that is connected to a EU bank account. They offer many withdrawal options including, wire transfers and debit or credit card.Cardbit is owned and operated by PayDelta Limited. They are governed by the applicable laws of Cyprus. They do restrict the residents of Cuba, Ethiopia, Iran, Iraq, Korea, Syria, Sudan, Yemen, Bosnia and Herzegovina, Uganda, Vanatu, Crimea, Japan, Iceland, and Lebanon. There is no mobile application available for download at this time. Currently they only have a social media presence on Facebook and Instagram.

CashCoin is an ATM network that allows users to purchase Bitcoin with cash in Belgium. They accept Bank transfers for deposits and also allow users to redeem vouchers for crypto.The organization does not offer a terms and conditions or any other legal policies, so it is unclear what laws they are governed by at this time.Currently they have no presence on any social media platforms.

As of the review done on August 30,2022, the company and website have changed to Moneybase Ltd (Moneybase), headquartered in Malta, is a digital payments app that offers all financial service needs. CCTrader has changed Moneybase Invest, creating part of the Moneybase ecosystem, with a variety of investments.Calamatta Cuschieri Investment Services Ltd., headquartered at the same location, is a sister company that offers investment services for Moneybase.Their terms are governed by the laws of Malta. Any disputes will be settled in the exclusive jurisdiction of the Maltese Courts.Jira Ticket was sent to change company: AHD-9322Previous Reviews:Calamatta Cuschieri Investment Services Ltd. (CCTrader), headquartered in Malta, is an online multi-asset trading platform that supports instruments available on over 40 international stock exchanges including the US, Canadian, European, Asian and African markets. The platform provides multiple order terms such as limit, market and stop loss orders with user defined validity periods, full cost analysis prior to execution and real time live market prices. CCTrader provides HTML5 charting with over 57 technical analysis tools, price alerts, customized push notifications and more. Also offers fiat-crypto trades in 5 cryptocurrencies: Bitcoin, Ethereum, Litecoin, Ripple and Bitcoin Cash. https://www.cctrader.com/about/In a recent development, the Financial Action Task Force (FATF) has voted to grey list Malta over AML concerns, in a vote taken during a plenary session this afternoon (23 June 2021), which may have an adverse impact on Malta's financial services and banking sectors, as well as on its attractiveness to foreign investment. Governing law: Maltahttps://www.reuters.com/world/europe/malta-says-it-has-been-greylisted-by-financial-crimes-watchdog-2021-06-23/

The platform provides multiple order terms such as limit, market and stop loss orders with user defined validity periods, full cost analysis prior to execution and real time live market prices. CCTrader provides HTML5 charting with over 57 technical analysis tools, price alerts, customized push notifications and more. Also offers fiat-crypto trades in 5 cryptocurrencies: Bitcoin, Ethereum, Litecoin, Ripple and Bitcoin Cash. https://www.cctrader.com/about/In a recent development, the Financial Action Task Force (FATF) has voted to grey list Malta over AML concerns, in a vote taken during a plenary session this afternoon (23 June 2021), which may have an adverse impact on Malta's financial services and banking sectors, as well as on its attractiveness to foreign investment. Governing law: Maltahttps://www.reuters.com/world/europe/malta-says-it-has-been-greylisted-by-financial-crimes-watchdog-2021-06-23/

CLOSEDCentregold is a cryptocurrency exchange from the British Virgin Islands for buying & selling of Bitcoin, Litecoin, and other cryptocurrency, and e-gold. At the time of the review 02 Feb 2022 http://centregold.com is not accessible, thus it is presumed not operational.

Established in 2013 and headquartered in the United Kingdom, Cex.io Ltd (Cex.io) is a cryptocurrency ecosystem and Bitcoin trading platform. They now have a customer base of 4 million, a team of over 250 professionals working in several offices around the world: in the United Kingdom of Great Britain and Northern Ireland, United States of America, Ukraine, Cyprus, and Gibraltar. The platform is collectively managed by CEX.IO LTD, CEX.IO Corp. and CEX.IO Limited.The website, operated and maintained by Cex.io Ltd., is a marketplace for customers who want to instantly buy/sell cryptocurrencies, trade crypto assets, or exchange them with fiat money. Supported cryptocurrencies: Bitcoin, Bitcoin Cash, Ethereum, Ripple, Stellar, Litecoin, Tron and other crypto assets. Fiat currencies supported: USD, EUR, GBP and RUB. Credit cards supported: Visa, Mastercard and wire transfers. Their terms are governed by the laws of the United Kingdom. Any disputes will be submitted to the United Kingdom Court in London.They have social media presence on Twitter, Facebook, and Linkedin.

Founded in 2017, Calfin Global Crypto Exchange (CGCX) offers users the ability to buy, sell, and trade various cryptocurrencies. They also offer wallet services and claim all tokens stored on their exchange wallets are insured against cyber-attacks and hacking. CGCX is the platforms native token.CGCX Limited is domiciled in Malaysia and has additional offices in Singapore and Mauritius. They do not allow residents or citizens of Canada, China, Malaysia, or The United States to utilize any services on the platform. In the event of a dispute, it shall be handled by arbitration attempt informal resolution prior to any demand for arbitration that any arbitration will occur in Labuan, Malaysia.They support Bitcoin, Bitcoin Cash, Ethereum, Litecoin, Chainlink, Tether, Dai, Dash, and CGCX among others.Currently they have a social media presence on Twitter, Facebook, and LinkedIn.

Founded in 2016, Change Invest is a European-based cryptocurrency trading service provider. Supports 30+ cryptocurrencies, physically-backed gold, investments in startups and CFDs which are complex instruments. Proclaims having 70K+ verified users in 30 supported countries. Digital asset services are provided by xChange AS under virtual currency service provider license no FVT000072 issued by Estonian issued by Estonian FIU.CFD Trading service is provided on a cross-border basis by Indexa B.V. (Chamber of Commerce no 50755854, previously Optieclub.nl B.V.) authorised and regulated by the Dutch Authority for the Financial Markets (AFM).Getchange Account and Visa Card is issued by UAB “Finansin?s paslaugos „Contis“ who holds the electronic money institution license no 53, dated 2019-07-23, issued by the Bank of Lithuania.Associated companies: Change Capital – Change Capital OÜ (previously Lion Capital OÜ), is an Estonian private limited company registered under registry code 12899000, which is wholly owned subsidiary of Change Group and the issuer of CAG (ERC20) Tokens. Change Group – Change Group OÜ, an Estonian private limited company registered under registry code 14585955.CNG are the native ERC20 tokens used in the Change Invest exchange associated with benefits and disbursements. Change Bank is an innovative project that aims to be a full-service crypto bank, offering payments with cryptocurrencies. Change Bank plans to develop a crypto-wallet, a crypto debit card and a market place. Change is also involved in the e-Residency Initiative by the Government of Estonia. Change Bank issued an ICO in 2016 and CAG where the issued ERC20 tokens. CAG token holders can swap their tokens with native CNG tokens and back to CAG tokens. This swap will be made via a special purpose vehicle (SPV) named Change Public Investors OÜ, an Estonian private limited company registered under registry code 14780303. Citizens and residents of the USA, Japan (among other countries) are prohibited from participating in the offering and from receiving or acquiring CNG tokens.

Circle Internet Financial, LLC (Circle), launched on 8/12/2013 and headquartered in the United States, is a blockchain-focused financial services and payments. They offer peer-to-peer payments that allow users to hold, send and receive traditional fiat currencies.The Legal name for the main website is stated above, but the legal name for the products, Circle Pay and Circle Invest, is Circle Internet Financial, Inc. They are all domiciled and subpoenable at the same locations.As of August 31,2020, Circle was in the process of shutting down the Circle Pay product. It is no longer possible to create a new Circle Pay account, according to the Circle Pay agreement.Circle launched a stablecoin in 2018 known as USD Coin (USDC), an “ERC-20” digital token that operates on the Ethereum blockchain. Their agreement is governed by the laws of the State of Delaware and United States federal law. Any disputes will be submitted to the exclusive jurisdiction of the courts of Boston, Massachusetts.They have social media presence on Twitter, Facebook and Linkedin.

In regards to citizens of Germany (CMC Markets Germany GmbH), their headquartered and subpoenable in Germany. For countries, such as the United States (CMC Markets UK), they are headquartered and subpoenable in the United Kingdom.They claim to have over 80,000 active clients globally, executing 64.5m spread bet and CFD trades annually (2018-19) on they say their award-winning trading platform and native mobile apps. Their unique proprietary trading platform allows clients to trade FX, indices, commodities, shares and treasuries via CFDs and spread bets (UK & Ireland only). We provide competitive pricing and dedicated 24-hour customer service, whenever the markets are open.Their institutional arm provides bespoke, top-tier liquidity solutions for banks, brokers, funds and trading desks, through our grey and white label, API, Prime FX and Prime Derivatives solutions. Find out more at cmcmarkets.com/en-gb/institutional.At CMC Markets you can open a DPS or CFD trading account as a retail client. Their CFD trading account is available to you as a corporate customer.They specialize in Spread betting, CFD trading, Stockbroking (Australia), FX, Trading Analysis, market expertise, financial services, Forex, market analysis, trading, online trading, Indices, Commodities, MT4, and Professional trader. Their goal is to provide you with the ultimate trading experience. They claim to be passionate about online trading, constantly innovating and looking to improve the way our clients invest in financial markets.

Coex Star is owned and operated by ABA Global Phillipines Inc. They operate a virtual currency exchange platform which is registered in both the Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC) and Bangko Sentral NG Phillipines (BSP). They are governed by all applicable laws of the Phillipines.They support cryptocurrencies such as Bitcoin, Ethereum, Litecoin, TRX, CELO, CUSD, AF1, PAC, CXST, and Tether among others.They are partnered with Amazon, UnionBank, GCOX, NullForge, Celo, IBAPay, IPSCrypto, and WorldWideWeb.Currently they have a social media presence on Twitter, Instagram, and Facebook as well as a YouTube Channel.

GMO Coin, is a Tokyo-based cryptocurrency exchange, subsidiary of the Japanese internet giant GMO. GMO-Z.com Coin changed their company name in 2017 to GMO Coin, and their service Z.com Coin by GMO, which was launched in May 2017 and enables virtual currency FX and virtual currency trading, also changed its service name to GMO Coin. More on this can be found here: https://www.financemagnates.com/cryptocurrency/news/gmo-internet-cryptocurrency-offering-z-com-coin-rebrands-gmo-coinGMO Coin Co. Ltd. has been licensed to issue the first of its kind JPY-Pegged and USD-Pegged stablecoins by the New York Department of Financial Services, which makes GMO one of only 27 companies licensed in New York to engage in virtual currency activities.https://www.coindesk.com/japanese-internet-giant-licensed-jpy-pegged-stablecoin-new-york"GYEN" and "ZUSD" are ERC-20 cryptographic tokens that are issued by GMO Coin Co. Ltd., approved and regulated by the New York State Department of Financial Services, and strictly pegged 1:1 to the Japanese Yen and U.S. Dollar. As an ERC-20 compliant token, GYEN and ZUSD can be transferred on the Ethereum network.GMO Coin Co. Ltd. is governed by the applicable laws of Japan.Currently they have a social media presence on both Facebook and Twitter.

With the spread of the Internet, information can be delivered instantly for free, and it has become a world where anyone can send information.Then, a blockchain called the Internet of Value has appeared.From now on, there will be a world where various transactions such as execution of contracts and transfer of ownership are carried out directly without going through an intermediary.From a world connected by the Internet to a world that operates on a blockchain, which has evolved further.We at Coinage will contribute to the evolution of the Internet by becoming a bridge that connects the blockchain that operates autonomously and shared around the world and the people who participate in the system through cryptocurrency (virtual currency) transactions.

Coinbase was founded in June 2012 by Brian Armstrong and Fred Ehrsam. It enrolled in the summer 2012 Y Combinator startup incubator program. In October 2012, the company launched the services to buy and sell bitcoin through bank transfers.In May 2013, the company received a $5 million Series A investment led by Fred Wilson from the venture capital firm Union Square Ventures. In December 2013, the company received a $25 million investment, from the venture capital firms Andreessen Horowitz, Union Square Ventures and Ribbit Capital.In 2014. the company grew to one million users, acquired the blockchain explorer service Blockr and the web bookmarking company Kippt, secured insurance covering the value of bitcoin stored on their servers, and launched the vault system for secure bitcoin storage. Throughout 2014, the company also formed partnerships with Overstock, Dell, Expedia, Dish Network, Time Inc. and Wikipedia to power accepting bitcoin payments. The company also added bitcoin payment processing capabilities to the traditional payment companies Stripe, Braintree, and PayPal.In January 2015, the company received a $75 million investment, led by Draper Fisher Jurvetson, the New York Stock Exchange, USAA, and several banks, "apparently the first time any traditional financial institutions have taken direct stakes in a bitcoin enterprise." Later in January, the company launched a U.S.-based bitcoin exchange for professional traders called Coinbase Exchange.Coinbase began to offer services in Canada in 2015, but in July 2016 announced it would halt services in August after the closure of their Canadian online payments service provider Vogogo.On 29 March 2016, Coinbase was listed by UK-based company Richtopia at number 2 in the list of 100 Most Influential Blockchain Organisations.In May 2016, the company rebranded the Coinbase Exchange, changing the name to the Global Digital Asset Exchange (GDAX) and offering Ether, the value token of Ethereum, for trade on its professional trading exchange service. In July 2016, they extended the support to their "Coinbase" retail exchange by adding Ether as only the second digital currency offered to retail customers.

The company also added bitcoin payment processing capabilities to the traditional payment companies Stripe, Braintree, and PayPal.In January 2015, the company received a $75 million investment, led by Draper Fisher Jurvetson, the New York Stock Exchange, USAA, and several banks, "apparently the first time any traditional financial institutions have taken direct stakes in a bitcoin enterprise." Later in January, the company launched a U.S.-based bitcoin exchange for professional traders called Coinbase Exchange.Coinbase began to offer services in Canada in 2015, but in July 2016 announced it would halt services in August after the closure of their Canadian online payments service provider Vogogo.On 29 March 2016, Coinbase was listed by UK-based company Richtopia at number 2 in the list of 100 Most Influential Blockchain Organisations.In May 2016, the company rebranded the Coinbase Exchange, changing the name to the Global Digital Asset Exchange (GDAX) and offering Ether, the value token of Ethereum, for trade on its professional trading exchange service. In July 2016, they extended the support to their "Coinbase" retail exchange by adding Ether as only the second digital currency offered to retail customers.

Coinbase Inc. (CoinbasePro), founded in 2012 and headquartered in San Francisco, California, is a cryptocurrency trading platform designed more for intermediate to advanced traders. CoinbasePro traders can buy/sell huge varieties of coins such as bitcoin, ethereum, dogecoin, and more. For users who own USD assets, they are FDIC insured with up to $250,000.Other office locations of Coinbase include: United Kingdom, Germany, Singapore, Japan, Ireland, and Kenya.Their agreement is governed by the laws of the State of California. Any disputes will be submitted to the state or federal courts located in the State of California.In March 2022, Coinbase was dealing with a political controversy when the platform was still allowing Russian crypto traders after Russian troops attacked Ukraine. https://www.thestreet.com/investing/cryptocurrency/coinbase-hit-by-bad-news-and-a-famous-short-seller They have social media presence on Facebook and Linkedin.

Founded in 2017, Coinberry is a centralized cryptocurrency exchange that allows users to buy and sell more than 35 digital assets like Bitcoin, Bitcoin Cash, Dogecoin, Ethereum, and Litecoin. Coinberry is based in Toronto, Canada. Coinberry has institutional grade crypto protection with digital assets protected by Gemini Trust Company LLC., offering $200 million in insurance coverage.Coinberry is federally registered with the Financial Transactions and Reports Analysis Centre of Canada (FINTRAC) as a Money Service Business (MSB). They are required by law to have compliant Know-Your-Customer and Anti-Money Laundering policies in place. Any claim or cause of action arising out of or related to the use of the platform shall be resolved by binding arbitration held in Toronto, Ontario and before a single arbitrator.Coinberry was acquired by WonderFi as of July 4th, 2022. They state that the Coinberry platform will continue to offer services and features. More on this acquisition can be found here: https://www.coinberry.com/post/its-official-coinberry-is-now-part-of-wonderfiCurrently they have a social media presence on LinkedIn, Twitter, and Facebook.

CoinBest is a Japanese cryptocurrency exchange founded in August 2017. On CoinBest, users can participate in crypto trading, crypto lending, and purchase mining machines to mine crypto. The only cryptocurrencies users can buy/sell or trade are Bitcoin, DAI, and ETH. $JPY is the only fiat currency accepted on this platform.CoinBest only allows citizens from Japan to use their exchange.Tosei Hagi is the current CEO and President of CoinBest.

Update November 15, 2021: Coinbit seems to have worked through all legal issues and is back up and running.At time of review (October 20, 2021) The Seoul Metropolitan Police Agency has officially brought charges against the chairman of local crypto exchange, Coinbit and two other unnamed executives for manipulating the digital currency market, local media Newspim reported. The city police are saying that the top exchange executives manipulated the cryptocurrency prices on the exchange from August 2019 to May 2020.https://www.financemagnates.com/cryptocurrency/news/seoul-police-indicted-coinbit-executives-for-market-manipulation/Coinbit is a Korean cryptocurrency exchange operating since July 2018. Supports both fiat-crypto trading and crypto-to-crypto trading. Cryptocurrency prices are denominated in local KRW (Korean Won), while fiat deposits must also be in KRW. Terms of service are available only in the local language (Korean) possibly a language barrier for anyone else wishing to transact. Services are prohibited for US residents. According to regulations that went into effect in March 2021, Korean crypto-exchanges are required to partner with banks to issue real-name account to exchange users. However, the compliance burden on banks has made the traditional financial sector hesitant to partner with exchanges out of fear of sanctions. Only a handful of the top crypto-exchanges in South Korea (Upbit, Bithumb, Coinone and Korbit) have been able to abide by the regulators and secure banking partners. Hundreds of other smaller exchanges operating within Korea face the risk of being shut down. https://news.bitcoin.com/korean-banks-to-be-relieved-of-liability-for-crypto-related-crime-report-suggests/

CoinCafe offers a custodial bitcoin wallet that allows users to store, send and receive bitcoins. They also allow users in New York City to buy in person at their office.CoinCafe Inc. is both domiciled and incorporated in the state of New York. They are registered and regulated under federal law as a Money Services Business with MSB number 31000083560560. They are governed by the applicable laws of the state of New York.Currently, they have a social media presence on both Twitter and Facebook.

CoinCash is a UK based, cryptocurrency brokerage company operating in Hungary and CEE region. A fast evolving cryptocurrency exchange with the most significant market share on the Hungarian market. With over 20 ATMs spreading across the country and providing exchange in over 100 cryptocurrencies online, CoinCash’s clients can rely on a variety of services. Since the year of foundation (2017), CoinCash strives to make their service increasingly simple and accessible through continuous improvement. They form a bridge between two worlds, classical finance and cryptocurrencies with a strong focus on assisting and offering guidance with insightful content to its customers.Coincash is a cryptocurrency exchange. Supports 100+ cryptocurrencies including popular DeFi tokens.Services are provided by Coincash payments Ltd (previously CoinSea Ltd) a company with an address in Hove, England, registration number 10263693.

Founded in 2018, CoinCasso is a cryptocurrency exchange platform through which users can buy and sell cryptocurrencies. The platform supports the buying of crypto via fiat currencies EUR and USD, and storing crypto in its own CCWallet.CCX is the native (ERC20) token used in the CoinCasso exchange, associated with reduced commission for transactions on CoinCasso, even up to 50%, and immediate, unlimited and free transfers between members of the platform. The whitepaper mentions that this exchange was operating since 2018 under Coincasso OÜ, with an Estonian license to provide crypto-fiat services (FVR000340) and a license to provide virtual currency wallet services (FRK000282), with both licenses apparently being archived in July 2020. Terms of service mention that services are provided by "CoinCasso LTD UAB" a company registered in Vilnius, Lithuania with reg number: 305813174. Terms and conditions also state any disputes shall be handled by the laws of Lithuania, and any litigation shall be handled in South Korea. They support Bitcoin, Ethereum, Tether, Chainlink, Serum, BinanceCoin, Uniswap token, Swipe, Uniswap token, and Unibright among other cryptocurrencies.Currently they have a social media presence on Twitter, Facebook, and LinkedIn.

Coincheck is a Bitcoin wallet and Japanese cryptocurrency exchange platform established in 2014. The Coincheck exchange services provide exchanges between fiat currencies and Bitcoin or Ethereum. They also offer OTC trades for users wishing to trade higher volumes.Coincheck is domiciled in Japan and is a member of the Japan Blockchain Association and claims to be one of the major developers of cryptocurrency usage standards for the Japanese government. They are governed by the applicable laws of Japan.Coincheck fell victim to a hacking operation, which is now recognized as one of the largest cryptocurrency exchange hacks. 500 million NEM tokens were stolen from Coincheck in January 2018, amounting to around $520 million in losses. Although all 260,000 users who were victims of the incident were repaid, the Coincheck hack triggered changes in the cryptocurrency industry, more on this can be found here: https://coinmarketcap.com/alexandria/article/coincheck-hack-one-of-the-biggest-crypto-hacks-in-historyCurrently they have a social media presence on Twitter, Facebook, and LinkedIn.

CoinCoinX is a cryptocurrency exchange platform. They offer the ability to buy, sell, trade and exchange various cryptocurrencies, OTC trading, purchasing of gift cards with crypto, payroll for employees with cryptocurrencies, and they also offer financing for mining farms. Their mobile application is available for download on both Google Play and The Apple App Store.CoinCoinX's legal name is "Venecrip, CA"; they are both domiciled and subpeonable in Caracas, Venezuela. Currently they have a social media presence on Twitter, Facebook, Instagram and LinkedIn.

Founded in 2014, CoinCorner is a cryptocurrency exchange that supports users across 45 countries to buy, sell, send, receive and store Bitcoin, Ethereum and Litecoin. They provide a variety of payment methods such as credit/debit cards, bank transfers, SEPA, Neteller and fiat: GBP and EUR. CoinCorner also provides merchant services and helps UK and European businesses to accept Bitcoin payments for goods and services. They also offer the Bolt card, which is a contactless lightning card powered by NFC. Bolt card can be used as a debit card or gift card.Services are provided by CoinCorner Ltd., a company incorporated and domiciled in the Isle of Man under company number 129003C. CoinCorner Ltd is registered with the Isle of Man Financial Services Authority under the Designated Business Act 2015 and with the Isle of Man Office of Fair Trading as a MoneyLender under the Moneylenders Act 1991. CoinCorner Ltd is also a registered EMD Agent (FRN 903018) of Modulr FS Limited, an authorized electronic money institution regulated by the UK Financial Conduct Authority under FRN 900573. Applicable law is that of The Isle of Man. In Oct 2021 CoinCorner acquired Coinfloor's customer base and internet domains (coinfloor.co.uk and coinfloor.com). Coinfloor customers had one month to decide whether to migrate or close their accounts. https://www.nasdaq.com/articles/bitcoin-exchange-coincorner-acquires-customer-base-domains-of-coinfloor-2021-10-04. In July 2021 Danny Scott, CEO at CoinCorner, introduced the “Hoffline” wallet – a fully automated, fully air-gapped Bitcoin hot wallet where the private key is stored completely offline. https://ffnews.com/newsarticle/coincorner-ceo-danny-scott-announces-hoffline-walletCurrently they have a social media presence on Twitter, Instagram, LinkedIn, and Facebook.

CoinDeal is a cryptocurrency exchange claiming to have 400K+ users while being secured by the most advanced SSL standard, incorporated together with Cloudflare security features. Coindeal offers a variety of cryptocurrencies including Bitcoin, Ethereum, Litecoin, and Tether. Services are provided by "CDSV LLC" a company incorporated under laws of St. Vincent and the Grenadines and domiciled in Malta, with registration number 753 LLC 2020. Applicable law is that of St Vincent and the Grenadines. CDL is the native utility token, designed to act as the medium for executing the main services on the Coindeal exchange. Token holders enjoy many benefits such as discounts, access to unique CoinDeal features, and much more. They currently have a social media presence on Twitter, Facebook, and LinkedIn.

As of the review done on 5/3/2022, information has been redacted for privacy, and social media has been removed from company.The User is in or under the control of, or a national or resident of Cuba, Iran, North Korea, Sudan, or Syria or any other country subject to United States embargo, UN sanctions, HM Treasury's financial sanctions regime, or you are on the U.S. Treasury Department's Specially Designated Nationals List or the U.S. Commerce Department's Denied Persons List, Unverified List, HM Treasury's financial sanctions regime, or any other applicable sanctions lists.Coindirect is a cryptocurrency trading platform founded in 2017 claiming to have 320K+ registered users and 40+ cryptocurrency options, including privacy coins Monero and Zcash. Registrations from USA users are not accepted at this time. Services are provided via "WD Global Services Limited", a company located in London, UK with registration number 10976041. Applicable law: England and Wales.For South African customers, Coindirect offers Bitcoin Arbitrage. Automated Bitcoin arbitrage takes advantage of price differences in local and international Bitcoin prices while growing users’ funds and protecting their initial capital (https://www.coindirect.com/arbitrage). Arbitrage services in South Africa are provided via company Coindirect SA (Pty) Ltd (registration number: 2017/654512/ 07).In July 2021, Coindirect partnered with ‘The Pavilions Hotels & Resorts’, to allow guests to pay for hotel bookings with cryptocurrencies. The Pavilions Hotels & Resorts is the first international hotel chain to embrace virtual currency payments. (https://blog.coindirect.com/coindirect-partners-with-the-pavilions-hotels-resorts-to-allow-guests-to-pay-for-hotel-bookings-with-cryptocurrencies/ and https://www.euronews.com/next/2021/08/29/paying-with-cryptocurrencies-these-are-the-major-companies-that-accept-cryptos-as-payment).

Launched in 2017, CoinFalcon is a centralized cryptocurrency exchange from The United Kingdom. They support 20+ cryptocurrencies such as Bitcoin, Ethereum, Litecoin, Bitcoin Cash, Ripple, and Cardano. Mastercard, VISA, and SEPA paymenrts are all supported for buying and selling cryptocurrencies.Services are provided by CoinFalcon Digital Limited, a company based in England and Wales. The Irish courts will have exclusive jurisdiction over any claims and disputes.A mobile app is accessible in the App Store, as well as Google Play. Coinfalcon has a social media presence on LinkedIn, Facebook, and Twitter.

CoinField is an online cryptocurrency exchange platform that allows users to use six different fiat currencies to exchange with cryptocurrency. They are EUR, USD, CAD, GBP, JPY, and AED. Popular cryptocurrencies such as Bitcoin, Ethereum, Ripple, Stellar, Litecoin, and Bitcoin Cash can be used on this platform. Other features CoinField offers are crypto wallet service and an upcoming NFT marketplace. CoinField offers their service to 187 countries, but there are a handful of countries restricted from their services. These countries include: United States, American Samoa, Antarctica, Belarus, Bonaire, Sint Eustatius and Saba, Bosnia and Herzegovina, Bouvet Island, British Indian Ocean Territory, Burundi, Central African Republic, Christmas Island, Cocos (Keeling) Islands, Congo, Cook Islands, Cuba, Curaçao, Eritrea, Falkland Islands (Malvinas), French Southern Territories, Greenland, Guam, Guinea, Guinea-Bissau, Haiti, Heard Island and McDonald Islands, Holy See, North Korea, Lebanon, Libya, Maldives, Mali, Moldova, Montenegro, Myanmar, Niue, Norfolk Island, Pitcairn, Puerto Rico, Saint Barthélemy, Saint Martin (French part), Serbia, Sint Maarten (Dutch part), Somalia, South Georgia and the South Sandwich Islands, South Sudan, Sudan, Svalbard and Jan Mayen, Syrian Arab Republic, Tokelau, Tunisia, Ukraine, United States Minor Outlying Islands, Venezuela (Bolivarian Republic of), Virgin Islands (U.S.), Western Sahara, Yemen, Zimbabwe, and Åland Islands.CoinField operates under two legal names. Manticore Labs OU is under Estonia jurisdiction. Manticore Labs Inc is under British Virgin Islands jurisdiction.CoinField is domiciled in Estonia. They have a social media presence on Twitter, LinkedIn, and Facebook.

In Oct 2021 CoinCorner acquired Coinfloor's customer base and internet domains (coinfloor.co.uk and coinfloor.com). Coinfloor customers have one month to decide whether to migrate or close their accounts. https://www.nasdaq.com/articles/bitcoin-exchange-coincorner-acquires-customer-base-domains-of-coinfloor-2021-10-04. Previous URL https://www.coinfloor.co.uk/ now redirects to https://www.coincorner.com/coinfloor/affiliate

In Oct 2021 CoinCorner acquired Coinfloor's customer base and internet domains (coinfloor.co.uk and coinfloor.com). Coinfloor customers have one month to decide whether to migrate or close their accounts. https://www.nasdaq.com/articles/bitcoin-exchange-coincorner-acquires-customer-base-domains-of-coinfloor-2021-10-04. Previous URL https://www.coinfloor.co.uk/ now redirects to https://www.coincorner.com/coinfloor/affiliate

Founded in 2014, Coinhako is a cryptocurrency exchange platform headquartered in Singapore, that enables users to buy, sell, and trade cryptocurrencies. Coinhako also offers an OTC trading desk They support Bitcoin, Litecoin, Ethereum, and Ripple among other cryptocurrencies. Coinhako platform was founded by Singaporean entrepreneurs in Silicon Valley, and is backed by prominent investors such as Tim Draper, Josh Jones, as well as established venture capital firms such as Boost VC.Hako Technology Pte Ltd., a private limited company domiciled in and incorporated in Singapore (UEN: 201332728R). For users in Singapore, the applicable laws of Singapore prevail, for users in Viet Nam, the applicable laws of Viet Nam. Seat of Arbitration will always be in Singapore.Currently they have a social media presence on LinkedIn, Twitter, and Facebook.

Coinhouse SAS (Coinhouse), founded in 2015, is an exchange that offers buying, selling, and trading of cryptocurrencies. Their investment services include crypto savings accounts, asset management, asset portfolios, recurring transfers, and custody. They help users with any NFT projects that include management of collections, purchase & sale, and conservation.Coinhouse is headquartered in Paris, France. Their terms are governed by the laws of France, and any disputes will be submitted to the exclusive jurisdiction of the Court of Appeal of Paris.The cryptocurrencies they offer include: BTC, ETH, XRP, LTC, BCH, EOS, and more. For a full list of currencies and market information, see link: https://www.coinhouse.com/cryptocurrency-prices/They have social media presence on Twitter, Facebook, and Linkedin.

Coinify ApS (Coinify.com), incorporated in 2014 and headquartered in Denmark, is an established global virtual currency platform actively offering solutions in Europe, Asia and other regions. They are registered with the Danish Financial Service Authority under the Danish Anti-Money Laundering Act and the Financial Crimes Enforcement Network (“FinCEN”) in the United States.Coinify’s services include: individual currency trading, corporate brokerage, payment processing services, and enterprise solutions via Coinify API. They offer a bridge for merchants to accept blockchain payments in 15 currencies and receive payouts in fiat. Cryptocurrencies that are supported by their wallet service are Bitcoin (BTC), Ether (ETH), Bitcoin Cash (BCH), Bitcoin SV (BSV) and Stellar lumens (XLM). The site's agreement is governed by the laws of Denmark. Any disputes will be submitted to the exclusive jurisdiction of the Court of Copenhagen.Forbes, Nets, Ledger, BRD, Prime XBT, Celsius, Phemex, Gate.io, and LBank are all partnered with Coinify.U.S. trading platform Voyager Digital Ltd. announced on Aug 2, 2021 that it has acquired crypto payment platform Coinify in an $85 million deal.https://www.prnewswire.com/news-releases/voyager-digital-acquires-leading-global-cryptocurrency-payment-processing-company-coinify-301345810.htmlhttps://www.finextra.com/pressarticle/88778/voyager-digital-acquires-coinify-for-84-millionThey have a social media presence on Twitter, Facebook, and Linkedin.

They are registered with the Danish Financial Service Authority under the Danish Anti-Money Laundering Act and the Financial Crimes Enforcement Network (“FinCEN”) in the United States.Coinify’s services include: individual currency trading, corporate brokerage, payment processing services, and enterprise solutions via Coinify API. They offer a bridge for merchants to accept blockchain payments in 15 currencies and receive payouts in fiat. CoinInn is a cryptocurrency exchange that allows customers to buy and trade cryptocurrencies or digital currencies for other assets, such as conventional fiat money or other digital currencies. Coinipop is all about Cryptocurrency transactions. They claim to be the leading Cryptocurrency exchange platform, and that they are buying and selling Cryptocurrencies at the best rates.In order to provide a great solution, they offer our customers a variety of purchase solutions including Credit Card and Wire Transfers. For high volume purchases, they have created an additional OTC desk in order to be able to close a rate in a short period of time.Coinipop is an Estonian cryptocurrency exchange, which allows its users to buy and sell cryptocurrencies. Coinipop.com is owned and operated by CRYPTO HOUSE OU, a company incorporated in Tallinn, Estonia (registration nr. 1456138) and regulated by the Financial Intelligence Unit (“FIU”), licensed to provide services of exchanging a virtual currency against a FIAT currency. License number FVT000372 https://www.teatmik.ee/en/personlegal/14516138-Crypto-House-O%C3%9C Governing law: Estonia.

The organization is presumed closed due to the inability to register for an account. They hope to allow registrations again soon. They are presumed closed as of today 07/15/2022.Coinitix is a cryptocurrency exchange that offers the purchasing of Bitcoin via credit card. Current payment methods include USD, GBP, EUR, and AUD, via Visa and Mastercard. The organizations legal name is Xshop OU and they hold a virtual currency license in Estonia, with license number FVT000422. They are located at Pärnu mnt 139d, Kesklinna linnaosa, Tallinn, Harju maakond, 11317, Estonia. Coinitix follows the applicable laws of Estonia. United States residents are prohibited from using the platform or any service associated with it.Currently they have no social media presence on any platform.

Established in 2013 and originally founded in Melbourne Australia, CoinJar is a digital currency exchange that provides a hosted digital currency account which enables users to send digital currency to, and request, receive, and store digital currency from, third parties by giving instructions through the CoinJar Website. Buying, selling, and trading fiat-to-crypto are supported, while CoinJar also allows users to buy and sell digital currency via its instant buy service, which involves using a debit or credit card to fund the purchase. A wide variety of cryptocurrencies are offered such as Bitcoin, Ethereum, Litecoin, Ripple, EOS, Chainlink, Stellar, USD Coin, Uniswap, Yearn.finance, Maker Dai, Compound, 0x Token, AAVE, Synthetix, Sushiswap, USD Tether, and many more. CoinJar Digital Currency and Exchange Services, including associated mobile apps, are operated by CoinJar UK Limited, a private limited company registered in England and Wales under company number 8905988 with a registered office at Level 39, One Canada Square, Canary Wharf, London E14 5AB. Users in Australia and CoinJar agree to submit to the non-exclusive jurisdiction of the courts of Victoria. Users from the United Kingdom and CoinJar agree to submit to the non-exclusive jurisdiction of the courts of England and Wales. Users from Northern Ireland may bring proceedings in Northern Ireland, Users from Scotland bring proceedings in Scotland. For Australian customers, CoinJar utilizes local settlement services provided by NPS Payment Services Pty Ltd (ABN 23169185406) Level 34, 360 Elizabeth Street, Melbourne VIC 3000 Australia, a related entity within the CoinJar Group of companies, to process AUD payments, deposits and withdrawals. CoinJar Swipe (only available to Australian users) is Australia’s first digital currency EFTPOS card, powered by CoinJar. With it, users can convert their digital currency to Australian Dollars and use those funds to make purchases at any Australian EFTPOS terminal. The facility is provided EML Payment Solutions Limited ABN 30 131 436 532 AFSL 404131.They have a mobile application available for download on both Google Play and the Apple App Store. Currently they have a social media presence on Twitter, Facebook, and LinkedIn.

CoinList is a cryptocurrency exchange. Proclaims to provide access to the best new tokens before they list on exchanges. CoinList Pro accepts BTC, ETH, ALGO, OXT and USD on the exchange and support a variety of trading pairs.This site is operated by Amalgamated Token Services Inc. and its wholly owned subsidiaries, CoinList Services LLC, CoinList Lend LLC, CoinList Markets LLC, and SLA Services Ltd.If you reside in the United States services are provided by CoinList Markets LLC (NMLS #1785267) is a Money Services Business registered with the Financial Crimes Enforcement Network and certain states as a money transmitter. Launched on 4/1/2013 and headquartered in Dublin, Ireland, Cmama Ltd. (Coinmama.com) is a cryptocurrency exchange, offering its users the option to purchase and sell digital currency for fiat money. Any disputes will be submitted to the exclusive jurisdiction of the courts in Dublin, Ireland.Restricted countries include: Iran, North Korea, Cuba, Syria or the Crimea region (of the Ukraine / Russia), or any other country in the US embargo. Any jurisdictions on the sanctions list are not allowed access to their services.They have a social media presence on Twitter, Facebook, and LinkedIn.

Coinmerce is a cryptocurrency exchange and management platform based in the Netherlands.The usability of Coinmerce allows users to access their account to exchange on the web or on the app with their phone. The main products Coinmerce offers are staking, simple trading for beginners, advanced trading such as limiting orders, and gift cards.Coinmerce was founded in 2017 by Nick Smits van Oyen and Luc Smits Van Oyen. Coinmerce is registered at the Dutch central bank (De Nederlandsche Bank N.V.) R179498 as a provider of crypto services. Governing law: District Court of Amsterdam.

Coinmetro Group OU (CoinMetro), headquartered in the Republic of Estonia, is operated by CoinMetro OU, also same location. They are a virtual asset trading and exchange platform which includes margin trading capabilities and offers e-wallet services as well to a global client base. Offered cryptocurrencies include, but not limited to: BTC, ETH, BCH, LTC, 1Inch, Aave, BAT, LINK, Uniswap, XLM, Ripple USDC, etc. Full list of assets traded: https://go.coinmetro.com/marketsTheir terms are governed by the laws of the Republic of Estonia.
