Coinmotion Oy (Coinmotion), founded in 2012 and headquartered in Finland, is a cryptocurrency exchange, through which users can deposit, withdraw, buy, sell, and store cryptocurrencies as well as fiat currencies. They support Bitcoin, Ethereum, Litecoin, Ripple, Stellar Lumens, Aave, Chainlink, Uniswap, and USD Coin.Their agreement is governed by the laws of Finland. Any disputes will be settled by the exclusive jurisdiction of the courts in Helsinki, Finland.Services are unavailable for the citizens and residents of the United States.Currently Coinmotion has an app that is available on Google Play and the Apple App Store. They also have a social media presence on Twitter, Facebook, and LinkedIn.

Founded in 2014, CoinOne provides blockchain-based financial and infrastructure services such as virtual asset management and a transaction matching engine, and cryptocurrency exchange that also allows users to buy and sell Bitcoin with KRW. Coinone Co., Ltd. is domiciled in South Korea with its headquarters office located at 45th and 46th floors, Park One Tower 1, 108 Yeoui-daero, Yeongdeungpo-gu, Seoul, Republic of Korea (07335). Business registration number: 261-81-07437. CoinOne Co., Ltd. is governed by the applicable laws of South Korea. In 20921, South Korea required local cryptocurrency exchanges to acquire bank contracts to provide users with withdrawal and deposit accounts under their real names to minimize risks of financial crime such as money laundering or embezzlement. CoinOne partnered with NH Nonghyup Bank for said real-name bank accounts in September, 2021. As of August 30th 2022, South Korea’s internet-only bank, KakaoBank, has signed a contract with Coinone to provide withdrawal and deposit accounts to local investors under their real names, per local regulations. More on this can be found here: https://finance.yahoo.com/news/korea-internet-only-kakaobank-partners-023445800.htmlCoinOne currently has a social media presence on Facebook, Twitter, Instagram, and LinkedIn, as well as a YouTube Channel.

coinpass.com was founded to solve the demand for fast, reliable, professional and high-quality financial services products for Bitcoin and crypto trading in the United Kingdom.Our mission is to deliver a crypto trading and investment experience that was fast, secure, and easy to use Since 2018 we've been serving retail investors, professional traders, businesses to access the cryptocurrency markets through our proprietary on-ramp and trading technology in less time, fewer fees and better support.Our long-term vision is to be a global leader in the digital finance space bridging the gap between traditional finance, banking, trading and digital assets.

BankName: Banca di RIpatransone e del Fermano
OrgNotes: CoinPlaza is a non-custodial instant crypto currency exchange. CoinPlaza gives clients the option to buy, sell and exchange crypto currencies. They do not provide any method for users to store their assets on their platform. Users must transfer funds directly to a bank account or wallet address. They offer Bitcoin, Ether, Litecoin, Bitcoin Cash, Stellar, Dogecoin, Dash, Z Cash, Link, Monero, Cardano, and others. The only fiat currency accepted at this time is Euros.They do not require any verification or even an account if users plan to transfer less than 250 Euros per wallet address or bank account. If a user desires to transfer more than that amount they must create an account. Tehy do offer their members an affiliate program where they have the opportunity to earn a 20% 20% revenue share on commissions of every exchange made by their referrals.CoinPlaza is owned and operated by CoinPlaza S.r.l. who is domiciled in Tronto, Italy. They are governed by the applicable laws of Italy as well. They do not offer their services to the residents of The United States, The Bahamas, Barbuda, Brunei, Djibouti, Grenada and Guatemala, The Cook Islands, The Marshall Islands, The US Virgin Islands; Kiribati, Lebanon, Liberia, Macau, The Maldives, Nauru, Nevis, New Caledonia, Oman, French Polynesia, Solomon, Samoa, Saint Lucia, Saint Vincent and the Grenadines, St. Helena, Sark, Saint Kitts, Tonga, Tuvalu, Vanuatu, Bahrain, Guam, Namibia, Palau, Trinidad, or Tobago.Currently they have no social media presence on any platform.

CoinsBank founded in 2016, proclaims itself as 'your all-in-one gateway to blockchain services': Wallet, Cards, Exchanges, Merchant, Mobile app. The CoinsBank Wallet supports various fiat currencies (USD, EUR, GBP, CHF, JPY, AUD, RUB), as well as the cryptocurrencies: BTC, LTC, ETH, XRP. The exchange supports the trading of fiat-to-crypto and vice-versa. Issuing and servicing of VISA and MasterCard debit payment cards through the conclusion of agency agreements between the Company and the international payment systems. Provides merchant services, namely, the ability to send and receive payments to the Users’ accounts in the national currencies of USD, EUR, GBP, CHF, JPY, AUD, RUB and the cryptocurrencies BTC and LTC, provides online information about the cross-currency rates from various sources and trading platforms, and provides the ability for the use of mobile applications for the work with the System. Services are provided by "CB Exchange OU" a company registered and licensed in Estonia (142277952). Applicable Law: Estonia.

CoinsBank founded in 2016, proclaims itself as 'your all-in-one gateway to blockchain services': Wallet, Cards, Exchanges, Merchant, Mobile app. The CoinsBank Wallet supports various fiat currencies (USD, EUR, GBP, CHF, JPY, AUD, RUB), as well as the cryptocurrencies: BTC, LTC, ETH, XRP. The exchange supports the trading of fiat-to-crypto and vice-versa. Services are provided by "CB Exchange OU" a company registered and licensed in Estonia (142277952). Applicable Law: Estonia.

Phi Colombia S.A.S. (Coinsenda), founded in 2017, is a cryptocurrency exchange that offers users to buy and sell Bitcoin with fiat currencies (Colombian Pesos) and supports multiple payment methods including debit card, credit card, bank transfer. Users will need to download their app and connect a wallet, in order to have more access to the account. Also the website is locked into the Colombian language.Coinsenda is headquartered in the city of Bogota, Republic of Colombia. Their terms are governed by the laws of the Republic of Colombia. Any disputes will be submitted to the Conciliation Center of the Superintendence of Companies or to the Conciliation Center of the Chamber of Commerce of Bogota, Colombia.They have social media presence on Twitter, Facebook, and Linkedin.

Simply Digital Technologies Inc. (CoinSmart), headquartered in Canada, is a cryptocurrency exchange platform that users can buy and sell bitcoin along with other digital currencies accessible on a desktop or mobile device. They offer the following cryptocurrencies: Bitcoin, Ethereum, Litecoin, Bitcoin Cash, Stellar, EOS, USD Coin, Cardano, Dogecoin, Polkadot, Shiba Inu, Chainlink, Uniswap, Solana, Polygon and Avalanche.For residents of Canada, their terms are governed by the laws of the Province of Ontario and the federal laws of Canada.Simply Digital Technologies USA Inc. is the registered company for residents within the United States. Their laws are governed by the State of Wyoming and the federal laws of the United States.S.D.T. OU is the registered company if users are a resident anywhere other than Canada or the United States. The governing law for this company is Estonia.They also have office locations in Austria, Belgium, Cyprus, Denmark, Finland, France, Germany, Ireland, Italy, Netherlands, Norway, Portugal, Spain, Sweden, and Turkey.They have social media presence on Twitter, Facebook, and Linkedin.

Coinsquare Ltd. (Coinsquare), founded in 2014 and headquartered in Canada, is a cryptocurrency platform for trading Bitcoin, Ethereum, XRP, and other cryptocurrencies. Their products include: Coinsquare Trade where users can buy, sell or HODL Bitcoin and more. Coinsquare Pro that offers ways to maximize users' investments. Coinsquare Wealth offers personalized service to help navigate the world's markets.Coins that Coinsquare exchange include, but not limited to: Aave, Algorand, ApeCoin, Avalanche, Axle Infinity, Bitcoin, Dash, Dogecoin, Ethereum, Fantom, Polkadot, Polygon, USD Coin, Uniswap, and XRP.https://coinsquare.com/coinsThey have a social media presence on Facebook, Twitter and LinkedIn.On July 2020 Coinsquare reached a settlement with the Ontario Securities Commission, over allegations that it engaged in wash trading to inflate its reported trading volume and retaliated against a whistleblower who attempted to report the misconduct. As a result of that settlement, Coinsquare had to overhaul its corporate governance, including establishing an independent board and appointing a new CEO and chief compliance officer. A new CEO was recently (June 2021) appointed Martin Piszel who succeeded Stacey Hoisak, who now becomes president and chief legal officer at the company. Vancouver Fintech company Mongo has announced plans to increase its ownership in Coinsquare from almost 20 to 37%, with a warranty to increase to 48%, if exercised.https://betakit.com/mogo-to-nearly-double-stake-in-coinsquare-to-37-percent

Founded in 2014, Coins TH (Coins TH Co., Ltd.) is a mobile blockchain-enabled platform that enables anyone, including those without bank accounts, to easily access financial services directly from their devices. They currently allow users to buy Bitcoin and sell various other cryptocurrencies.Coins TH Co., Ltd. is domiciled in Thailand with their headquarters address located at 173/36 Room No. 27-109, 27th Floor Asia Center Building, Sathorn Road, Toongmahamek, Sathorn, Bangkok 10120, Thailand. They do not allow any residents of The United States to utilize their financial services.Currently they have a social media presence on Twitter, Discord, Instagram, TikTok, Facebook, and LinkedIn.

As of release of article 1/7/22 CoinSuper appears to have done a rug pull not allowing its customers to pull their money out of the exchange. When website is accessed today (4/18/22) a blank page shows up and appears to be down completely. (Criminal)Established in 2017, Coinsuper (under the Higgs Block Group, a blockchain technology and financial conglomerate), is a Hong Kong based virtual asset trading platform and self-regulated custodian, claiming to have 1.5+ million users globally and strategic investors including Pantera, Unbound Partners, Fin Venture, Cash Financials, Guosheng International, Oriental Patron, 8 Decimal, Sky9, Ausvic Capital, Juntong, Blockwater Capital, Node Capital, Ledger Capital, DHVC, JRR Crypto, Byte Capital, Genesis, Pallet One, among others. Services are provided by "Coinsuper Fintech(HK) Co., Limited", a company incorporated under the laws of Hong Kong (Business Registration No.68324638-000-10-17-4), doing business as ‘Coinsuper’. Applicable law: Hong Kong. Residents of the USA (among other countries) are prohibited from using the services from this platform. Coinsuper Trust (affiliate of Coinsuper Group) provides global custody services, offering services to Coinsuper Premium (presumably Hong Kong’s largest virtual asset trading platform) and other traditional funds including virtual asset fund, hedge funds, OTC escrow and virtual asset platform.Coinsuper recently announced an exciting partnership with Fenix 360, a revolutionary social media platform using blockchain technology to better connect artists and fans, declaring that they (FENIX) will conduct their much-awaited AMA (Ask Me Anything) with the prominent cryptocurrency company. Fexix 360 will use its native FENIX Tokens (FNX) ERC20 listed in Coinsuper exchange and FENIX Non-Fungible Tokens.https://www.fenix360.net/

At the time of this review 04/24/2022 the web domain is no longer accessible. CoinsXP has no presence on any social media platform at this time and there are no relative articles online stating they were a scam, have closed, or rebranded. This organization is presumed closed as of the date of last active archive on the Wayabck Machine, which is from 12/24/2021.CoinsXP allows users to purchase cryptocurrencies via credit card. Topcoin Management OU is the legal name and they are located in Estonia at Harju maakond, Tallinn, Lasnamae linnaosa, Valke-Paalaa tn 2, 11415, Estonia. They are governed under the applicable laws of Estonia. Their license number is FVT000418.

At the time of this review 04/28/2022 this web domain is no longer accessible. There are no articles online pertaining to this organization closing or rebranding. The Facebook account associated with this organization is also no longer active. The LinkedIn remains active, and the Twitter account is also still active but has no posts since January of 2021, and nothing relating to a closing or rebranding. The last active archive on the Wayback. Machine is from 11/23/2021. This organization is presumed closed as of 11/24/2021. With all the knowledge of the market, the new platform appears to fill, in an uncomplicated way, gaps that exist today in the world of investment in digital currencies.Cointrade's goal is to enter the brokerage market that operates with the order book model. With this, it aims to serve traders with as many tools as possible. These tools provide cryptocurrency investors with a platform with high performance and effectiveness.In this new simple and agile system is all experience and knowledge in crypto trading from market giants. United here to constantly develop new tools in order to increase your investment possibilities.

Coinumm OU (Coinumm) is a virtual currency service that allows users the exchanging of virtual currencies against a FIAT currency, as well as digital asset storage services.Coinumm OU is headquartered in Harju maakond, Estonia. Their user agreement states that any disputes will be settled according to the current legislation of Estonia.Residents of these countries are not allowed to access any services on their platform: Afghanistan, Algeria, Bahamas, Bahrain, Bangladesh, Bolivia, Bosnia and Herzegovina, Botswana, Cambodia, Crimea, Cuba, Ethiopia, Ghana, Iran, Iraq, Japan, Kosovo, Kuwait, Lebanon, Libya, Myanmar, North Korea, Oman, Pakistan, Palestine, Qatar, Saudi Arabia, Somalia, South Sudan, Sudan, Syria, Tunisia, Uganda, Vanuatu, Yemen, or Zimbabwe.They support fiat currencies Ruble, Euro, and US Dollar via Visa and Mastercard credit and debit cards, or Sepa and Swift transfers for purchasing crypto. Supported cryptocurrencies include: Bitcoin, Ethereum, Tether(ERC-20), Tether(TRC-20), DOGE, Tron, Bitcoin Cash, Stellar, Ethereum classic, and Litecoin.Coinumm is partnered with Bitstamp, BestChange, Sum & Substance, Kraken, Kewbek, Askoin, Cryotholics, Scammoney.net, ExchangeSumo and others.They have social media presence on Twitter and LinkedIn.

Founded in 2013, Coinut (Coin Ultimate Trading) provides cryptocurrency-based spot and exchange trading services. Services are provided by Coinut Canada Ltd., a company incorporated in Toronto, Canada. Coinut Canada Ltd is is regulated as an MSB in Canada (FINTRAC MSB No. M18935124) and the Ontario Securities Commission. They restrict the users of Singapore, The United States, and Canada (except for residents of Ontario).For those who are Singapore citizens, permanent residents, residing or domiciled in Singapore, services are provided by Coinut Pte. Ltd., a company incorporated in Singapore with the company registration number 201332271K. Coinut Pte. Ltd. is exempted by the Monetary Authority of Singapore from holding a license to provide e-money issuance services. Governing law is that of Canada for all users.Supports various cryptocurrencies such as Bitcoin, Litecoin, Ethereum, Ethereum Classic, Tether, and Zero Cash as well as Privacy coins Monero and Z Cash and Fiat currencies SGD and CAD, via FAST and telegraphic transfers, debit or credit cards, Apple Pay and Google Pay. Currently they have a social media presence on Twitter, Facebook, and LinkedIn.

Launched in 2018, Coinzest has been a South Korean cryptocurrency exchange. At the time of the review (28 Oct 2021) URL https://www.coinzest.co.kr is not accessible, thus the exchange is presumed not operational. Apparently, it has been not accessible since May 2020  https://www.cryptowisser.com/exchange/coinzest

CoinZoom proclaims itself to more than just an exchange. CoinZoom is bridging the gap between, legacy FX, futures, stocks, and banking to make digital assets available to the masses. Proclaims to have customers in 192 countries and 120+ trading markets who can buy, sell, and trade over 40 cryptocurrencies including Bitcoin, Ether, and Litecoin on a regulated exchange. Products: CoinZoom App (Buy, sell trade, send crypto and fiat for free to your friends and family anywhere in the world)CoinZoom Pro App (buy, sell, trade, send money and crypto, technical indicators, order book, charts etc) Advanced Trader Web AppCoinZoom Visa (convert BTC to USD instantly and spend it at 53M merchants worldwide)CoinZoom Earn (earn interest on over 40 coins) ZoomMe (send/receive crypto and USD - easy, free and instant money transfer service)CoinZoom CommerceIf you are a US resident or are located outside of the US (except Australia), services are offered by CoinZoom, Inc. If you are located in Australia services are offered by CoinZoom Australia PTY LTD. CoinZoom, Inc. a U.S. Registered Money Service Business with FinCen in all 50 states and territories. MSB Registration Number: 31000205754157. CoinZoom and its wholly-owned subsidiaries also have specific U.S. Money Transmitter Licenses and are also licensed as a Digital Currency Exchange in Australia. Governing law: Salt Lake City, Utah, USA.

At the time of this review, 08/10/2022, the Facebook page has a post dating August 2nd that states they are no longer offering wallet services and are operating OTC only until they come out with their new platform.Copter is a cryptocurrency exchange that supports the buying, selling, and sending of cryptocurrencies with no fees. They support Bitcoin, Ethereum, USD Coin, Stellar, and Tether at this time. They operate on the BTC, ERC-20, and BSC Networks.(BSC - for USDT, USDC, BTC, and ETH withdrawals only.) The minimum deposit amount for operation is 150 ARS.Copter is owned and operated by Copter SA and is domiciled in Argentina. The organizations Terms and Conditions do not disclose what laws they are governed by nor does the Privacy Policy.The mobile application is available for users to download on Google Play and The Apple App Store. Currently they have a social media presence on Facebook, Instagram, and LinkedIn.

CPayments is a platform for users to buy Bitcoin with credit cards. They accept Visa and Mastercard credit and debit cards, PayPal, Sofort, and other e-transfwers as well. CPayments is operated by Digital Active OU who is based in Estonia. They are governed by all applicable laws of Estonia and offer their services to "99% of countries".Currently they have no mobile application and no presence on any social media presence on any platform.

As of the August 31, 2022 review, the website is closed. Nothing was found on the reason it closed.Criptouch is a Bitcoin purchasing platform and online crypto wallet domiciled in Estonia. They are governed by all applicable laws of Estonia as well. Criptouch currently accepts Mastercard and Visa for purchases. Users must register an account to access any features on this site. Minimum beginning deposit is $25 USD. Criptouch prohibits the use of its services to any resident of The United States, Afghanistan, Bosnia and Herzegovina, Cuba, Ethiopia, Iran, Iraq, Democratic People’s Republic of Korea, Lao People's Democratic Republic, Sri Lanka, Sudan, Syrian Arab Republic, Trinidad and Tobago, Tunisia, Uganda, Vanuatu, Yemen, Lebanon, Serbia, Algeria, Bangladesh, Bolivia, Cambodia, China, Kyrgyzstan, Macedonia, Nepal, Nigeria, and Thailand.Criptouch has no presence on any social media platform at this time.

The Criptoven website is closed and last date of activity was on 12/28/2021. Cannot register into the site, because of being locked up.Criptoven is an exchange that allows you to buy, sell, and store crypto and traditional money. They also offer their certified companies and institutions an option to pay employees with crypto using their Criptoven Wallet.With the assistance of the National Bank, Criptoven claims to offer financing services to people and institutions.Criptoven is registered by the First Mercantile Registry of the Capital District and authorized to act as an Exchange House by the National Superintendency of Cryptoactives of Venezuela and Activities (SUNACRIP) through license No. CF-6471-0013-2.The Terms and Conditions of the site are very vague and even though there is a "Privacy Policy" button, the link goes back to the Terms and Conditions Page, so there is no Privacy Policy listed on this site. It is advised to use caution when utilizing this platform.

As of today's review (04/20/2022), the website for crxzone is offline. According to WayBackMachine, the last screenshot of the website being online is 12/27/2021.From Previous reviewer:Based in Republic of Singapore and founded in February of 2014, Intellect Mkt. Pte. Ltd. is a crypto currencies wallet platform where merchants and consumers can transact with the new digital currencies like bitcoin, litecoin, etc.Our mission is to provide a world class transparent, deeply liquid and safe environment for users to trade crypto-currencies, as well as to accept crypto-payments by online businesses in an efficient and easy to use manner.That’s why we guarantee your Bitcoin, Litecoin and virtual currency investments three things: Security, Scalability, and Liquidity. A sophisticated platform architecture, conceived and built for maximum scalability and data security, lies at the heart of the CRXzone exchange — all backed by 24/7, best-in-class monitoring.

Crypterium is a crypto wallet that aims to develop an "open platform digital cryptobank", capable of providing a user-friendly, global banking experience using the power of blockchain technology. Users can not only store, spend, exchange, and borrow against practically any cryptocurrency, they can also benefit from crypto-fiat exchange services allowing them to spend their cryptocurrencies easily in real world purchases and transactions, with fast and efficient bid-offer matching, all via a mobile application that facilitates cashless and contactless payments at NFC-fitted POS terminals, and is also capable of processing QR payment codes. They also offer a Crypterium Visa Card where users can spend money anywhere Visa is accepted. They work at ATMS in 200+ countries and also work for online retailers. They currently support 20 cryptocurrencies including Bitcoin, Ethereum, and Litecoin.Crypterium is known by the legal name Crypterium AS and is governed b y all applicable laws in Estonia. They restrict the residents of Abkhazia, Afghanistan, Crimea, Cuba, Donetsk National Republic (DNR), Gaza Strip, Haiti, Iran, Iraq, Kashmir, Libya, Luhansk National Republic (LNR), Myanmar, Nagorno Karabakh, North Korea, Pakistan, Palestine, Panama, Senegal, Somalia, South Ossetia, South Sudan, Syria, USA, West Bank, and Zimbabwe from registering an account or using any of their services.The mobile application is available for download on Google Play and The Apple App Store. Currently they have a social media presence on Facebook, Instagram, LinkedIn, and Twitter as well as a YouTube Channel.

Founded in 2017, Cryptex is a cryptocurrency trading platform where users can sign up without having to register KYC. The Cryptex trading platform allows users to trade cryptocurrencies like Bitcoin, Ethereum, Dash, Monero, and more. Fiat Currencies accepted on this platform are USD, EURO, GBP, RUB, UAH, PLN, TRY, and AED.They offer a basic exchange and trading platform, OTC trading desk, payment gateways, and spot trading among other services.Cryptex (International Payment Service Provider LLC) is domiciled in Scotland, Ireland, Great Britain. They are subpoenable in Saint Vincent and The Grenadines. Residents from these countries are permitted to use Cryptex services: Russia, Ukraine, Kazakhstan, Belarus, Uzbekistan, Georgia, Moldova, Azerbaijan, England, Germany, Spain, France, Poland, Czech Republic, Latvia, Lithuania, Estonia, Turkey, UAE, and Iran. United States residents are prohibited from using Cryptex services.Currently they have a social media presence on Twitter, Instagram, Discord, Facebook, and LinkedIn, as well as a YouTube Channel.

Founded in 2016, Crypto.com users can buy, sell, send, track and spend with the Crypto.com Visa Card, Crypto.com DeFi Wallet and recently launched, Crypto.com NFT platform for collecting and trading NFTs (Non Fungible Tokens). Also offers Crypto.org Chain Explorer, while Crypto.com Coin (CRO) is the native token used in the Crypto.com exchange, associated with discounts and benefits for its token holders.https://crypto.org/explorerCrypto.com exchange services: are provided by company "CRO DAX Limited". Governing law: Hong Kong NFT Platform services: are provided by "Foris DAX Global Limited" Applicable law: Hong KongCrypto.com App services: are provided by Foris DAX MT Limited (formerly MCO Malta DAX Limited), a company incorporated in Malta (Governing law: Malta) with company number (C88392) trading under the name “Crypto.com” via the Crypto.com app, is licensed as a Class 3 Virtual Financial Assets Service Provider by the Malta Financial Services Authority. Foris DAX MT Limited is authorised to provide the following VFA services: 1. execution of orders on behalf of other persons; 2. dealing on own account; and 3. custodian or nominee services to experienced and non-experienced investors.DeFi Swap protocol is a set of smart contracts made available by "DeFi Labs" Citizens of the United States of America (among other countries) are prohibited jurisdictions.They have a social media presence on Twitter, Facebook, and LinkedIn, with communities on Reddit and Discord.

Cryptobuyer website is closed and last date of activity was on 02/20/2022.Cryptobuyer is a cryptocurrency platform from Panama which integrates exchange solutions allowing its customers to connect new virtual technology to the real and physical world for daily basics. From a telephone recharge, to the payment of credit cards, through the payment of bills for Basic Services and TV Subscription, Cryptobuyer has the flexibility to integrate new forms and ways of tangible use, making a definitive connection between people (https://ca.linkedin.com/company/cryptobuyer). On March 2021, Cryptobuyer announced its alliance with Simple TV, the leading subscription-based satellite television operator in Venezuela, to offer its payment systems to more than 4 million users based on digital assets and banking APIs. Simple TV, recently acquired from AT&T by the Chilean investment fund Scale Capital, offers subscription services to more than 300 channels (https://ciudaddelsaber.org/en/press/more-than-4-million-satellite-television-users-will-have-the-option-of-payments-in-cryptocurrencies/). Cryptobuyer provides a network of ATMs in Panama allowing buying Bitcoin, Litecoin and Dash (https://cryptobuyer.io/en/atm/) and has plans to expand in other countries, such as Costa Rica (https://news.bitcoin.com/cryptobuyer-to-install-costa-ricas-first-bitcoin-atm/). Services are provided via "Distributed Technologies Pty Corp", a company located in Panama. Applicable law: Republic of Panama .Panama is on the FATF List of Countries that have been identified as having strategic AML deficiencies (https://www.knowyourcountry.com/panama1111).

CryptoCoin.pro is a P2P cryptocurrency exchange registered in Estonia that offers users the opportunity to trade Bitcoin and Ethereum against EUR or RON. They plan to extend their services to provide other altcoins as well: Ethereum Classic, Litecoin, IOTA, Monero etc. Cryptocoin.Pro guarantees the acquisition price of digital coins for 24 hours, regardless of intermediary fluctuations. CryptoCoin.pro has offices located in Romania and Luxembourg.CryptoCoin offers 2FA and a withdrawal white list option. They use an elastic multi-stage wallet strategy ensuring that 80-90% of funds are kept offline and secure. Also, for withdrawals, users are required to pass an enhanced verification process providing proof of the validity of their identification documents.

Crypto Hub was founded by chan and a team of investors in 2014 with the initiative of creating an easy and must effective means of for clients to invest and buy bitcoin effectively, the online platform was effectively online at 2016 after our effectiveness was tested and trusted.

Founded in 2017, headquartered in Singapore, Cryptology is a full-featured asset trading platform. They offer a peer-to-peer order matching platform for exchanging digital assets and fiat, spot trading, futures trading, staking opportunities, and OTC services for institutional clients only. They currently support Bitcoin, Ethereum, Litecoin, Ripple and more. Cryptology includes all parties that operate and run the Cryptology platform including Cypher OÜ, a company incorporated in Estonia with its registered address at Harju maakond, Lasnamae linnaosa, Keevise tn 10-41, 11415, Tallinn, Estonia and Deleverage S.A., a company incorporated in the Republic of Panama with its registered address at 34th Street, Building No. 34-20, Panama 5, Republic of Panama. Any arbitration and disputes will be subpoenable in Panama.Cryptology currently does not provide services in the United States of America and to any U.S. resident or national. They may restrict or prohibit the use of all or a portion of the Services from restricted locations, which at this time include Afghanistan, The Bahamas, Barbados, Botswana, Cambodia, Canada, Ghana, Iraq, Iran, Jamaica, Myanmar/Burma, Nicaragua, North Korea, Pakistan, Syria, Trinidad and Tobago, Uganda, Vanuatu, Yemen, Zimbabwe.Currently they have a social media presence on Twitter, Facebook, and LinkedIn.

Founded in 2016 by Rafael Meruane and Martín Jofré, CryptoMarket cryptocurrency exchange is used mainly in the Latin America zone, but is available globally. They offer 50+ cryptocurrencies to buy, sell, and trade, as well as their own wallet for users to utilize.Cryptomarket or Cryptomarket Global: Refers to the group of companies that have been mandated to collect deposits and process transactions. These companies have been listed below:CryptoMKT SA or CryptoMarket Argentina: A legal entity domiciled in Argentina for clients trading in Argentine Pesos. It is a company duly incorporated in Argentina.CryptoMKT Serviços Digitais LTDA or CryptoMarket Brasil: A legal entity domiciled in Brazil, for clients operating with Brazilian Reais, are made by Cryptomkt Servicos Digitals LTDA, a company duly incorporated in Brazil.CryptoMKT SpA or CryptoMarket Chile: A legal entity domiciled in Chile for clients trading in Chilean Pesos. It is duly incorporated in Chile and voluntarily registered with the Financial Analysis Unit (UAF).CryptoMKT Colombia SAS: legal entity domiciled in Colombia, for customers who operate with Colombian pesos. Company is duly incorporated in the Colombian territory.CryptoMKT Perú S.A.C.: legal entity domiciled in Peru, for customers who operate with Peruvian soles. This company is duly incorporated in the territory.They claim to specialize in Valores Digitales, Criptodivisas, ContratosInteligentes, SmartContract, CadenadeBloques, and CryptoMarket.Currently, they have a social media presence on LinkedIn, Twitter, Facebook, and Instagram.

Upon review 06-01-22 the website was not operational.Customers will pay with popular cryptocurrencies, and you will receive the payment directly on your address.

Navasu OU (CryptoPayIn) is an exchange that supports the purchasing of cryptocurrencies through credit card or bank wire, as well as selling crypto and transferring the funds to bank accounts, wallets, or debit cards. They support 15+ currencies and claim to have a presence in 34 countries. Users will need to download their app and connect a wallet for their services.CryptoPayIn is headquartered in Tallin, Estonia. Their terms are governed by the laws of Estonia, and any unsolved disputes will be settled by the courts of London, England.Supported cryptocurrencies include: BTC, BNB, ETH, LUNA, SHIB, DOT, USDT, XRP, LTC, DOGE, and more. For a full list and more information regarding their markets, see link: https://www.cryptocompare.com/coins/list/all/USD/1They do have a mobile application available for users on the Apple App Store and Google Play.

Cryptosouk has been a cryptocurrency exchange from Saint Vincent and the Grenadines, which is closed and their website is non-ops. At the time of the review (30 Jan 2022) https://www.cryptosouk.io was not accessible.

Fintegence s.r.o. (Crypto Voucher), founded in 2017, is a cryptocurrency exchange that allows users to buy the prepaid vouchers from other online distributors such as PayPal, SEPA, VISA, or Mastercard as well as from a local shop. They may also exchange various gift cards like Amazon or Walmart gift cards for crypto on this platform. Crypto Voucher is headquartered in the Slovak Republic. Their terms are governed by the laws of the Slovak Republic. Any disputes that are not solved between the parties will be settled in the courts in accordance with the laws of the Slovak Republic.They offer these cryptocurrencies: Bitcoin, Ethereum, Litecoin, Dogecoin, Polygon Matic, Binance Coin, USD Coin, and Solana.They have social media presence on Twitter, Facebook, and LinkedIn.

OpenGate Technology OU (Cryptus), headquartered in Estonia, is a crypto-exchange platform that offers services between virtual (crypto) and fiat currencies. Their terms are governed by applicable laws of Estonia. Any disputes will be settled by the exclusive jurisdiction of the Republic of Estonia courts.Cryptus is partnered with Thales, Advapay, Canopus, an Veriff.

Partners of Currency.com include: Gamestar, BLOCKCHAIN Working Group, TABTRADER, CoinStats, coinlib, CoinMarketCap, CoinGecko, nomics, Coinranking, KAIKO, coincodex, Blockchain.News, CryptoCompare, coinpaprika, KRM22, intotheblock, TradingView, HACKEN, and CHAMBER OF DIGITAL COMMERCE.Currency.com is a cryptocurrency exchange and a “tokenized securities exchange” where users can trade non-crypto assets that have been tokenized (i.e. bonds, shares, art, real-estate etc).Currency Com US LLC (dba Currency.com) (NMLS ID #: 2073665) is registered with the United States Treasury Financial Crimes Enforcement Network as a Money Services Business (MSB: 31000200984051) at 101 Hudson St., 21st Fl., Jersey City, NJ 07302. Currency Com US LLC is a subsidiary of Currency Com Limited (Gibraltar) which is licensed by the Gibraltar Financial Services Commission as a DLT Provider, with the license number 25032.

CyberBTC is a cryptocurrency exchange. Supports BTC, ETH, XRP, LTC, USDT, ZixiUSD (USDZ) and ZixiEUR (EURZ) stablecoins, which can be purchased via third party payment providers: Perfect Money, Payeer, Paypal, Western Union and Moneygram. ZixiUSD (USDZ) is a USD pegged stablecoin and ZixiEUR (EURZ) is a Euro pegged stablecoin backed by ZixiPay LLC a company based in Tbilisi, Georgia, authorized by the National Bank of Georgia (Reg. No. 0076-2904). USDZ and EURZ are available both on the Ethereum (ERC20) and Tron (TRC20) blockchains, freely exchangeable to BTC, ETH, LTC, and USDT within the ZixiPay Wallet platform.CyberBTC Terms of Service do not specify who is operating this platform, domicile or applicable law. CyberBTC.com is a subsidiary of Rosenberg International AG, a Swiss based multi-asset holding company active in the field of e-commerce and online payment platforms. US citizens are prohibited from using the services of this platform.

Dacxi is a digital assets exchange based in Singapore. They are governed by the applicable laws of Singapore as well, and do not seem to restrict the residents of any country at this time. Dacxi Ltd is currently applying for FCA registration with regard to KYC/AML permissions in the UK.They offer the purchasing of cryptocurrencies in bundle packages, with 3 options to choose from. The packages are proportioned so that users get a variety of crypto in their wallet rather thna just one currency. User just selects an amount and a plan and then Daxci will purchase cryptocurrency for the user. All plans include %10 bonus Dacxi Coins that will be safely locked-up for a period of 12 months. After the 12-month period is complete,all bonus Dacxi Coins will be automatically credited to the users account. They support Bitcoin, Bitcoin Cash, Ethereum, Tether, Litecoin, Polygon, Polkadot, and Cardano among others.Currently they have a social media presence on Twitter, LinkedIn, Instagram, and Facebook as well as a YouTube Channel.

Founded in 2018, Cobon International LLC (Decrypto) is an exchange both domiciled and subpoenable in Argentina and Peru. They specialize in Bitcoin, Ethereum, Crypto, Digital Assets, crypto, criptomonedas, cryptocurrencies, fintech, exchange, billfold, investments, and finances.Their domicile locations are:Republic of Argentina, located at Dorrego 2079, 7th floor, office 702, Autonomous City of Buenos Aires.The Republic of Peru, located at Calle Boulevard 141, Santiago de Sauco, Lima.They have social media presence on Twitter, Facebook, and Linkedin.

Launched on 01/10/2018, DeCurret is an exchange where you can buy and sell crypto assets (virtual currency) such as Bitcoin (BTC), Ethereum (ETH), and Ripple (XRP), OnTology, and QTUM. The main bank of digital currencies that has the same level of security measures as domestic financial institutions. They are both Domiciled and Subpoenable in Japan.In February 2022, Amber Group subsidiary WhaleFin Holdings Japan K.K (WhaleFin Japan) announced the acquisition of DeCurret Inc. As one of the 30 registered CAESPs operating in Japan since 2018, DeCurret is a leading crypto exchange in the market. Backed by 35 shareholders including leading Japanese financial institutions and corporations, DeCurret pioneered the introduction of an electronic money charge service for crypto-assets, and led the industry in making cryptocurrency more accessible to consumers.Twitter Facebook

LegalName: Digital Market Sp. z o. o. ul.
OrgNotes: DGT Market, founded on July 18th 2015, is a platform that exchanges cryptocurrencies for other forms of money. Services are provided by Digital Market Sp. z o. o. DGT Market is domiciled out of Poland. DGT Market allows the exchange of BTC and LTC.

The Digital Dealing Desk is a cryptocurrency exchange platform that allows users to buy and sell digital currency. This platform allows users to only exchange $BTC, $ETH, and $JDE.Services are provided by Digital Dealing Desk OÜ, an Estonia entity and their registry code is 14635720. The license number is: FVT000139. They are domiciled and subpoenable in Estonia.Digital Dealing Desk does not provide services to any residents or citizens in the USA, North Korea, Cuba, Iran, Sudan, and Syria.

Digital Symbio, established in 2017, is a Bitcoin ATM network located in Slovakia. They are currently partnered with Sietdobra.sk & Lubomier.sk.There is a complete lack of any legal information due to the organization not providing a terms and conditions, nor any other legal policies at this time.They have a social media presence on Facebook, Twitter, and LinkedIn as well as a YouTube Channel.

DMM Bitcoin Co. Ltd. (DMM Bitcoin), founded on 11-7-2016 and headquartered in Japan, is a cryptocurrency exchange operated by Japanese internet and entertainment conglomerate DMM Group. DMM Bitcoin supports multiple cryptocurrencies and trading pairs including: Bitcoin, Ethereum, Litecoin, Ripple, Bitcoin Cash, Ether and others. For more information, see link: https://bitcoin.dmm.com/service#Point01Their website is governed by the laws of Japan. Any disputes will be submitted to the Tokyo Bar Association.They have social media presence Twitter.

At the time of this review, 07/30/2022, the web domain is no longer accessible. There are no recent news articled stating they have been hacked again, that they are a scam, or have closed. There are also no active archives on the Wayback Machine. They have a social media presence on both Twitter and LinkedIn, however, the last twitter post was on 10/19/2020. The web domain was still active on March 31, 2022, they are presumed closed the next day, 04/01/2022.Launched on 2 November 2017 in Singapore, DragonEx is a cryptocurrency exchange, claiming to have 300K+ verified KYC users. Services are presumably offered by "DragonEx Inc" as mentioned on the bottom of the platform. The Terms of Service do not specifically mention who operates the platform or applicable law. Dragon Token (DT) is an ERC20 standard token, issued in Nov 2017, used as a native token on the DragonEX platform, associated with discounts, benefits and dividends from the total platform revenues for its token holders. DragonEX also seems to support the development of lottery games based on blockchain technology denominated in Dragon Tokens. https://www.cointelligence.com/exchanges_list/dragonexArticles in the media indicate that DragonEx lost $7 million, in a March 2019 hack. Law enforcement agencies form Estonia, Thailand, Singapore and Hong Kong were involved in the investigation and part of the funds where recovered. Source:https://www.coindesk.com/singapore-based-crypto-exchange-dragonex-has-been-hackedhttps://www.forbes.com/sites/thomasbrewster/2020/01/21/how-a-single-apple-mac-hack-scored-north-korean-spies-7-million-in-cryptocurrency/?sh=6ab5e51268e7

About DSXIncorporated in 2014, DSX is a cryptocurrency exchange from the United Kingdom. Services are provided by "DSX Global (UK) Limited" a private limited company incorporated in England and Wales under number 08927164 with its registered office at 24 Savile Row, London W1S 2ES. Governing law: English law.Upon clicking on the domain “dsx.uk” the user is redirected to the “dsxglobal.com” and a message appears that DSX Global (UK) Limited is currently in “in administration” status.https://find-and-update.company-information.service.gov.uk/company/08927164

LegalName: EF Worldwide Ltd, Easy Forex Trading Ltd, Easy Markets Pty Ltd
OrgNotes: Founded in 2001, easyMarkets proclaims itself to be one of the first online companies to offer trusted financial trading services to the European market. Introduced forex trading, supports 70+currency pairs, metals, commodities, indices, options and cryptocurrency CFD. Catering to European traders, the company is headquartered in Limassol, Cyprus and has offices in London, UK and Poland.The easyMarkets group of companies through its subsidiaries is licensed by the Cyprus Securities & Exchange Commission “CySEC” (Easy Forex Trading Ltd - License Number 079/07), which has been passported in the European Union through the MiFID Directive, in Australia by the Australia Securities and Investments Commission “ASIC” (Easy Markets Pty Ltd - AFS License Number 246566), in the Republic of Seychelles by the Financial Services Authority of Seychelles “FSA” (EF Worldwide Ltd - License Number SD056) and in British Virgin Islands by the Financial Services Commission “FSC” (EF Worldwide Ltd – License Number SIBA/L/20/1135).Services are provided by "Easy Forex Trading Ltd" (also referred to as ‘easyMarkets’) a private limited company incorporated under the laws of the Republic of Cyprus, Registration Number HE 203997, authorized and regulated by the Cyprus Securities and Exchange Commission (‘CYSEC’), license No. 079/07. Governing law: Cyprus. Citizens of the United States of America, Israel, British Columbia, Manitoba, Quebec, Ontario are (among other) prohibited jurisdictions. They are also subpoenable under Cyprus.Easy Forex Trading Ltd is part of Blue Capital Markets Group. Blue Capital Markets Limited was founded in 2003 and headquartered in Cyprus, is a holding company that offers online financial services solutions through its group of companies including among other. EasyMarkets Pty Ltd is headquartered in Sydney Australia and supports activity in the Asia Pacific region, being one of the first to receive a license (ASIC AFS No. 246566) from the Australian Securities & Investment Commission. EF Worldwide Ltd extends easyMarkets to the rest of the world, this would include the United States (MENA, South Africa, Canada, South America etc) with a license in the British Virgin Islands by Financial Services Commission (License Number SIBA/L/20/1135). They are also subpoenable under the British Virgin Islands.Our review consists of information based on the United States location.The group also has regulated operations in the Republic of Seychelles (Financial Services Authority of Seychelles – License Number SD056) EasyMarkets recently signed a deal to become the Official Online Trading Partner of popular Spanish football club Real Madrid.

eBipoint is a digital currency exchange platform headquartered in Ghana where users are able to buy and sell various cryptocurrencies such as Bitcoin, Litecoin, Ethereum, Bitcoin. Cash, Ripple, and Dash among others.Services are provided by Bitpoint Enterprises.Currently they have a social media presence on Twitter.

Eclipcoin is a cryptocurrency wallet that allows users to exchange, store, buy, sell, and manage their digital asset.Their wallet currently supports Bitcoin, Bitcoin Cash, Bitcoin Gold, Wrapped Bitcoin, Litecoin, Ethereum, Ethereum Classic, Ripple, Stellar, Algorand, ZCash, EOS, TRON, CELO, Tezos, Casper, Hedera, and Dash. Users can use credit or debit cards to purchase or use their fiat-crypto exchange tool. The fiat currencies accepted are $USD, $EUR, $GBP, and $CAD. Other service includes bank wiring.Eclipcoin is subpoenable and domiciled in Estonia. They operate under the legal name Eclipcoin Technology OÜ. They have a license number of FVT000388.

Eclipcoin is a cryptocurrency wallet that allows users to exchange, store, buy, sell, and manage their digital asset.Their wallet currently supports Bitcoin, Bitcoin Cash, Bitcoin Gold, Wrapped Bitcoin, Litecoin, Ethereum, Ethereum Classic, Ripple, Stellar, Algorand, ZCash, EOS, TRON, CELO, Tezos, Casper, Hedera, and Dash. Users can use credit or debit cards to purchase or use their fiat-crypto exchange tool. The fiat currencies accepted are $USD, $EUR, $GBP, and $CAD. Operating since 2009, eDollar is an exchange from Nigeria. Services are provided by Fintechvision Ltd. and its affiliates (Changelly). Changelly (a separate entry in Armada exists) is a crypto-to-crypto exchange supporting 200+ cryptocurrencies,and various fiat-to-fiat exchange rates, operating since 2015. Terms of use do not indicate where Fintechvision Ltd is specifically incorporated. Applicable law: Hong Kong (via arbitration). Similar company Fintechvision Ltd is registered in Belize, without knowing whether associated. Citizens of the USA (including all USA territories) are prohibited from using these services.

Founded in 2017, Eidoo is a Swiss company formed by a group of professionals with a shared goal: to improve how people manage their assets, invest, and make a profit in the blockchain economy.Eidoo Switzerland enables You to create one or more digital multi-signature, non-custodial, cryptocurrency wallets for certain supported cryptocurrencies and digital assets (the “Wallet”) that lets You store, send, request and receive supported cryptocurrencies and digital assets. All transactions requested and/or made through the Wallet are irreversible.Eidoo Lithuania enables You to access a hybrid trading platform (the “Exchanger”) that lets You trade cryptocurrencies and digital assets directly with other users.Their Terms and Conditions constitute a binding agreement between Eidoo Sagl, a limited company registered under the laws of Switzerland, with registered address at Via Giuseppe Motta, as well as DigitalID UAB, a limited company registered under the laws of Lithuania, with registered address at Liepu al. 24-70, Panevezio (“Eidoo Lithuania”), both referred to as “Eidoo”.The Terms for the Wallet services offered by Eidoo Switzerland are subject to and governed by Swiss law to the exclusion of Swiss international private law and any international treaties. The Terms for the Exchanger services offered by Eidoo Lithuania are subject to and governed by Lithuania law to the exclusion of Lithuania international private law and any international treaties. All disputes arising from or under these Terms shall be subject to the exclusive jurisdiction of the competent courts of Lugano, Switzerland, for the Wallet Services and the competent courts of Vilnius, Lithuania, for the Exchanger Services.Restricted countries include: Iran, Sudan, Iraq, North Korea, Ivory Coast, Syria, Zimbabwe, Cuba, Belarus, and Liberia.They have social media presence in Twitter, Facebook, and Linkedin.

Launched in 2018, Elastum is a cryptocurrency exchange from Lithuania. They support 14 cryptocurrencies: BTC, ETH, LTC, BCH, Tron, XNO, Stellar, Cosmos Beam, DAI, Ripple, ICON, Binance, Ravencoin (no privacy coins). Also supports fiat currencies EUR, USD, GBP and AED coming soon. As indicated in the Terms and Conditions, "Elastum" refers to UAB Debex Operations, a limited liability company (comp code: 304855409), incorporated under the laws of the Republic of Lithuania. They are also governed by all applicable laws of Lithuania. They restrict the residents of The United States, Afghanistan, Albania, American Samoa, Barbados, Belarus, Botswana, Burkina Faso, Cambodia, Cuba, North Korea, Ghana, Guam, Haiti, Iran, Iraq, Jamaica, Jordan, Libya, Mali, Malta, Mauritius, Morocco, Myanmar, Nicaragua, Pakistan, Panama, Philippines, Russia, Samoa, Senegal, Somalia, South Sudan, Sudan, Syria, The Cayman Islands, The Bahamas, Trinidad and Tobago, Turkey, Uganda, US Virgin Islands, Vanuatu, Venezuela, Yemen, Zimbabwe, Crimea, Donetsk, and Luhansk from using any services.They are partnered with Bancor, Kraken, ETHLend, Nano, Bitfinex, Binance, Kucoin, Ethfinex, and Bitstamp.At this time they have a social media presence on most major platforms like Twitter, Facebook, LinkedIn, and Instagram.

Emirex is a cryptocurrency exchange from the United Arab Emirates, but it is registered in Estonia. It has been active since 2019. The platform has - as is customary - two Estonian licensesFinancial services, providing a virtual currency wallet service;Financial services, providing services of exchanging a virtual currency against a fiat currency; Number FVT000400These licenses are both issued by the Estonian Police and Boarder Authority (Politsei - ja Piirivalveamet).Emirex is an innovative platform that includes an exchange and a marketplace where users can exchange any store of value for digital assets. It highly values the power of Digital Assets and strives to make this world a place with more economic freedom through public, open, fair, censorship-resistant networks that better serve humanity.

ERX provides services for buying, selling, exchanging, and maintaining digital tokens to individuals aged 20 years and above. ERX’s services are also available to both Thai and foreign juristic persons. ERX provides a cash balance/cash deposit service wherein users must fully deposit sufficient cash to ERX before purchasing digital tokens. When the user purchases digital tokens, cash will be deducted from the user’s digital wallet. When users sell digital tokens, users must have sufficient digital tokens balance in their account.The use of the ERX website or the interpretation of the terms and conditions of use of their website shall be governed by Thai law. Any dispute, conflict, or demand arising from or related to their Terms of Service, breach, termination, or invalidation of this agreement shall be referred to arbitration in accordance with the rules of the Thailand Arbitration Center in effect at that time and will be managed by the Thailand Arbitration Center. ERX will not deprive the parties’ rights to bring litigation through the courts.ERX aims to centralize trading volumes of approved digital tokens in Thailand. They allow you to buy and sell investment and utility tokens in a secure way. ERX's goal is to enhance the liquidity in real estate and other illiquid assets.

Launched in 2019, ETERBASE is a cryptocurrency exchange in Slovakia. Offers its customers fiat-to- crypto (and vice-vice) and crypto-to- crypto transactions. Services are provided by "ETERBASE a.s." a joint stock company (“akciova spolocnost”), registered in Slovakia (Hurbanovo námestie 3, 811 06 Bratislava Slovakia), entered in the Slovak commercial register under the corporate number ICO 52 380 505.ETERBASE paused operations since April 2021 (until further notice) due to partners and financial providers loss, presumably following a hack in Sept 2020 during which $5.4M in crypto were stolen from six hot wallets: Ether, Tezos, Bitcoin, ALGO, Ripple, and TRON. https://www.tripwire.com/state-of-security/featured/cryptocurrency-exchange-eterbase-hacked-5-4-million-worth-of-funds-stolen/ (A hot wallet is a cryptocurrency wallet that is connected to the internet).The Eterbase Utility Token (XBASE) has been the native utility token for the Eterbase exchange.

Founded in 2007, eToro is a multi-asset platform which offers both investing in stocks, digital assets as well as CFDs. Etoro allows traders to speculate on the future market movements of an underlying asset, without actually owning or taking physical delivery of the underlying asset. Regarding digital assets, eToro provides a cryptocurrency trading platform and a wallet, claiming to have a global community of 20 million users. Among the features offered by the platform, eToro also provided a patented technology named CopyTrader™, allowing for automatic of other users’ trading portfolio performance.The platform currently has subsidiaries in Europe, UK, Australia, Germany, and Seychelles. Crypto investing is offered by eToro (Europe) Ltd. They are domiciled in Cyprus and are governed by the applicable laws of such as well. If users are located in Europe, services are provided by "eToro (Europe) Ltd.", a Financial Services Company authorized and regulated by the Cyprus Securities Exchange Commission (CySEC) under the license # 109/10 and, where applicable, eToro Germany GmbH for German residents trading cryptocurrencies only. If users are located in the UK, services are provided by "eToro (UK) Ltd", a Financial Services Company authorized and regulated by the Financial Conduct Authority (FCA) under the license FRN 583263. If users are located in Australia, services are provided by "eToro AUS Capital Limited" authorized by the Australian Securities and Investments Commission (ASIC) to provide financial services under Australian Financial Services License 491139.In Seychelles, services are provided by "eToro (Seychelles) Ltd" licensed by the Financial Services Authority Seychelles ("FSAS") to provide broker-dealer services under the Securities Act 2007 License #SD076. In the US services are provided by "eToro USA LLC" , a company regulated by the SEC and offers only cryptocurrencies (no CFDs for the moment). Currently they have a social media presence on Twitter, LinkedIn, and Facebook.

Founded in 2007, eToro is a multi-asset platform which offers both investing in stocks, digital assets as well as CFDs (A contract for difference (CFD) allows traders to speculate on the future market movements of an underlying asset, without actually owning or taking physical delivery of the underlying asset). eToro is one of the largest trading platforms supports 30+ cryptoassets, including 17 unique stable coins, DeFi, privacy coin Zcash and the infrastructure to support ERC20 tokens and tokenized assets backed by USD (80+ tokenized pairs). On the date of the review (May 2nd, 2022), eToroX ranks 43rd in terms of 24-hr volume.(https://coinmarketcap.com/rankings/exchanges). In addition, eToro provides a cryptocurrency trading platform and a digital wallet service. The platform is currently established in Europe, UK, Australia and Seychelles: If you are located in Europe, services are provided by "eToro (Europe) Ltd.", a Financial Services Company authorised and regulated by the Cyprus Securities Exchange Commission (CySEC) under the license # 109/10 and, where applicable, eToro Germany GmbH for German residents trading cryptoassets only. The laws of Cyprus apply to the European Terms and Conditions. Residents domiciled in Canada, or residents or citizens of the United States of America, are prohibited and both countries considered as “blocked countries”.If you are located in the UK, services are provided by "eToro (UK) Ltd", a Financial Services Company authorised and regulated by the Financial Conduct Authority (FCA) under the license FRN 583263. Residents domiciled in Canada, or residents or citizens of the United States of America, are prohibited and both countries considered as “blocked countries”.If you are located in Australia, services are provided by "eToro AUS Capital Limited" authorised by the Australian Securities and Investments Commission (ASIC) to provide financial services under Australian Financial Services License 491139.In Seychelles, services are provided by "eToro (Seychelles) Ltd" licenced by the Financial Services Authority Seychelles ("FSAS") to provide broker-dealer services under the Securities Act 2007 License #SD076. In addition to previously mentioned USA and Canada, Cayman Islands are also considered as “blocked countries”.In the US services are provided by "eToro USA LLC" , a company regulated by the SEC and offers only cryptoassets (no CFDs for the moment). Among the features offered by the platform, eToro also provided a patented technology named CopyTrader™, allowing for automatic of other users’ trading portfolio performance.eToroX is eToro’s professional crypto exchange and wallet application, launched in 2018. Services are provided via eToro X Limited, a company located and incorporated in Gibraltar with registered number 116348, which is authorised by the Gibraltar Financial Services Commission as a Distributed Ledger Technology. Governing law: Gibraltar. eToro money service is provided by eToro Germany GmbH., a company incorporated in Germany with registered number HRB 253202 and supervised by Bundesanstalt für Finanzdienstleistungsaufsicht, Bafin. Governing law: Germany

Founded in 2005, Evogates is a cryptoCurrencies & e-currencies services provider company. Supports 15 cryptocurrencies including privacy coins Monero and Zcash, and its native Evocoin (EVO) token, which can be purchased via third-party payment providers: Perfect Money, Payeer, Advanced Cash and PayPal. Evogates unusually slim Terms of Service do not mention who is providing these services, domicile, or applicable law, which would suggest being cautious if deciding to transact.

Exchange Point is owned and operated by Waypoint Ventures OÜ, (14421900), holder of license with the Estonian Financial Intelligence Unit. License Number FVT000275 for providing services of Virtual Currency Exchange Service and Virtual Currency Wallet Service. Exchange Point allows users to purchase cryptocurrencies with a credit card as well as convert Bitcoin to Ethereum and visa versa. At this time they accept Mastercard, Visa, And Interac transactions for the purchase of crypto. At this time they support Bitcoin and Ethereum.They are domiciled in Estonia with their registered address located at Harju Maakond, Kesklinna Linnaosa, Parda tn 8-46, 10151, Estonia. They are governed by the applicable laws of Estonia as well.

EXMO Exchange Ltd. (EXMO), founded in 2014 and headquartered in London, England, is a cryptocurrency exchange, wallet and trading platform that has more than 180 trading pairs, exchange token EXMO Coin, and operates with more than 6 fiat currencies. For a full list, see link: https://exmo.com/The platform operates via “EXMO Group” which includes the following companies: UAB EXMO Exchange is a company duly incorporated and validly existing under the laws of the Republic of Lithuania. They operate the platform and provides services to Users from the European Economic Area (EEA) and the United Kingdom of Great Britain and Northern Ireland.EXMO Exchange US INC. is a company duly incorporated and validly existing under the laws of the State of Delaware. EXMO Exchange US Inc. operates the platform and provides services to users from the United States of America.EXMO Exchange LTD. is a company duly incorporated and validly existing under the laws of England and Wales.Governing law is that of England and Wales in the United Kingdom. The platform also has a list of restricted jurisdictions which can be found here: https://info.exmo.com/en/user-agreement/In late December 2020, EXMO had their wallets compromised and was hacked, in six cryptocurrencies out of 57 supported: BTC, XRP, USDT, ETH, ETC, ZEC, sent to an address that accrued 309.00 BTC, worth around $7M at the time of writing. EXMO stressed that those users affected by the incident will be covered by the exchange. https://hotforexsignals.com/bitcoin-exchange-exmo-gets-hacked-stops-withdrawals/They have a social media presence on Facebook, Twitter, and Linkedin.

Established late 2016 following an ICO, Exscudo proclaims itself as the next-gen financial ecosystem. All Exscudo services are connected to the liquidity center via EON, a proprietary decentralized blockchain based-platform that provides an infrastructure for the Exscudo Ecosystem services. EON Coin is the native token in the EON blockchain. They are currently in the process of developing another token, called FTP token.Users can trade, lend, borrow, and exchange cryptocurrencies and EON against other cryptocurrencies and/or fiat funds with other eligible users and visa versa, transmit cryptocurrencies and EON to other Eligible Users, and exchange and communicate with other users using text messages, photo, audio, video and other files. Services are provided by Exscudo OÜ, a limited company registered in Tallinn, Estonia (registry number 14172383), operating with a license (FVT000189) to provide virtual currency services. They are domiciled in The United Kingdom. Applicable law is that of Estonia. US citizens are expressly prohibited from using the services of the Exscudos platform.At this time they have a social media presence on Twitter, LinkedIn and Facebook.

FalconX is a digital asset trading platform that provides clients fast, secure and reliable execution using data science to eliminate slippage and hidden fees.They claim that they are fortunate to be backed by a wide range of investors including: Accel, Fidelity, B-Capital, Tiger Global, Accomplice, Coinbase, Fenbushi Capital, Flybridge Capital, Lightspeed Venture Partners, and others. They specialize in Blockchain, Crypto, Cryptocurrencies, Trading, and Brokerage.FalconX Limited is both domiciled and subpoenable in the United States. They also have offices in Malta and India.Founders of FalconX Limited have experienced the pitfalls of crypto market fragmentation firsthand, while trading their own strategies. They identified market structure issues including complex inventory management, price discovery, and unreliable market data. After years spent leading teams as serial entrepreneurs, and leadership roles at Google and Accel, they founded FalconX to fill these voids. For open, permissionless, and truly global digital assets to be adopted by mainstream institutions at scale, today's digital infrastructure is grossly inadequate. FalconX's mission is to build this connective tissue. Our technology will provide the infrastructure for the future of digital assets and enable seamless price discovery, trade execution, and transfer of value.

LegalName: Felixo Teknoloji ve Yazılım Anonim Şirketi
OrgNotes: Founded in 2018, Felixo is a crypto asset trading platform based in Turkey, that provides advanced services for crypto money traders and global liquidity providers. (Exchange, Margin Trading, Lending, OTC etc.). Supports 15 BTC pairs (including privacy coins: Monero & Zcash), 4 USDT pairs and fiat currency: Turkish Lira (TRY). Services are provided by Felixo Teknoloji ve Yazilim Anonim Sirketi (FELIXO Technology and Software Inc.) a company with an address in Istanbul, trade nr. 150922-5 mersis (electronic trade) number 0385120259200001, tax number 3851202592. Applicable law: Republic of Turkey. USA citizens are restricted fr0m using the services of this platform. FLX token (FLX) is the utility token to be used on the Felixo.com platform primarily to be used for: Store of Value, Staking, discounts in commissions and fees etc. FLX can be stored on Felixo wallets to benefit fr0m Airdrops, voting, commission discount etc., but they can also be stored in soft/hard Avalanche (AVAX) Wallets.

Launched in 2018, FinanceX is a cryptocurrency exchange presumably headquartered in Singapore. Services are provided by "OKB Technology Company Limited" a company registered in Hong Kong https://www.ltddir.com/companies/okc-financial-company-limited/ At the time of the review (11 Aug 2021), it is unclear whether the exchange is active or not, as many of the website’s tabs, including the Terms of Service, “Trade” tab, and others show either an “Error” or “Under maintenance” message upon being clicked, which would suggest being cautious. USA (among other countries) is restricted. Applicable law: Hong Kong. FinanceX Token (FNX) is the native token in the FinanceX exchange, associated with benefits and discounts for its token holders

LegalName: FISCO Virtual Currency Exchange Co., Ltd
OrgNotes: FISCO cryptocurrency exchange is no longer active, since in Feb, 2020 it merged with “Zaif” exchange. FISCO’s URL [https://fcce.jp/] now redirects to Zaif’s website, [https://zaif.jp/. Zaif is a Japanese cryptocurrency exchange, licensed and regulated by the Japanese Financial Services Agency (JFSA). Services are provided by "Zaif Co. Ltd." a company registered in Japan. Governing law: Tokyo, Japan. In 2018, Zaif exchange was hacked with about $60 million worth of cryptocurrency (including bitcoin, bitcoin cash and MonaCoin) stolen from hot wallets (Hot wallets are connected to the internet and allow for faster cryptocurrency transactions).(https://www.coindesk.com/crypto-exchange-zaif-hacked-in-60-million-6000-bitcoin-theft, and https://asia.nikkei.com/Spotlight/Cryptocurrencies/Japanese-cryptocurrency-exchange-Zaif-hacked-for-60m2). Because the exchange’s assets were not enough to compensate for the hack, Zaif reached an agreement with FISCO to receive a substantial investment in exchange for large shares of ownership.(https://www.coindesk.com/crypto-exchange-zaif-hacked-in-60-million-6000-bitcoin-theft, https://asia.nikkei.com/Spotlight/Cryptocurrencies/Japanese-cryptocurrency-exchange-Zaif-hacked-for-60m2).

Launched in 2015, FlowBTC allows its users to buy and sell cryptocurrencies and deposit or withdraw fiat. Services are provided by Flow Representacoes, a company incorporated and registered under the laws of the Federal Republic of Brazil, registered with the CNPJ/MF (Cadastro Nacional de Pessoas Juridicas) under No. 21.658.868/0001-53. FlowBTC is part of Finchain Group, which provides the FLOWBTC platform and PandaPay, a digital multi-currency wallet. They currently support Bitcoin, Ethereum, EOS, Ripple, Litecoin, Bitcoin Cash, MCO2 and cUSD. MCO2 is a MOSS asset that represents one carbon credit. Each carbon credit is equivalent to one ton of CO2 emissions that are not released into the atmosphere. cUSD (Celo Dollar), is a stablecoin which algorithmically tracks the value of the U.S. Dollar.At this time, they have a social media presence on Twitter, Instagram, Facebook, LinkedIn, and YouTube.

Previously known as Bitcoin.com, FMFW.io is a cryptocurrency exchange with more than 90 trading pairs. At this time, they support Bitcoin, Ethereum, Litecoin, USD Tether, Ripple, Binance, Solana and more. They also offer their own wallet service and claim it helps lower the risk of being hacked to zero.FMFW does not offer derivative trading or other similar products to citizens of the following countries: Australia, Germany, Hong Kong, Italy, Japan, Netherlands, Ontario, and the United Kingdom.They are partnered with The HBAR Foundation, MoonPay, Mercuryo, CLS, LUMI, BANXA, ALTonomy, Changelly, and Changelly PRO at this time.They have a presence on most social media platforms including Twitter and LinkedIn.

Folgory was launched in May 2019. They have social media presence on Twitter and LinkedIn. They have a brand of Folgory Corp and Hashfort OU which are all based in Seychelles. They are partnered with Auth0 and Amazon, offer a debit card and a mobile app for users that is available on Google Play. Folgory provides users with a platform that matches their trades with open orders from other users. Users can trade crypto-to-crypto assets but they do not provide fiat-to-fiat currency trades. Folgory will be governed by and construed in accordance with the internal laws of Europe.General Terms and Conditions also mentions "HashFort OÜ" a company registered in Tallinn, Estonia (company registry 14648319) with a license to provide crypto-to-fiat exchange services (FRV000672), and a license to provide a virtual currency wallet service (FRK000579). However, both licenses appear to have expired 02 July, 2020, without having submitted annual statements for the period Jan 2019 - Dec 2020.https://www.teatmik.ee/en/personlegal/14648319-HashFort-O%C3%9C%20Finally%20Folgory%20has%20been%20associated%20with%20adverse%20media%20posts%20https:/www.cryptowisser.com/exchange/folgory

Founded in 2014 and headquartered in Brazil, Foxbit (Foxbit Servicos Digital SA) is a cryptocurrency exchange that allows users to trade +40 crypto assets between cryptocurrencies, DeFi tokens, NFT, games and the metaverse. Their Terms of Use and the relationship between the Parties will be governed by the laws of the Federative Republic of Brazil. The Parties elect the Sao Paulo District Court as being the only one competent to settle any disputes and/or demands that may involve the Parties in relation to the Services.Foxbit Exchange: Trading cryptocurrencies, DeFi tokens, Stablecoins, metaverse tokens, NFT and games. In addition to exclusive services and other crypto products for investments.Foxbit Invest: Since 2016, it is an OTC trading desk, offering a personalized service for companies, institutions and large investors who want to trade high volume in crypto assets, ensuring the best market price and liquidity in trading.Foxbit Business: With their crypto-as-a-service solutions, API integrations and asset tokenization, Foxbit Business brings your business into the new crypto economy. Whatever your business segment.Currencies Supported: BTC, ETH, LTC, TrueUSD; XRP (Ripple), Chainlink (LINK), Tether (USDT), Chiliz (CHZ), AAVE, Uniswap (UNI), Yearn.finance (YFI), Synthetix (SNX), NEXO, ZRX (0x), OMG.

FTX Trading Ltd. (FTX), founded in 2019 headquartered in the Bahamas, is a cryptocurrency exchange offering the buying, selling, exchanging, holding, of cryptocurrencies. They support Bitcoin, Ethereum, APecoin, Solana, Dogecoin, BNB, Bitcoin Cash, AAAVE, BSV, XRipple, Zcash and more.FTX Trading Ltd incorporated in Antigua and Barbuda. Applicable law is that of Antigua and Barbuda. FTX Digital Markets Ltd. is a subsidiary of FTX Trading Ltd. For extended information about their license and registration see link:https://help.ftx.com/hc/en-us/articles/360056976411-Jurisdiction-regulations-licensing-and-practicesServices are currently not offered to residents of the United States, Cuba, Crimea and Sevastopol, Luhansk People's Republic, Donetsk People's Republic, Iran, Afghanistan, Syria, or North Korea. Also included are corporate accounts located in or residents of Antigua or Barbuda.Partial restrictions may exist with other jurisdictions, including Hong Kong, Thailand, Malaysia, and Canada.Partners of FTX include: Circle, True USD, Paxos, Fenwick & West, Proof of Capital, Galois Capital, Sequoia, Paradigm, Ribbit Capital, Multicoin Capital, Thoma Bravo, and Lightspeed Venture Partners.As of April 4th, 2022, FTX has acquired Liquid as part of their pland to expand their services into Japan. They will rename this platform to FTX Japan in the future. All new users of Liquid are being directed to FTX to create an account. More on this can be found in the articles below:https://blog.liquid.com/acquisition-liquid-ftxhttps://blockworks.co/ftx-acquires-liquid-group-expanding-presence-in-japanFTX has an app that is available on all platforms, it is available on Google Play and the Apple App Store. They have social media presence on Twitter, Facebook, and LinkedIn.

They will rename this platform to FTX Japan in the future. All new users of Liquid are being directed to FTX to create an account. More on this can be found in the articles below:https://blog.liquid.com/acquisition-liquid-ftxhttps://blockworks.co/ftx-acquires-liquid-group-expanding-presence-in-japanFTX has an app that is available on all platforms, it is available on Google Play and the Apple App Store. They have social media presence on Twitter, Facebook, and LinkedIn.

FTX Trading Ltd. (FTX), founded in 2019 headquartered in the Bahamas, is a cryptocurrency exchange offering the buying, selling, exchanging, holding, of cryptocurrencies. They support Bitcoin, Ethereum, APecoin, Solana, Dogecoin, BNB, Bitcoin Cash, AAAVE, BSV, XRipple, Zcash and more.FTX Trading Ltd incorporated in Antigua and Barbuda. Applicable law is that of Antigua and Barbuda. FTX Digital Markets Ltd. is a subsidiary of FTX Trading Ltd. For extended information about their license and registration see link:https://help.ftx.com/hc/en-us/articles/360056976411-Jurisdiction-regulations-licensing-and-practicesServices are currently not offered to residents of the United States, Cuba, Crimea and Sevastopol, Luhansk People's Republic, Donetsk People's Republic, Iran, Afghanistan, Syria, or North Korea. Also included are corporate accounts located in or residents of Antigua or Barbuda.Partial restrictions may exist with other jurisdictions, including Hong Kong, Thailand, Malaysia, and Canada.Partners of FTX include: Circle, True USD, Paxos, Fenwick & West, Proof of Capital, Galois Capital, Sequoia, Paradigm, Ribbit Capital, Multicoin Capital, Thoma Bravo, and Lightspeed Venture Partners.As of April 4th, 2022, FTX has acquired Liquid as part of their pland to expand their services into Japan. They will rename this platform to FTX Japan in the future. All new users of Liquid are being directed to FTX to create an account. More on this can be found in the articles below:https://blog.liquid.com/acquisition-liquid-ftxhttps://blockworks.co/ftx-acquires-liquid-group-expanding-presence-in-japanFTX has an app that is available on all platforms, it is available on Google Play and the Apple App Store. They have social media presence on Twitter, Facebook, and LinkedIn.

Launched in 2019, FTX is a cryptocurrency exchange proclaimed to have been built "by traders, for traders", to buy, sell, exchange, hold, or otherwise transact in Digital Assets, focusing on crypto-derivatives trading. Services are provided by West Realm Shires Inc., domiciled in the United States. They are governed by the applicable laws of California, United States. At this time they do not permit users from Washington or New York. FTX US offers spot trading, liquidity, as well as futures orders books. They currently support Bitcoin, Litecoin, Ethereum, Bitcoin Cash, PAXG and USDT. FTX Token (FTT) is the native ERC20 Token (not available in the United States and other prohibited jurisdictions) associated with discounts in trading fees for its token holders.Currently they have a social media presence on Twitter, Facebook, and LinkedIn.

FXcoin Co., Ltd. Established: September 21, 2017 Business description: Virtual currency-related business Capital: 1 billion yen (including capital reserve) Representative director: Tomoo Onishi Headquarters location: 1-6 Roppongi, Minato-ku, Tokyo No. 1 Izumi Garden Tower 10th floor Major trading banks: Resona Bank, Sumitomo SBI Net Bank Shareholders: Tomio Onishi SBI Group Money Partners Group Sumitomo Corporation Domestic and overseas investor affiliates: Japan Cryptocurrency Exchange Association Type 2 member Regular member of Japan Cryptocurrency Business Association.FXcoin is a company from Tokyo, Japan, with a two-corporate philosophies of "sound development and expansion of the crypto asset (virtual currency) market" and "improvement of Japanese financial literacy". Aside of various cryptocurrency related articles, it does not seem to actually trade cryptocurrencies.Services are provided by FXcoin Co., Ltd, a company established in 2017, in Tokyo, Japan, engaged in crytpocurrency related business, with a cryptocurrency exchange business registration number: Kanto Finance Bureau No. 00019.

FxPro is an investment platform where users can invest in oil, gold, CFDs, or indices. Services offered include spot trading and futures trading. For cryptocurrency, they offer a pairs trading system for Bitcoin, Ethereum, and Solana. Fiat currencies supported on this platform include $USD, $EUR, $GBP, $CHF, $PLN, $AUD, $JPY, and $ZAR. They accept funds from bank transfers, Visa/Mastercard, Skrill, UnionPay, and Neteller.In the UK, their legal name is FxPro UK Ltd. In Cyprus, they are under FxPro Financial Services Ltd. In the Bahamas, they are under FxPro Global Markets Ltd.FxPro is domiciled in The United Kingdom and have other office locations in Cyprus, Monaco, and The Bahamas. They are subpoenable in the Bahamas.They have a social media presence on Twitter, Facebook, and LinkedIn.

Launched in 2014, GateHub (GateHub Limited), is registered in London UK. They are a cryptocurrency exchange and wallet provider. The platform supports two types of wallets: XRPL Wallets: non-custodial virtual asset wallets on the XRPL (XRP Ledger) Hosted Wallets: custodial virtual asset wallets provided by GateHub In addition to Ripple (XRP), GateHub offers trading in following cryptocurrencies: Bitcoin (BTC), Bitcoin Cash (BCH), Ethereum (ETH), Ethereum Classic (ETC), Litecoin (LTC), Augur (REP), Dash (DASH), Quantum (QUA), Stellar (XLM), and Xaucoin (XAU). Xaucoin is a proof-of-work cryptocurrency based on Bitcoin that aims to be a gold-like asset and store of value.Governing law: English law. Subject to the Applicable Law, the courts of England have non-exclusive jurisdiction to settle any dispute arising from or connected with their Terms of Use.In 2019, GateHub was hacked with about $10 million worth of XRP from XRP Ledger wallets being stolen (https://gatehub.net/blog/gatehub-preliminary-statement/ and https://www.zdnet.com/article/hackers-steal-9-5-million-from-gatehub-cryptocurrency-wallets/). Since the hack, GateHub has introduced additional security features such as multisig, fraud shield and Theft Cover by Coincover (transactions are monitored in real time and all your crypto is fully protected and covered up to $100k).

Gibraltar based Global Blockchain Exchange (GBX) has been bought by Australian exchange, “Mine Digital” https://minedigital.exchange/ and as of January 2021, GBX has been closed. Trading and withdrawals have been ceased and all user accounts are now closed.
