Gibraltar based Global Blockchain Exchange (GBX) has been bought by Australian exchange, “Mine Digital” https://minedigital.exchange/ and as of January 2021, GBX has been closed. Trading and withdrawals have been ceased and all user accounts are now closed.

Founded in 2015, by brothers Cameron and Tyler Winklevoss, Gemini is a next generation custodial cryptocurrency exchange that allows customers to buy, sell, and store 60+ digital assets such as Bitcoin and Ethereum. Gemini is supported in all 50 USA states and 50+ additional countries. Gemini is the issuer of the Gemini Dollar (GUSD) which is a USD 1:1 pegged ERC20 stablecoin. GUSD reserves are eligible for FDIC insurance up to $250,000 per user while in the custody of State Street Bank and Trust. The Gemini dollar (GUSD) can be used to transact on decentralized exchanges by trading and staking, earn high yields in DeFi and through Gemini Earn, spend in daily lives: spend at stores with Gemini Pay.In Europe, services are provided by Gemini Europe Services Ltd, a company registered in the UK (company number 12471710), providing cryptoasset exchange and custody services, and registered with the Financial Conduct Authority as a cryptoasset business. Gemini Europe Ltd company number 11497305 is an affiliate of Gemini Europe Services Ltd and is an electronic money institution authorized and regulated by the Financial Conduct Authority in the United Kingdom with firm reference number 900988, they issue electronic money and provide related payment services.In the United States, services are provided by Gemini Trust Company, LLC a New York trust company, that is held to the highest level of fiduciary obligations, capital reserve requirements, and banking compliance standards, regulated by the New York State Department of Financial Services (NYSDFS). As a trust company, Gemini is exempt from having to register with the Financial Crimes Enforcement Network (FinCEN), a bureau of the U.S. Department of Treasury, however, has an account with FinCEN to file necessary compliance reports. Gemini Exchange plans to expand its operations in Southeast Asia (Hong Kong and Australia) in an attempt to capitalize on the region’s growth. https://www.coindesk.com/gemini-hong-kong-australia-growthCurrently they have a social media presence on most major platforms including Instagram, Facebook, Twitter, and LinkedIn.

General Bytes Services S.R.O. (General Bytes), founded in 2013, is a bitcoin ATM provider that offers the services of bitcoin, blockchain, and cryptocurrency ATM manufacturer.General Bytes is headquartered in Czech Republic and has office locations in the United States, United Kingdom, Estonia, and Panama. Supports three types of Bitcoin ATMs, have sold 13,769+ machines in 143+ countries, supporting 180+ fiat currencies and a wide range of cryptocurrencies. They support BTC, ETH, Doge, Dash, Litecoin, and more. For all supported currencies, see link: https://www.generalbytes.com/en/They have social media presence on Twitter, Facebook, and Linkedin.

Genesis are Bitcoin ATM manufacturers. Their hardware and software allows customers to buy and sell Bitcoin, and other digital commodities, for cash. It offers various types of crypto ATMs with features such as: 2- way (cash in & cash out) , 1-way (only cash in), paper wallets, identity verification, electronic cash vault, high-definition camera, dedicated barcode scanner, optional fingerprint reader etc. Supported cryptos: Bitcoin, Litecoin, Dogecoin. Services are provided by Genesis Coin Inc, a US company.

Cryptocurrencies have the potential to be as revolutionary and widely adopted as the internet. Globiance X Limited (Globiance), founded 2018 and headquartered in the British Virgin Islands, is a financial service group of cryptocurrency exchanges and financial institutions also located in North and South America, Europe, Africa, Asia and Australia. Globiance provides financial services for corporate and retail customers. The Globiance platform offers the exchange and trading of crypto and fiat currencies (SGD, EUR, HKD, GBP, USD, etc.), stable coins, payment solutions and worldwide transfers.https://bvi.globiance.comTheir terms are governed by the laws of the British Virgin Islands and ultimately the United Kingdom. Any disputes will be settled in the exclusive jurisdiction of the British Virgin Islands.The website previously mentioned the following associated companies: Globiance Pte Limited (Singapore) Globiance PTY LTD Australia Globiance USA Inc (USA)Globiance A.S. (Turkey)Globiance X Limited (BVI)Globiance CH AG (Switzerland)Globiance SA Pty Ltd (South Africa)They have social media presence on Twitter, Facebook, and Linkedin.

Globitex is a third-party cryptocurrency exchange that is registered in Lithuania (applicable law Lithuania). The platform has been operational since 2015 The cryptos available to trade here are Bitcoin, Ethereum and the exchange's own native token - the GBX.In addition to depositing cryptocurrency to the platform, Globitex also lets you deposit fiat currency. However, only through wire transfer (no credit or debit card).

As of the review on June 15,2022, the GOPAX URL is: https://www.gopax.co.kr, and is in service.Upon further investigation, we have found anew URL for this org and it would they are still functional, operating mainly out of South Korea, with offices in Hong Kong as well. In September, 2021, GOPAX issued the following statement on their website: "Dear GOPAX.com users,Unfortunately, according to the new law that is effective as of September 25, non-Korean residents cannot use virtual asset-related services provided by an entity resided in South Korea.In order to comply with the new law, GOPAX.com inevitably ceased operation on September 17th 00:00 UTC (September 17th 09:00 KST)Our sincere apologies and gratitude to all users.For any related inquiries, please contact help@gopax.co.krSincerely, GOPAX.com"Therefore, the GOPAX exchange is closed. Previous notes: Co-founded by Harvard and Stanford graduates in 2015, Gopax is a Korean virtual asset exchange, with offices in Seoul, Korea and Hong Kong. Gopax stands for "Global Online Professional Assets Exchange". Provides virtual asset transaction (sale/purchases/ market price information related services) and related services (open API, virtual asset-related information, electronic wallet, etc.). 30+ cryptocurrency coins and tokens are supported including privacy coins (ZCash). In Korea services are provided by "Streami Co Ltd" a company registered in Seoul (registration number 432-87-00120) and in Hong Kong services are provided by "Streami HK Limited" a company registered in Hong Kong (registration number 65762756). Applicable law: Republic of Korea.In May 2021, "Digital Currency Group" makes a strategic investment in Streami. Today, DCG sits at the epicenter of the industry, backing more than 175 blockchain-related companies in over 35 countries. DCG also invests directly in digital currencies and other digital assets. In addition to its investment portfolio, DCG is the parent company of Genesis (a global digital asset prime brokerage), Grayscale Investments (the largest digital currency asset manager), CoinDesk (a leading financial media, data, and information company), Foundry (a leader in bitcoin mining and staking) and Luno (a leading cryptocurrency platform with an international footprint). https://www.businesswire.com/news/home/20210506005057/en/Digital-Currency-Group-Makes-Strategic-Investment-in-Streami-the-Leading-South-Korean-Cryptocurrency-Exchange-Operator and https://www.coindesk.com/digital-currency-group-invests-in-south-korean-crypto-exchange Team: Junhaeng Lee: CEO & Co-Founder, Yunjin Gong: CTO & Co-Founder, Park Jun-sang: CFO & Co-Founder

Launched in 2017, Guardarian is a cryptocurrency exchange based in Estonia. Supports fiat-to-crypto (and vice-versa) but not crypto-to-crypto, and offers both physical and digital crypto debit cards. Guardarian supports 23 fiat currencies and 300+ coins including privacy coin Monero, which at the time of the review (June 13, 2022) is available to buy, but not to sell. Services are provided by Guardarian OÜ, a company registered in Tallinn, Estonia (registry code: 14320990), operating with a license (FVT000200), to provide virtual currency services, issued by the respective Estonian authority. Guardarian is associated to Guarda Wallet which as non-custodial, multi-currency wallet that proclaims to support 10K+ tokens/assets/stablecoins, across 45 blockchains. Guarda Wallet virtual currency services are provided by GUARDACO LDA, is a private limited company, founded in 2017 (legal entity ID: 516458965), registered in Portugal. Guardarian provides all the fiat and crypto exchanges services for Guarda Wallet.

HappyCOINS is a cryptocurrency exchange that allows users to buy, sell, store, manage, and exchange their digital assets. The cryptocurrencies supported on this platform are Bitcoin, Bitcoin Cash, Ethereum, Litecoin Lumen, and Algorand. Users can purchase crypto with these affiliated transaction companies: iDEAL, Bancontact Mister Cash, GiroPay, MyBank, Sofort and EPS. Wire transfers are also another service provided and it could take up to 3 days.HappyCoins is domiciled and subpoenable in Netherlands. They have a social media presence on Twitter, Facebook, and LinkedIn.

Hashing 24 offers cryptocurrency mining without users having to purchase any mining equipment. Users choose hashpower, purchase a plan, and Hashing24 sends your order to BitFury mining data centers and the mining process begins. They offer a 12 month, 18 month, 24 month, and 30 month plan for users to purchase from. They accept Bitcoin, Altcoins, and credit and debit cards for payment. Newly mined coins are credited to users balance once daily, for the previous mining day. Users may request a withdrawal at any time, however, the minimum amount allowed to withdraw is 0.0007 BTC.Hashing24 goes by the legal name of LIVIKA LP and is domiciled in Ireland. They are governed by the applicable laws of Ireland and do not seem to restrict the residents of any countries at this time.Currently they have a social media presence on both Twitter and Facebook.

HAYVN is an institutional digital currency platform including Sales & Trading, Custody, Asset Management, Research, and Payments. Supports 3 pairs: BTC/USD, ETH/USD and USDT/USD. LinkedIn indicates that HAYVN Global is headquartered in Abu Dhabi. Services are provided by "AC HOLDING LIMITED", an exempted company with limited liability incorporated pursuant to the laws of the Cayman Islands and having its registered office at Cayman Islands. Governing law: Cayman Islands. At time of review 4/29/22 it appears that Hayvn is subpoenable in the united kingdom found in terms of service

Founded in 2013, Huobi Group is the world's leading blockchain company with a mission to accelerate the digital economy through breakthrough innovations in core blockchain technologies. Huobi Group's operations across multiple sectors, including enterprise and public blockchains, digital assets trading, cryptocurrency wallets, and industry research, reaching tens of millions of users in over 170 countries and regions. As it continues to build a global ecosystem for the future digital economy, Huobi Group remains focused on growing its diverse range of regulatory-compliant services https://www.linkedin.com/company/huobi/about/.Huobi.com, HuobiGlobal, HuobiPro, HADAX, Huobi Argentina use shared deposit addresses. For details on Huobi.com, HuobiGlobal, HuobiPro, HADAX, Huobi Argentina interactions, see HuobiGlobal.Huobi.com. Finally, the link https://huobi.com seems no longer active as the website is not loading.

HuobiGlobal partners include: FCSSC, CIDA, ChainHR, INBlockchain, FIBIG CAPITAL, SVIEF, FREE FUND, NABA, NODE CAPITAL, SEAUOIA, FENBUSHI CAPITAL, LINK CAPITAL, and DHVC.As of April 2022: USERS FROM THE FOLLOWING JURISDICTIONS ARE PROHIBITED FROM USING ALL SERVICES: MAINLAND CHINA, THE UNITED STATES OF AMERICA, CANADA, JAPAN, CUBA, IRAN, NORTH KOREA, SUDAN, SYRIA, VENEZUELA, SINGAPORE AND CRIMEA.USERS FROM THE FOLLOWING JURISDICTIONS ARE PROHIBITED FROM TRADING IN DERIVATIVES: HONG KONG CHINA, ISRAEL, IRAQ, BANGLADESH, BOLIVIA, ECUADOR, KYRGYZSTAN, SEVASTOPOL AND UNITED KINGDOM (RETAIL USERS ONLY).THE LIST OF RESTRICTED JURISDICTIONS MAY CHANGE AND DIFFER ACCORDING TO CHANGES IN OUR POLICIES AND THE SERVICES WE OFFER TO A PARTICULAR JURISDICTION. IN THE EVENT OF SUCH CHANGE, WE MAY NOT PROVIDE NOTICE TO YOU. YOU ARE REQUIRED TO REFER TO THE LATEST INFORMATION ON THE PLATFORM OR THIS AGREEMENT TO BE INFORMED OF SUCH CHANGES.Founded in 2013, Huobi Group is the world's leading blockchain company with a mission to accelerate the digital economy through breakthrough innovations in core blockchain technologies. Huobi Group's operations across multiple sectors, including enterprise and public blockchains, digital assets trading, cryptocurrency wallets, and industry research, reaching tens of millions of users in over 170 countries and regions. As it continues to build a global ecosystem for the future digital economy, Huobi Group remains focused on growing its diverse range of regulatory-compliant services https://www.linkedin.com/company/huobi/about/. (https://www.huobi.com/en-us/). In terms of volume, Huobi Global is presently ranked #2 (as of 22 Aug 2021) https://coinmarketcap.com/rankings/exchanges/. Services are provided by "Huobi Global Limited", a company incorporated in the Republic of Seychelles (https://www.huobi.com/en-us/about/privacy/). Users located in USA, Canada, Singapore, Hong Kong, China, Japan (among other countries) are restricted from accessing the services of this platform. At the moment, Huobi Global offers a USDT bonus to newly registered users who complete specific tasks such as ID verification, and others (https://www.huobi.com/en-us/topic/welcome-bonus/?inviter_id=11329860). Huobi Group has also launched a native token, Huobi Token (HT), offering benefits to its token holders. Governing law: Republic of Seychelles.Huobi.com, HuobiGlobal, HuobiPro, HADAX, Huobi Argentina use shared deposit addresses. For details on Huobi.com, HuobiGlobal, HuobiPro, HADAX, Huobi Argentina interactions, see HuobiGlobal.On May 26th of 2022, Huobi Global aquired the Latin American exchange Bitex. The details of the deal have not yet been disclosed to the public. Huobi Global purchased Bitex with the plan to expand their platform of users, as Latin America captures between 8% and 10% of global cryptocurrency on a consistent basis, and to integrate their platform with Bitex's exchange operations. Bitex will be allowed to keep their branding and it's current management team.

iBitt is an OTC cryptocurrency exchange that trades over 100 currencies and offers deep liquidity. The iBitt crypto card accepts Bitcoin, Litecoin, Ethereum, RDD, and LCC, as well as fiat currencies; USD, CLP, and GBP. The minimum trade amount required is 2 Bitcoin or $20,000 USD with no maximum limit.They are in the process of developing a mobile application that will be available on both Google Play and The Apple App Store.iBitt is domiciled in Chile and has offices in Peru, Chile, Argentina and the United Kingdom. Citizens and residents of The United States are restricted from accessing the services provided.They currently have social media presence on Twitter, Instagram LinkedIn, and Facebook, as well as a YouTube Channel.

ICONOMI proclaims itself to be different from cryptocurrency exchanges. Users can purchase leading cryptocurrencies like bitcoin, ether, and Ripple directly with euro, but they can also follow crypto strategies made up of multiple cryptocurrencies selected by experts in the field, thus providing a platform in asset portfolio management and offers a variety of investment strategies. Notable examples: Bank Genese: +680% in 1Y. Invests in: Theta, ICON, Lisk, Polymath, iExecRoket one : +303% in 1Y. Invests in: iExec, Kava, CosmosDecentralized Economy: +514% in 1Y Users may copy their favorite crypto strategy, and ICOMOMI's experts will take care of the rest. End users to receive ICONOMI referral commission from fees collected from referred friends' investments into crypto strategies. Services are provided by "ICONOMI Limited", a company registered in England and Wales. Registered address 10 Orange Street London, WC2H 7DQ. Company Registration number: 11087795. ICONOMI Limited is registered with the Financial Conduct Authority (Firm Reference No. 927859). Previous names: Pay Gateway (June 2018 - June 2019) and Ramp up (Nov 2017 - June 2018).

Established in 1974, the IG Group has 313,000+ clients worldwide and has 80+ FX pairs. IG claims to be an award-winning online forex trading provider. In 2019, they claim they brought their high-quality FX service to the US - empowering informed, decisive, adventurous people access to over 80 currency pairs at competitive prices.For the United States residents, they are headquartered at 1000 West Fulton Street, Chicago, IL 60607. Their Agreement and each Transaction entered into with you is in all respects governed by and construed and interpreted in accordance with the laws of the State of Illinois, without giving effect to any conflict of laws doctrine that would interfere with or prevent the application of this provision. Any federal or state court in Chicago, Illinois has non-exclusive jurisdiction to settle any legal action or proceedings arising out of or in connection with this Agreement, including any non-contractual disputes and claims. Nothing in this Term 20 will prevent us from bringing proceedings against you in any other jurisdiction. IG US accounts are not available to residents of Ohio.IG.com exists to give traders like you – who see opportunities where others don’t – access to thousands of financial markets.

IGOT has been an Australian cryptocurrency exchange, presently presumed not-operational. Domain https://www.igot.com appears available for sale. Indications that IGOT was struggling and at the verge of collapsing can be found: https://www.abc.net.au/news/2016-04-11/australian-bitcoin-exchange-igot-on-verge-of-collapse/7315894and https://www.coindesk.com/bitcoin-exchange-igot-challenges-scam-allegations and https://siliconangle.com/2015/08/24/australian-bitcoin-exchange-igot-ceases-trading-may-have-been-an-indian-based-scam/

At the time of this review 04/21/2022 the web domain is no longer accessible. They have no presence on any social media platforms and there are no relative news articles on the web. At this time there are no active archives on the Wayback Machine. The site is presumed closed as of today 04/21/2022.Impalax is a cryptocurrency exchange that allows for BTC to be purchased via credit card and wire transfers. They also have an option for purchasing via their OTC desk. Impalax is owned and operated by Silver Bit OÜ, a company incorporated in Estonia and regulated by the Financial Intelligence Unit.

Incore Finance OU (IncoreX), headquartered in Estonia, is a platform for spot trading of crypto-currencies such as Bitcoin, Ethereum, Litecoin, Ethereum Classic, Ripple, Bitcoin Cash and many other crypto-currencies. Their terms are governed by the laws of Estonia. Any disputes will be settled according to the Estonian legislation.They have social media presence on Twitter and Facebook.

Indacoin is a fiat-to-crypto exchange that allows users to buy crypto with their debit or credit cards. The exchange has been active since 2014 and was operated by London-based company Indacoin Limited (Company number 08924450). The status of Indacoin Limited is still classified as ‘active’ by British official records. https://find-and-update.company-information.service.gov.uk/company/08924450. However, the platform has announced on its webpage that from 26 Oct 2021, the jurisdiction of the Indacoin exchange service has been changed to Estonia, and services are now provided by the company Indacoin OU, located in Tallinn, Estonia (Registry code: 14798473) with an operating license (FVT000145) to provide virtual currency services.They do not provide services to the residents or citizens of Afghanistan, American Samoa, Albania, Algeria, The Bahamas, Bangladesh, Barbados, Bolivia, Botswana, Cambodia, China, Colombia, the Democratic Republic of the Congo, Ecuador, Egypt, Eritrea, Gambia, Ghana, Guinea-Bissau, Guyana, Iran, Iraq, Ivory Coast, Jamaica, Laos, Lesotho, Liberia, Mali, Mauritius, Mongolia, Morocco, Myanmar, Namibia, Nepal, Nicaragua, Niger, Nigeria, North Korea, Pakistan, Panama, Papua New Guinea, Qatar, Saudi Arabia, Somalia, Sudan, Syria, Tanzania, Trinidad and Tobago, The USA, Uganda, Vanuatu, Yemen, Zambia, or Zimbabwe.Among the cryptocurrencies supported is the native coin Indacoin, Bitcoin, Ripple, Tether, Solana, Litecoin, Chainlink, Ethereum, and BitCanna, among many others.Currently they have a social media presence on Twitter, Facebook, LinkedIn and Instagram.

Independent Reserve Pty. Ltd (Independent Reserve), founded in 2013, is an exchange that offers: Fintech, SMSF, cryptocurrency exchange, trading platform, digital currency, and payment processing.Independent Reserve is headquartered in Australia. Their terms are governed by the laws on New South Wales, Australia. Any disputes will be submitted to the courts of New South Wales, Australia.They only allow these countries their services: Australia, Austria, Belgium, Canada, Czech Republic, Denmark, Finland, France, Germany, Greenland, Hong Kong, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Isle Of Man, Italy, Japan, Republic Of Korea, Liechtenstein, Luxembourg, Macao, Monaco, Netherlands, New Zealand, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Singapore, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, Taiwan, and the United Kingdom. https://www.independentreserve.com/help/getting-startedPartners of Independent Reserve include: Bloomberg, Blockchain Australia, Iress, and BGL.25+ cryptocurrencies are offered, and 4 fiat currencies are supported (AUD, NZD, USD, SGD). Their currencies include: BTC, ETH, XRP, USDT, ADA, AAVE, BCH, DOGE, and more, for full list and more information on their markets, see link: https://www.independentreserve.com/buy-sellThey have social media presence on Twitter, Facebook, and Linkedin.

INDODEX, domiciled and subpoenable in Indonesia, is restricted from citizens of United States, Myanmar, Cote D`Ivoire, Cuba, Islamic Republic Of Iran, Syrian Arab Republic, Belarus, Congo, Democratic Republic of Congo, Iraq, Liberia, Sudan, Zimbabwe, and North Korea.INDODAX is the largest Indonesian Digital Crypto Exchange, claiming to have 4+ million verified members, implementing public blockchain technology. The exchange is formerly known as “Bitcoin Indonesia” and it has been serving Indonesia and South-East Asia since 2014 (https://www.linkedin.com/company/indodax/). Services are provided by “PT. Indodax Nasional Indonesia” (https://indodax.com/en/privacy-policy/) a limited company registered in Indonesia, with a business number 449309 https://companieshouse.id/indodax-nasional-indonesia. The platform includes a variety of crypto assets traded against IDR (Rupiah – the currency of the Republic of Indonesia) and USDT. INDODAX is not accepting applications from US citizens. Governing law: Jakarta, Republic of Indonesia. INDODAX has physical presence in the following locations in Indonesia: Jakarta (INDODAX Jakarta), Bali (INDODAX Seminyak) and Ubud (Indodax Ubud). As a country, Indonesia as a country has made progress and is no longer included in FATFs list of countries with AML deficiencies and there are no international sanctions currently in force against this country https://www.knowyourcountry.com/indonesia1111

Instacoins Europe EOOD (Instacoins), established in 2018, is a financial service. They allow users to exchange fiat currencies. Bitcoin can be purchaged, using a credit/debit card or bank wire within a few minutes. Instacoins is headquartered in Bulgaria. Their terms are governed by the laws of Bulgaria. Any disputes will be submitted to either the courts in Bulgaria, or to the courts of any EU Member State where the user resides.If users are from Estonia, the registered company for their services is Instacoins Estonia OU, with headquarters at Rotermanni tn 6, Harju Maakond, Tallinn 10111, Estonia.They offer these coins: Bitcoin, DeCash EURD, and DeCash USDD. Their instacoins accept payments from these currencies: EUR, USD, GBP, CAD, AUD, CHF, NOK, and ZAR.They have social media presence on Linkedin.

Created in 2007, Instaforex is a trading platform that allows users to trade various cryptocurrencies, fiat currencies, commodities, and shares. They restrict US citizens from using their services.According to the Terms and Conditions, services on the platform are provided via Instant Trading Ltd., located in The British Virgin Islands (BVI) and licensed by BVI FSC, License Number SIBA/L/14/1082. On the homepage, two other companies are mentioned; Insta Service Ltd., which is registered with FSC Saint Vincent, Reg. Number IBC22945, and Insta Global Ltd., which is registered in Saint Vincent, IBC24321.In Europe, services are provided via Instant Trading EU Ltd (Reg no: HE 266937), located in Limassol, Cyprus and regulated by the Cyprus Securities and Exchange Commission (CySEC). Applicable law: Republic of Cyprus. Instant Trading EU Ltd is also registered in other EU countries. When accessing Instaforex from a European country, you are redirected to URL https://www.instaforex.eu to view content compliant with EU regulations. In 2018, CySEC issued a fine of €130 000 to Instant Trading EU Ltd for non-compliance with regulations. According to CySEC, the company ‘did not act fairly, honestly and professionally in accordance with the best interests of its clients. In addition, it failed to ask clients to provide the necessary information regarding their knowledge and experience, to assess whether the investment service or product is appropriate for them. More on this can be found here: https://www.cysec.gov.cy/CMSPages/GetFile.aspx?guid=c77cf7bf-c9a7-4136-b48d-cc579144df14They are partnered with Loprais Team, and currently they have a social media presence on Twitter, Facebook, and LinkedIn.

At the time of this review 04/21/2022 the web domain is no longer accessible. They currently have no social media accounts, and there are no news articles online stating this organization has closed or that it was a scam. The last active archive on the Wayback Machine is form 11/02/2021. This organization is presumed closed as of that date.InstaRamp is a place where customers can buy BTC, ETH, LINK, XLM, USDT, and USDC. Credit cards are one avenue they utilize.

InstBTC (Assila Limited), is a digital platform that facilitates the buying and selling of Bitcoin. Before purchasing Bitcoin on this platform users must register an account and provide first and last name, country of residence, phone number, address, and birth date. They do accept Mastercard and Visa for purchases on their platform.They are registered in Cyprus with registration number HE 422553. Their operational address is located in the Republic of Cyprus at 6, Vasili Vryonides str, Gala Court Chambers, 5th floor, 3095 Limassol. They are governed by the applicable laws of Cyprus.

Officially launched in Feb 2021, Intercore is a cryptocurrency exchange operating in Brazil. Services are provided by “Intercore Intermediacao de Negocios LTDA”, a company incorporated and registered under the laws of the Federal Republic of Brazil, registered with the CNPJ/MF (Cadastro Nacional de Pessoas Jurídicas) under No. 37.767.205/0001-07.Users may use the platform to transfer funds from their user account, issue Purchase/Sales Orders, receive in their Virtual Wallet Cryptocurrencies arising from Purchase Orders, and request the withdrawal of such funds from their account. Currencies Supported at this time are: Bitcoin, Ethereum, and BRCP (an ERC20 stablecoin pegged to the Brazilian Real), UNI, SUSHI, USDT, LINK, UNI, SUSHI, USDT and three options of stablecoins provided by Upper Software, one paired to the Dollar (USDU), one by the Euro (EURU) and the last paired to the Pound Sterling (GBPU)Currently they have a social media presence on Facebook, Twitter, and LinkedIn.

ICBtransfer OU (InternetCashBank), headquartered in Estonia, is crypto wallet tool for investing and storing digital assets, buying and selling crypto, and exchanging it for fiat. InternetCashBank currently also supports payments from Mastercard, Visa, JCB, SEPA, SWIFT, as well as crypto among others. They work with cryptocurrency USD, EUR, GBP, Ethereum, Rub, etc. For a more detailed list of currencies, users will have to contact support.Their terms state that if the user's jurisdiction laws don't agree with the services provided by their website, to not use their services. The user is fully responsible for knowing the laws their own jurisdiction. If a dispute can not be settled with the user's jurisdiction, any of the parties will have the right to submit the dispute to the court of the jurisdiction, of the administrator.They have a social media presence on Facebook.

Isbit is a cryptocurrency exchange from Mexico. Supports BTC, LTC, ETH, UKG (Unikoin Gold), DASH, XRP, USDT and fiat currency: MXN (Mexican Peso). Services are provided by INTELHIT INTELSELLER SA de CV, a Mexican company, legally constituted in accordance with the laws of the United Mexican States. Applicable law: Mexico.Digital Asset Exchange, ISBIT, as an strategic piece of infrastructure to foster economic development. In the same way an airport, a bridge, or the internet connects our economy with other economies , ISBIT will bring the benefits of being better connected to the global financial system through the blockchain to Mexico.

itBit website was closed on 9/13/2016, and was rebranded to Paxos. They rebranded to highlight a private blockchain and distributed ledger work.Jira Ticket to close: https://chopchop.atlassian.net/browse/AHD-9443Itbit https://www.itbit.com/ redirects to https://www.paxos.com/Launched in 2012, itBit is a USA cryptocurrency exchange run by Paxos, which offers crypto asset trading services built for institutions and trading professionals including a global exchange and OTC trading desk. On 25 March 2019, the exchange announced that it would strengthen its connection with the company Paxos.Services are provided by "Paxos Trust Company LLC" a new York State chartered limited purpose trust company (Paxos Trust), licensed by the New York State Department of Financial Services. The company's product offering include a cryptocurrency brokerage service, asset tokenization services and settlement services. Also offers the (until recently) Paxos Standard (PAX) a 1 USDP=1 USD backed stablecoin, which as of 24 Aug 2021 will be known as Pax Dollar (USDP) and offers PAX Gold (PAXG), a digital asset with 1 PAXG=1 fine troy once of a 400 oz London Good Delivery gold bar, stored in Brink's vaults. By owning PAXG, users own the underlying physical gold, held in custody by Paxos Trust Company. Paxos Trust has offices in New York, London and SingaporeItbit (the exchange) has a global network of clients across more than 100 countries for some of the deepest fiat-to-crypto liquidity pools for USD:BTC, USD:ETH, USD:BCH, USD:LTC, USD:PAXG and more.

Itez is an exchange based and registered in Estonia. They support fiat-to-crypto transactions (only via bank card) and supports the following cryptocurrencies: BTC, ETH, TRX (TRON) and USDT (ERC20) and USDT (TRC20). They do not offer privacy coins, and have a social media presence on Twitter, Facebook, and LinkedIn.

J2TX (Just2Trade Online Ltd.) is a multi-purpose platform where users can invest Ethereum in stocks, buy crypto with a debit or credit card (Visa and Mastercard), and earn dividends from J2TD tokens. J2TD holders receive 50% of the income of the entire J2TX Ecosystem as well as 10% of the income of their partner site, Just2Trade. Just2Trade Online Ltd. is authorized and regulated by the Cyprus Securities and Exchange Commission in accordance with license No.281/15, issued on 09/25/2015. Registration Number: HE 341520. J2TX is domiciled in Cyprus, and is governed by the applicable laws of Cyprus. They support both Ethereum and Bitcoin.The J2TX app is available for users on Google Play and the Apple App Store. At this time they have a social media presence on Twitter, Facebook, Instagram, and LinkedIn.

Founded in 2012, Javvy Technologies Ltd. (Javvy) is a decentralized US cryptocurrency exchange, a universal wallet, and other features. Users are not required to register to use web based exchanges. Users only need to verify ID once to trade.Any and all disputes, claims, and controversies arising out of or in connection with your access to, and/or use of the websites, and/or the provision of content, services, and/or technology on or through the websites shall be governed by and construed exclusively in accordance with the laws and decisions of the State of California applicable to contracts made, entered into and performed entirely therein, without giving effect to its conflict of laws provisions.Javvy (JVY) is the native token used in the Javvy exchange, associated with 50% discounts in fees as well as privileges for its token holders.The Javvy Wallet app is available on Windows, Apple App Store, Linux, and Google Play. It currently supports all major cryptocurrencies.Javvy has social media presence on Facebook and Twitter.

Jubiter has closed. Previous notes: Jubiter was launched in 2018 and is a cryptocurrency exchange. Offers its users fiat-crypto and crypto-crypto buy/sell of cryptocurrency: Bitcoin, Litecoin and/or other virtual currencies available from time to time, a secure offline wallet, and a Bitcoin debit card that makes purchasing goods and services with Bitcoin quick and easy. Services are available in 129 countries.Until February 2021, Jubiter Technologies OÜ (doing business as Jubiter), had a crypto payment processor license issued by the Estonian FIU. The license was terminated for unknown reasons, possibly associated with the Tradixa broker scam allegedly facilitated by Jubiter (among others).FCA (UK), FMA (Austria) and others had issued warning statement regarding Tradixa.The Jupiter website is now operated by Global DLT Exchange S.R.O (registration number 53 300 416), a company registered in Bratislava Slovak Republic, regulated by the Financial Intelligence Unit (“FIU”) in Slovak Republic and licensed to provide virtual currency wallet services and virtual currency exchange services (license number: OU-BA-OZP1-2021/000409-5).

Klickl, Klickl Limited, is a cryptocurrency trading platform. User can buy, sell, and trade fiat and cryptocurrencies, with the option to utilize forex and futures trading. Users can also use Klickl Pay, to pay merchants who accept a digital form of payment. Klickl is domiciled in Hong Kong.Klickl allowed to be exchanged are Bitcoin, Ethereum, Bitcoin Cash, Litecoin, TRON, USDT and more.Klickl is active on twitter and facebook. Klickl was previously known as IDCM (International Digital Currency Markets). Klickl became the official name on April 28, 2022.https://klicklblog.wordpress.com/2022/04/28/idcm%e5%93%81%e7%89%8c%e5%bd%a2%e8%b1%a1%e5%85%a8%e9%9d%a2%e5%8d%87%e7%ba%a7%ef%bc%8c%e6%9b%b4%e5%90%8d%e4%b8%baklickl/

Koinal is part of SG Veteris Europe EOOD , a private limited company incorporated in Bulgaria and with a registered office at 15-17 Tintyava str., 1113 Dianabad, Sofia, Bulgaria- Work and Share Co-working space, office 4.SG Veteris Limited is a limited liability company incorporated in England (company number: 10539075) with its registered headquarters office at The Tower at the Bower 207 Old Street London EC1V 9NR, United Kingdom.Koinal is a registered trademark of SG Veteris Limited. It is an online platform that enables all the Koinal users to purchase cryptocurrencies and making their payments with credit- and debit cards.They connect the online card payments infrastructure with Fiat payments and banking infrastructure to enable crypto purchases using credit and debit cards. Crypto is still fairly new in the financial world. As it becomes more and more regulated, the adoption and acceptance of it by users will get easier. SEPA and Swift transfers are still the most commonly used ways of payment when buying cryptocurrencies. However, users choosing to pay with one of these two methods have to go through a lengthy process before completing their payments. Even if you manage to complete a bank transfer without a problem, you’ll have to wait at least 1 working day to be able to use that money. What Koinal does is, they give you the opportunity to pay with either your credit or debit card, instantly. The key points here are instant purchases and the ability to use credit or debit cards instead of waiting for a money transfer. It seriously is a difficult process to integrate a crypto purchase structure from a bank using credit cards. Thanks to the capable and hardworking people in our group, they claim to be able to provide this extremely complicated yet crucial service to our customers. This way they are also keeping most of the costs to the minimum and this is reflecting our customers in the form of next to nothing fees and great prices.They are providing the checkout service of Koinal to more than 52+ partner exchanges such as Huobi, Stormgain, Okex... all around the world. Their partners offer their users a fast, simple, and secure way of cryptocurrency purchase via the Koinal payment method. Furthermore, they claim in managing to complete the whole purchasing process in just a few minutes. That is one of the main aspects of their fast transactions.

Koineks has been a Turkish cryptocurrency exchange with 400K users. Koinex has officially rebranded its exchange to Thodex while URL https://koineks.com/ redirects to www.thodex.com which at the time of the review (24 Oct 2021) is not accessible. The exchange is closed, following Turkish authorities arrests over alleged $2B Thodex exist scam as leader flees country https://coingeek.com/turkey-arrests-62-over-alleged-2b-thodex-exit-scam-as-leader-flees-country/ and https://www.nytimes.com/2021/04/23/business/cryptocurrency-fraud-turkey.html

Turkey's cryptocurrency platform | Buy/sell Bitcoin, Litecoin, Bitcoin Cash, Ethereum, Dogecoin and Dash with Koinim Turkish Lira Welcome to the first Turkey-based cryptocurrency trading platform. They claim to have hundreds of thousands of users who have been trading safely since 2013. Operating since 2013, Koinim is a Turkish cryptocurrency wallet and exchange. Supports BTC, BCH, LTC, ETH, DASH and DOGE and denominates it prices in Turkish Lira. Services are provided by "Koinim Bilisim A.S." Applicable law: Turkey

Korbit Co., Ltd. (Korbit), founded in July 2013, is a digital currency exchange that provides virtual asset trading services, fiat deposit/withdrawal service, wallet, virtual asset trading, market price, custody, staking, yield services, and has a section supporting NFTs. Korbit is headquartered in South Korea. Their terms are governed by the laws of the Republic of Korea. Any disputes will be held in accordance with the Civil Procedure Act, if an agreement is not made on location, between the parties.According to their updated on June 27, 2022 terms, there currently are no restricted jurisdictions listed. https://lightning.korbit.co.kr/terms/terms-and-conditions/Korbit offers these cryptocurrencies: Gnosis, Ethereum, Bitcoin, Ripple, Tron, Binance Coin, USD Coin, Shibainu, Polygon, Uniswap, Algorand, and more. For a full list and more market info, see link:https://korbit.co.kr/market#marketThey have social media presence on Twitter and Linkedin.

Kraken is a US-based cryptocurrency exchange and bank, founded in 2011, headquartered in San Francisco, California. Kraken is a global digital asset platform based on euro volume and liquidity. Their client base trades more than 90 digital assets and 7 different fiat currencies.Kraken has many country relationships with Australia, United Kingdom, Japan, and Canada.KYC Update - After reviewing Kraken's KYC it was discovered that they will allow $5000/day in withdrawals without extensive KYC. This discovery has given us reason to change their KYC from a Green to a Yellow.Kraken acquired "Staked" in December 2021, which is non-custodial staking platform that enables investors in Proof of Stake networks to securely compound their holdings.https://www.kraken.com/press/releases/kraken-acquires-staked-to-support-growth-and-resilienceIf you reside in Japan - Payward Asia K.K., Tokyo, Japan, is registered as a Crypto Asset Exchange Operator with the FSA in Japan. If you reside in the United States - Payward Ventures, Inc., San Francisco, California, USA, regulated by FinCEN and registered a MSB. If you reside in any other country not mentioned above - Payward Trading Ltd., British Virgin Islands. Applicable law: State of California - USA. Terms of Service stipulate user and Payward agree to arbitrate any dispute. Arbitration prevents users from suing in court or from having a jury trial, while any arbitration will occur in San Francisco, California.They have a large social media presence on Facebook, Twitter and Linkedin at this time.

Kriptomat (FintechX OU), headquartered in Estonia, is an exchange platform for buying, selling and securely storing virtual assets. Their Terms of Service are governed by the laws of Estonia law and procedure, before taking the case before the court. Should the dispute not be settled in mediation procedure, then the Harju County court will have the jurisdiction to solve it.The exchange platform is available in the following languages: English, German, French, Italian, Spanish, Polish, Dutch, Slovene, Croatian, Swedish, Portuguese, Danish, Greek, Estonian, Latvian, Lithuanian, Slovak, Bulgarian, Hungarian, Czech and other languages.Kriptomat does not offer their services in the following countries: Afghanistan, Algeria, American Samoa, Bangladesh, Belarus, Bolivia, China, Democratic Republic of Congo, Democratic People’s Republic of Korea (DPRK), Ecuador, Egypt, Ethiopia, India, Iran, Iraq, Kyrgyzstan, Pakistan, Palestine, Qatar, Saudi Arabia, Syria, Morocco, Nepal, Ukraine, United States of America, Vanuatu, Vietnam, Zambia. https://kriptomat.io/global

The Kryptonova website is closed and the last date of activity was on 12/11/2021.Kryptonova is a decentralized cryptocurrency exchange. They offer the buying and selling of various cryptocurrencies. In order to buy crypto from their organization users will need to provide ID documents and sign a KYC document. They claim to be strict and ask for KYC for every purchase. They only support Bitcoin and Ethereum at this time. Purchases however can be made by Visa, Mastercard, SEPA, and SWIFT.Kryptonova does restrict citizens and residents of sanctioned countries, currently those countries are: Afghanistan, Angola, Azerbaijan, Bahamas, Botswana, Burundi, Cambodia, Cameroon, Central African Republic, Chad, Congo, Cuba, Democratic Republic of Congo, Equatorial Guinea, Eritrea, Ethiopia, Ghana, Guinea Bissau, Haiti, Iran, Iraq, Libya, Madagascar, Mozambique, Burma, Nicaragua, North Korea, Pakistan, Panama, Rwanda, Sierra Leone, Somalia, South Sudan, USA, Sri Lanka, Sudan, Syria, Tajikistan, Trinidad and Tobago, Tunisia, Turkmenistan, Uzbekistan, Venezuela, Yemen, Zimbabwe, American Samoa, Guam, Nigeria, Puerto Rico, Samoa, Saudi Arabia, US Virgin Islands. These are subject to change.Kryptonova is operated by Kryptonova OU with registration number 14889323 and license number FVT000338 in Harju Maakond, Tallinn, Lasnamae linnaosa, Vaike-Palla tn 2, 11415, Estonia.Currently they have no presence on any social media platform.

As of today's review (04/28/2022), exchange.kudi.pro is offline and according to WayBackMachine, the last screenshot of the this address being online was 09/15/2021. The previous reviewer mentioned "First Kudi" and there were two sites related. First one was "firstkudi.com" and that domain is up for sale with godaddy.com. That address was last active on 12/04/2021 according to Wayback machine. The second one was found on Wiki as "https://firstkudi.pro" and that site is also offline. The last active screenshot for this website was 02/27/2021 on WayBack machine. Previous Reviewer:Kudi Pro (previously known as ‘First Kudi’) is an ecosystem comprised of a cryptocurrency exchange and a peer-to-peer platform. Kudi Pro allows users to trade crypto-to-crypto, or crypto-to-fiat, or serve as merchants who facilitate peer-to-peer transactions.Kudi Pro is powered by its native token XIV (Inverse Token/Inverse Project). INVERSE is a non-custodial, counter volatile, DeFi platform that allows users to conveniently take advantage of the downward moves of selected DeFi assets (i.e. COMP, AAEV, UNI, YFI) by utilizing various 'tracking valuts' on the platform. INVERSE is powered by the XIV token, a free-floating, inverse-yielidng, ERC20 token, which is used to unlock these 'tracking vaults'. Merchants earn XIV for each transaction they facilitate. Traders earn XIV by rating the Merchants following each transaction, and through referral bonuses. Kudi Pro's Terms and Conditions do not specifically state who operates this platform. TC's mention that FirstKudi.pro is an incorporated Estonian business entity and the applicable law is Estonian law https://exchange.kudi.pro/terms, however, an online search in Estonian records has not matched a company with the above name being registered in Estonia. Kudi Pro is a subsidiary of “First Kudi Limited” as stated on the bottom of the website https://www.firstkudi.pro/. "First Kudi Resources Ltd" appears registered in Nigeria’s Corporate Affairs Commission (CAC) website, with registration number 1575286 and registration date Apr 8, 2019 https://post.cac.gov.ng/search/type/all and https://www.dnb.com/business-directory/company-profiles.firstkudiresourcesltd.16bb12c664b7975d2716bd2088c7f369.html Kudi Pro’s Twitter https://mobile.twitter.com/kudipro and LinkedIn page https://ng.linkedin.com/in/first-kudi-75b609179 indicate that the platform is located in Nigeria, Africa. The same social media account points out that the platform's name has been changed 3 times since its launch in 2018: from “Kudi Exchange”, to “First Kudi”, to “Kudi Pro”.

At the time of this review 05/04/2022 the web domain is no longer accessible. The last post on Twitter was from February 2021. The last post on Facebook was on 08/13/2021 stating they were undergoing maintenance.The last active archive on the Wayback Machine is from 03/31/2022. This organization is presumed closed as of that date. The only relevant news articles found online were relating to them banning Nigerian and African users in the beginning of 2021. Some examples are listed below:CryptoAssetbuyer: https://cryptoassetbuyer.com/kurepay-suspends-business-in-nigeria/CryptoTVPlus: https://cryptotvplus.com/2021/11/it-has-been-a-horrible-year-ceo-of-kurepay-abikure-tega-said-as-the-company-close-shop/BlockBuild: https://blockbuild.africa/social-payment-kurepay-suspends-nigerian/KurePay is a trifecta payment system solution that includes an E-wallet, payment gateway and Kure card that uses blockchain technology to provide solutions to e-commerce and payment solutions.Governing Law is that of Nigeria.

LATOKEN is a cryptocurrency exchange and wallet founded in 2017, and both domiciled and subpoenable in the Cayman Islands. They specialize in trading, payments, neobank, exchange, digitalwallet, exchange, blockchain, crypto, and fintech.They currently support 100+ cryptocurrencies, including privacy coins (Zcash, Monero). Services are provided by "LiquiTrade Limited" a Cayman Islands entity (Ref number 341867), with the exception of primary card acquiring and payment processing services which are provided by "Payex OÜ" a company registered (registration number 14495146) and licensed in Estonia to provide virtual currency services (FVT000389). Applicable law is that of the Cayman Islands.LATOKEN currently may restrict trading activity for investors in the following jurisdictions: United States, Canada, UK, Australia, France, South Africa, New Zealand, Japan, People’s Republic of China, Singapore, South Korea, Israel, and Cayman Islands. They also may restrict the trading activities of residents from the following jurisdictions: Canada, UK, Australia, France, South Africa, New Zealand, Japan, People’s Republic of China, Singapore, South Korea, Israel, Cayman Islands. LAtoken (LA) is the native token used in the LATOKEN exchange, associated with discounts and benefits for its users. Several negative customer reviews for LATOKEN have been shared online. These areviews can be found here.https://www.trustpilot.com/review/www.latoken.comhttps://www.reddit.com/r/LAToken/comments/c2x630/latoken_scams/Which would suggest being cautious, combined with the fact that as a country, Cayman Islands is on the FATF list of countries identified to have strategic AML deficiencies. This can be found below. https://www.knowyourcountry.com/cayman1111

LedgerX was purchased by FTX US is now FTX US Derivativeshttps://www.coindesk.com/business/2021/10/25/ftx-crypto-exchange-finalizes-ledgerx-acquisition/LedgerX is a digital currency futures and options exchange and clearinghouse regulated by the US Commodity Futures Trading Commission (CFTC).?LedgerX is available to both retail and institutional investors 24x7 and offers physical settlement of all contracts, block trading and algorithmic trading opportunities for institutional investors, and direct access for all traders. Since launching in 2017, LedgerX has cleared over 10 million options and swaps contracts.LedgerX pioneered the bitcoin mini contracts in the US. Our mini contracts have an underlying notional of 0.01 BTC and our deci contracts have an underlying of 0.10 ETH, enabling granular trading and ensuring market scalability as bitcoin prices trend upwards.

Launched in 2020 and headquartered in Argentina, QuBit Capital S.R.L. (LetsBIT) is a decentralized exchange offering trading with local fiat in more than 60 cryptocurrency markets. They offer more than 20 cryptocurrencies as well as stablecoins.Their Terms are governed by the laws of Argentina. Disputes will be subject to the jurisdiction of the City of Rosario, Argentina.However, in order to deposit or withdraw crypto a user must first complete KYC to a level 3 status.In November of 2020 Qubit rebranded to LetsBIT. Customer's accounts were automatically brought over to the LetsBIT service and the web address for Qubit (https://qubit.com.ar) now forwards to the LetsBIT web address. More of that can be read here: https://medium.com/letsbit/qubit-brokers-ahora-es-letsbit-a339e4b2d358

Libertex is a trading platform and a CFD broker that is headquartered in Cyprus. Users on this platform can trade stocks, crypto, forex, metals, indices, agriculture, oil & gas, ETFs, and options in a CFD format.Libertex offers whole list of crypto that is available to trade. This list includes Bitcoin, Bitcoin Cash, Bitcoin Gold, Litecoin, Ethereum, Ripple, Monero, Zcash, EOS, Dogecoin and many more.Services are provided by "Indication Investments Ltd" a Cyprus Investment Firm which is regulated and supervised by the Cyprus Securities and Exchange Commission (CySEC) with a company registration number 290930 and CIF Licence number 164/12. Libertex is a group of companies operating internationally. Other associated companies:Libertex International Company LLC a company registered in St. Vincent and the Grenadines with registration number 1278Libertex PTY, a South African financial services provider regulated by the Financial Sector Conduct with FSP number 47381LLC Financial Company Forex Club a company in Belarus, with a license from the National Bank of the Republic of Belarus (NBRD) with nr 192580558.Libertex is presumably the owner of "XCOEX" a cryptocurrency exchange registered in Estonia, doing business as "XCOEX Limited OÜ", registry code: 14562820 with an Estonian license FVT000226 to provide virtual currency services.Libertex is domiciled in Cyprus. They have a social media presence on Twitter, Facebook, and LinkedIn.The Autorite de Marches Financier has issued a warning list of websites and companies (Libertex International Company LLC included), carrying on potentially illegal high risk-activities in Quebec.

At the time of this review, 08//29/2022, the platform does not seem to be allowing new customers at this time. It is presumed this is a temporary setback due to the organization being acquired in April 2022, and undergoing a rebrand in the near future. Founded in 2014, Liquid is a cryptocurrency exchange platform domiciled in Singapore. Liquid offers trading services for major cryptocurrencies such as Bitcoin and Ethereum against fiat currency pairs in Japanese yen, US, Singapore and Australian Dollars, and Euros. Services are provided by Quoine Pte. Ltd., a private limited company organized under the laws of Singapore with UEN 201414068E, and is a wholly owned subsidiary of Liquid Group Inc., a Japanese corporation. For residents of Japan, an account will be opened with Quoine Corporation, which is regulated and licensed by the Japanese FSA (Financial Supervisory Authority). The Terms of Use provided on the Japanese version of the Liquid website apply.USA and Japan are prohibited locations at this time. Governing law is that of Singapore.Starting in 2014, Quoinex was created as a fiat-crypto exchange. In 2016, Qryptos was created for crypto-crypto exchanges. In 2018, these two exchanges were combined to create a new exchange, Liquid, which is now serving customers worldwide.Update, 19 Aug, 2021: More than $90 million in cryptocurrency stolen from Liquid following a hack. More on this can be found in the articles below:https://www.cnbc.com/2021/08/19/liquid-cryptocurrency-exchange-hack.htmlhttps://www.coindesk.com/business/2021/08/21/liquid-exchange-hacker-covers-tracks-by-sending-20m-to-eth-mixer/Liquid and all of its subsidiaries were acquired by FTX on April 4th, 2022. They are planning to rename Liquid FTX Japan and FTX to FTX Singapore as part of their expansion to provide support in Japan. More on this can be found below: https://blog.liquid.com/acquisition-liquid-ftxhttps://blockworks.co/ftx-acquires-liquid-group-expanding-presence-in-japanCurrently they have a social media presence on Twitter, Facebook, Instagram, and LinkedIn, as well as a YouTube Channel.

Founded in 2013, 2525 Ventures B.V. (LiteBit) is an exchange that allows users to buy, sell, and trade cryptocurrencies and offer an app service. They are made up of 90+ employees and 15+ nationalities.LiteBit is headquartered in the Netherlands. Their terms are governed by the laws of the Netherlands. Any disputes will be submitted to the courts in Rotterdam, Netherlands.LiteBit does not allow any country under sanctions administered by the United Nations, the European Union, the United States of America or any other relevant government authority. They also do not offer services to residents of the United States. For a full list of sanctioned countries, see link:https://sanctionssearch.ofac.treas.gov/They support 80+ cryptocurrency coins including: Bitcoin, Ethereum, Ripple, Binance Coin, USD Coin, Dogecoin, Litecoin, and more. For a full list and info see link: https://www.litebit.eu/en/marketsTheir social media presence includes Twitter, Facebook, and Linkedin.

At the time of this review 04/21/2022 the web domain is no longer available. There are no news article online relating to this exchange and it also has no active social media accounts. The web domain has been inactive since at least 08/04/2018 according to the Wayback Machine, so a close date of 08/04/2018 will be presumed.Lollipopi is a cryptocurrency exchange that allows customers a variety of purchase solutions to buy crypto including credit card and wire transfers. For high volume purchases, they have created an additional OTC desk in order to be able to close a rate in a short period of time.

Lucent is a cryptocurrency exchange platform that allows user to trade between fiat currency and cryptocurrency. On this platform, the fiat currency supported is $USD. Cryptos supported on this platform are Bitcoin and Tether.On their privacy policy, Lucent appears to have multiple legal names. They are Lucent Holdings Limited, Lucent Trading Limited, Lucent Trading Private Limited, and Omega Services Systems Inc.Lucent is domiciled in the Philippines.They have a social media presence on Twitter, LinkedIn, and Facebook.

Founded in 2013, Luno (formerly BitX until 2017), is a cryptocurrency exchange that allows users to buy and sell Bitcoin and Ethereum. Luno provides services from different entities dependent on the customers country of residence, services are provided by Luno Pte. Ltd., for all non specified users. All others can be found here: https://www.luno.com/en-US/legal/termsThey are domiciled in London, United Kingdom, and have offices in The United States, United Kingdom, Singapore, South Africa, Malaysia, Indonesia, Nigeria and Australia. They are governed by the applicable laws of Singapore unless otherwise specified in specific country terms. Currently they have a social media presence on Twitter, Facebook, and LinkedIn.As of Sept 2020, Luno has been acquired and is an independent operating subsidiary of New York-based Digital Currency Group (“DCG”). More on this can be found here: https://discover.luno.com/luno-joins-dcg

At the time of this review, 08/31/2022, the web domain is still accessible, however the app is no longer available on any app stores and the platform no longer generates a QR code for downloads. They state on their Twitter account they will be closing and all users should withdraw their funds by August 29th, 2022. They are presumed closed as of that date.Lvl is a financial services and media company that offers a Bitcoin banking app with chat-based customer support. They support free buying and selling of cryptocurrencies. The app is based on MasterCard and supports fast direct deposits and claims to get paid up to 2 days sooner than competitors. Their app even supports US checking provided by Evolve Bank & Trust, Member FDIC, and insured by the Federal Deposit Insurance Agency (FDIC) for up to $250,000.Samsa Technologies Inc. is the owner and operator of LVL and is based in Austin, Texas and follows the applicable laws of Delaware, United States. The place of arbitration shall be Los Angeles, California unless otherwise specified by Samsa Technologies Inc. LVL is registered as a Money Service Business with the Financial Crimes Enforcement Network (FinCEN). Currently they have a social media presence on Twitter, Facebook, and LinkedIn.

Based in Switzerland Lykke is a fintech company offering financial services and products powered by the blockchain on B2B and B2P levels. Lykke runs the cryptocurrency exchange Lykke Wallet, a commission-free forex, Bitcoin, and cryptocurrency exchange platform for retail and professional traders who use trading bots or robots.To trade with cryptocurrency bots, they integrated their trading platform with Margin, a German company providing crypto bots. Lykke creates a trading ecosystem that users can use to deposit fiat or crypto with 0 fees, trade with limit or market orders with no fees, automate users' trading strategies by connecting the users' own bots through Lykke's API or by using the Margin integration, store assets in private or even cold wallets.Lykke specializes in: Bitcoin, Trading, Finance, FinTech, Blockchain, Exchange, Digital Assets, cryptocurrency, Cryptoexchange, and Cryptotrading.The framework for using Lykke’s services, is divided into three parts : Lykke Corp UK, providing a trading venue, including but not limited to, colored coins representing fiat currencies (such as Euros, Swiss Francs, British Pounds, US Dollars) as well as for cryptocurrencies (such as Bitcoin, Ether, Litecoin, Bitcoin Cash and Dash); Lykke Netherlands B.V. is providing a trading venue for utility tokens which can be exchanged against Bitcoin and Ethereum and Lykke Switzerland AG, providing blockchain technology-based assets. Tokens are restricted to citizens of the USA, Canada, Australia (among other countries). Applicable law: England and Wales.They have a social media presence on Twitter, Facebook, and LinkedIn.

Founded in February 2019, Matrixport is a cryptocurrency exchange where users can buy, sell, trade, store, invest and borrow crypto assets all in one platform. They offer custody services via Cactus Custody, a qualified custodian and a Hong Kong Trust Company. They also offer OTC trading. They have a mobile application that is available for download on  Google Play and The Apple App Store. Matrixport is the creator of Bit.com, Matrixport and Bit.com are now sister platforms, meaning users of Matrixport can use their Matrixport username and password to log in at Bit.com, will have the same KYC status shared between Matrixport and Bit.com, and the users Matrixport balance is also visible in their Bit.com wallet. More on this can be found here: https://support.matrixport.com/hc/en-us/articles/4878062860825-bit-com-launched-the-USDT-Margined-Futures-Matrixport is headquartered in Singapore with offices worldwide. In the case of any arbitration, it will take place in Hong Kong.Mtrixport is partnered with BTC.com, CoinEx, CoinGecko, AICoin, BitDeer, BitKan, Hashnest, Cactus Custody, Skew, TokenInsight and TokenView.Currently they have a social media presence on Twitter, Discord, LinkedIn and Facebook, as well as a YouTube Channel.

Mercado Bitcoin is an exchange that is part of a group company called 2TM that was founded in 2013. Users may use the platform for crypto-crypto and fiat-crypto (and vice-versa) transactions. Services are provided by Mercado Bitcoin Servicos Digitais Ltda, a company incorporated and registered under the laws of the Federal Republic of Brazil, registered with the CNPJ/MF (Cadastro Nacional de Pessoas Jurídicas) under No. 18.213.434/0001-35. Applicable law is also that of Brazil.Deposits and withdrawals of funds in Reais from the account can be processed via MeuBank Pagamentos Ltda, which belongs to the same group with Mercado Bitcoin. Mercado Bitcoin raised $200 million in Series B funding from Softbank Latin America Fund in July 2021. https://techcrunch.com/2021/07/01/mercado-bitcoin-raises-200mIn 2018 Rodrigo Batista, the CEO of Mercado at the time, sold his shares and created a competitive company called Digitra.com https://exame.com/future-of-money/dinheiro-tendencias/fundador-do-mercado-bitcoin-cria-corretora-nao-existe-marca-consolidadaCurrently they have a social media presence on Twitter, Facebook, and LinkedIn.

Metex exchange is closed.Founded in 2018, METEX is an online exchange for the trade of tokenized precious metals. METEX Metals Exchange will allow users to trade Gold, Silver, Platinum and Palladium tokens against various cryptocurrency and against fiat $AUD after passing KYC. Services are provided by Australian company “Metex Corp. Pty. Ltd.” (ABN 19 624 831 821). The platform has two native coins “Metex Platinum” (MxPT) and “Metex Palladium” (MxDT) which correspond to 1:1 backed by physical, vaulted metals.https://lu.linkedin.com/company/metexcorphttps://metex.exchange/en_au/about/Applicable law: Australia. Metex reports to AUSTRAC as part of the Anti Money Laundering guidelines.https://cdn.metex.exchange/wp-content/uploads/2021/07/02060837/Metex-Terms-and-Conditions-MTX-511-002V4ExchangeUserAgreementTermsandConditions03-July-2021.pdfAlso, here is the updated URL: https://metex.exchange/en_au/

Monedero is a cryptocurrency wallet created in 2019, and released to the public at the beginning on 2020. Currently they support BTC, ETH, BCH, DASH and ZRX. Users can send, receive, exchange cryptocurrencies. Currenty they have an app available for android and are working on one for the iOs platform.Monedero's team is based in Chile, Argentina and Spain, aiming to service Spanish speaking communities. Services are provided by Digital Assets Corporation. Applicable law: Marshal Islands. As a country, the Republic of the Marshal Islands is not on the FATF list of countries that have been identified as having strategic AML deficiencies, while there are no international sanctions in force against this country.

Moneyswap is an ecosystem of NFT, metaverse, and DeFi products. Their site appears to be either incomplete or in development as there are a few non-working links and their homepage does not elaborate more on their services or products.Most of their information is found on their whitepaper where they describe their future amenities, but it is not shown on their homepage.Currently, they have a social media presence on Twitter.

Launched in 2019, MoonPay is a cryptocurrency exchange and a financial technology company. They allow users to buy and sell various cryptocurrencies, provide on and off ramps, an NFT checkout that provides access to NFTs via credit card. They accept all major payment methods for their services including debit and credit card, local bank transfers, Apple Pay, Google Pay, and Samsung Pay.Exchange Services are provided by Moon Pay Ltd., organized and existing under the laws of Singapore, registered with Registrar of Companies (number 20201567G). In the United States, services are provided by MoonPay USA LLC a registered money service business (NMLS ID 2071245), who is registered in Delaware with a registration number of 7915104. They hold licenses in many US states. Applicable law is that of England and Wales.https://www.moonpay.com/legal/licenseshttps://uk.finance.yahoo.com/news/moonpay-secures-money-transmitter-licenses-125000638.htmlA list of non supported Countries may be found here: https://support.moonpay.com/hc/en-gb/articles/360009279877-What-are-your-supported-countries-states-and-territoriesNationals or residents of Cuba, Iran, North Korea, Sudan, or Syria or any other country subject to United States embargo, UN sanctions, the European Union or HM Treasury's financial sanctions regimes (each a "Sanctioned Country"), or persons on the U.S. Treasury Department's Specially Designated Nationals List or the U.S. Commerce Department's Denied Persons List, Unverified List, Entity List, or the EU or HM Treasury's financial sanctions regime (a "Sanctioned Person"); or you intend to supply any acquired or stored Digital Currency or MoonPay Services to a Sanctioned Country (or a national or resident of a Sanctioned Country) or Sanctioned Person.MoonPay has partnered with financial services software company Sila Inc. to offer their Electronic Funds Transfers. Currently they have a social media presence on Twitter, Facebook, and LinkedIn. As of December 23, 2021 DeversiFi has chosen MoonPay as its exclusive fiat on-ramp for the decentralized exchange.https://www.moonpay.com/blog/moonpay-deversifiUpdate Feb 2021: Moonpay has received in-principle approval for a Class 2 Virtual Financial Assets (VFA) License from the Malta Financial Services Authority.https://ffnews.com/newsarticle/moonpay-secures-in-principle-approval-for-class-2-vfa-licence

The NAGA Group AG (Naga Global LLC) was founded in 2015 and is headquartered in St Vincent and the Grenadines. NAGA is a holding company that operates for The NAGA Group, along with the following subsidiary companies: NAGA Markets Europe Ltd, NAGA Technology GmbH and NAGA Global (CY) Ltd. The website is owned by NAGA Group AG, a German based Fintech, and operated by NAGA Global LLC. They are an international broker, trading in a variety of complex CFD instruments: forex, equities, commodities, indices, ETFs, and cryptocurrencies.Their terms are governed by the laws of Saint Vincent and the Grenadines. Any disputes will be settled in the exclusive jurisdiction of the Saint Vincent and Grenadines courts.NAGA Global LLC does not provide services for the residents of certain countries such as: Afghanistan, Albania, Barbados, Belgium, Burkina Faso, Cambodia, Canada (including Quebec), Cayman Islands, Central African Republic, Democratic People's Republic of Korea, Democratic Republic of the Congo, Haiti, Iran, Jamaica, Jordan, Libya, Mali, Morocco, Myanmar, Nicaragua, Pakistan, Panama, Philippines, Senegal, Somalia, South Sudan, Syria, Turkey, Uganda, United Kingdom and any other countries where the citizens have British proof of identity (i.e. British Virgin Island, Gibraltar, Isle of Man etc.), USA, Yemen, or Zimbabwe.They have social media presence on Twitter, Facebook, and Linkedin.

National Digital Asset Exchange Inc. (NDAX), founded in 2018, is a cryptocurrency exchange, which facilitates a marketplace for its users to buy, sell, and trade cryptocurrency. NDAX facilitates cryptocurrency trading, but does not purchase, nor sell, nor exchange Cryptocurrency on its own behalf or for its own proprietary trading account. Their products include: Trade, Staking, NDAX Wealth-OTC desk, and Referral Program.NDAX is headquartered in Canada. Their user agreement is governed by the laws of Canada, and any disputes will be settled in the exclusive jurisdiction of the courts of Alberta, Canada.Supported currencies: BTC, ETH, LTC, Tether, XRP, EOS, Stellar, Dogecoin, Cardano, Chainlink, and more. See link: https://ndax.io/about-usThey have social media presence on Twitter, Facebook, and Linkedin.

NetCoins is a cryptocurrency exchange that was founded in 2014 in Canada. They currently offer the buying and selling of multiple different cryptocurrencies including Bitcoin, Ethereum, Bitcoin Cash, Litecoin, Xripple, USD coin, Dogecoin, Stellar, EOS and many more.All members are required to provide for KYC is an email address, phone number, and personal information such as a first name, last name, address, date of birth and a form of ID like a drivers license or passport.Services are offered by Netcoins Inc., a company registered in Canada, licensed as an MSB from FINTRAC (M15560893). MSB activities include; Foreign exchange dealing, money transferring and dealing in virtual currencies. Netcoins is owned by BIGG Digital Assets, a public company traded on the CSE under BIGG.Currently they have a social media presence on many platforms including Twitter, Instagram LinkedIn, and Facebook.

N.exchange is a non-custodial cryptocurrency exchange. They currently support 35 cryptocurrencies and tokens including Bitcoin, Ethereum, Bitcoin Cash, Solana, Binance Coin, Litecoin, and stablecoins; USDC, USDT, TerraUSD, but no privacy coins. They do not offer the purchasing or selling of any cryptocurrencies. The only service they offer at this time is simple cryptocurrency trading. They are in the process of developing a mobile application that will be available on Google Play and The Apple App Store. Services are provided by Obron Corp Ltd, a company registered in the Marshal Island (company no. 105998), and domiciled in London. They prohibit users from Iceland, Israel, Morocco, Algeria, Ecuador, Bolivia, Macedonia, Egypt, Saudi Arabia, Iraq, Pakistan, Nepal, Bangladesh, China, Kyrgyzstan, Bahrain, United Kingdom, United States of America, Namibia, Qatar, Afghanistan, North Korea, Syria, Iran, Cuba, Russian Federation, Belarus, and The Crimea Region of Ukraine.Currently they have a social media presence on Twitter, Facebook, and LinkedIn as well as a YouTube Channel.

Pradexx OU (NextPayWay), founded in 2018, is an exchange that offers the buying and selling cryptocurrencies. To purchase currency on their platform users must register an account. They offer digital wallets for their users to store their digital assets in as well as locked in exchange rates. NextPayWay is headquartered in Tallinn, Estonia, however, they are governed by the laws of England and Wales in the United Kingdom, and any disputes will be settled by the courts of London, England. Support currencies include: Bitcoin, Ethereum, Ripple and more. They accept all credit and debit cards from Mastercard and Visa.Currently they also have a mobile application available for users on Google Play and the Apple App Store.

Pradexx OU (NextPayWay), founded in 2018, is an exchange that offers the buying and selling cryptocurrencies. To purchase currency on their platform users must register an account. They offer digital wallets for their users to store their digital assets in as well as locked in exchange rates. NextPayWay is headquartered in Tallinn, Estonia, however, they are governed by the laws of England and Wales in the United Kingdom, and any disputes will be settled by the courts of London, England. Support currencies include: Bitcoin, Ethereum, Ripple and more. They accept all credit and debit cards from Mastercard and Visa.Currently they also have a mobile application available for users on Google Play and the Apple App Store.

Launched in 2017, Nocks has been a cryptocurrency exchange from the Netherlands. At the time of the review (22 Nov 2021) URL https://www.nocks.com is not accessible, thus the exchange is presumed not operational. Apparently is has been in this status since July 2020 https://www.cryptowisser.com/exchange/nocks.

NordikCoin is a cryptocurrency exchange specializing in Bitcoin. They allow users to buy Bitcoin with VISA or Mastercard and spend it across the internet with their wallets. They are licensed to buy and sell crypto currencies, including providing hot and cold wallet storage. They claim to ensure full regulatory compliance by including strict enforcement of routines and procedures relating to Know Your Customer (KYC), Anti Money Laundering (AML) and Counter-Terrorism Financing (CTF) measures.NordikCoin.com is operated by OmniMatrix OÜ, a company domiciled and registered in Tallin, Estonia (organization number 14674630), with a license to provide virtual currency services in Estonia (FVT000095). In the organizations terms and conditions they state the agreement will be governed by Estonian law and the exclusive jurisdiction of Estonian courts.In Estonia, OmniMatrix OÜ is a company operating with its headquarters located at Maakri tn 19/2, Tallinn, 10145, Harju maakond, Estonia. In Malta Omni Matrix Ltd. is a company operating with its headquarters located at Valley Towers, No 4, Valley Road, Birkirkara BKR 9022, Malta.NordikCoin has a social media presence on Twitter. OmniMatrix OU has also has a social media presence on LinkedIn.

NovaDAX Brazil Pagamentos Ltda (NovaDAX), founded in 2018 and headquartered in Brazil, is a global exchange that offers the purchase and sale of cryptocurrencies. NovaDAX and Nova Blockchain are part of Abakus Tech pillar and form a state-of-the-art technology ecosystem developed entirely in-house. https://www.abakusglobal.com/en,They also have office locations in the United States, Switzerland, Thailand, China, Vietnam, Philippines, Singapore and Indonesia.Their terms are governed by the laws of the Federal Republic of Brazil. Any disputes will be settled by an elected forum, agreed between the parties, in the District of Sao Paulo.Currencies Supported: NovaDAX supports 43 cryptocurrencies with the top traded being: BTC, ETH, Dogecoin, Cardano, XRP, TRON, Chainlink, Litecoin, Binance coin, Stellar, BCH, EOS, Bitcoin SV, OMG Network, IOTA, DASH, Tezos, Monero. Mastercard and VISA are both supported with buying major cryptos.They have social media presence on Twitter, Facebook and Linkedin.

Okcoin.com or the Okcoin app, founded in 2013, consists of a group of companies, based on locations, see below. They are exchange platforms that allow users to buy, sell, and trade cryptocurrencies. Supported currencies include BTC, ETH, USDT, USDC, ADA, DOGE, and more. See Link: https://www.okcoin.com/prices Each company has their own domiciled and subpoenable locations and rules.OkCoin Technology Company Limited, a Hong Kong registered corporation, registered at 21/F, Sino Plaza, 255-257 Gloucester Road, Causeway Bay, Hong Kong. They offer services for all other jurisdictions other than the locations listed below. They are governed by the laws of Hong Kong.OKCoin USA Inc., is a U.S. Delaware corporation, is registered at One Sansome St, Suite 3500, San Francisco, CA 94104. They are registered with FinCEN of the US Department of the Treasury. Their services are restricted from the states Hawaii, Indiana, Louisiana, Nevada, New York, West Virginia, and all US territories other than Puerto Rico. They are governed by the laws of the State of California.For Canada residents, under Okcoin USA Inc, is registered as an MSB with FINTRAC and currently provides services to residents of the following provinces: Nova Scotia, Ontario, Alberta, British Columbia, Saskatchewan, New Brunswick, and Manitoba.OKCoin Europe LTD, a Malta limited liability company is registered at: 66A, The Strand, Tas-Sliema SLM 1022, Malta. This is for residents of one of the European Union member states and the United Kingdom. They are governed by the laws of Malta.OKCoin Pte Ltd, a Singapore limited liability company is registered at 152 Beach Road, #14-03 Gateway East Singapore 189721, offering digital asset trade to residents of Singapore. They are governed by the laws of Singapore.Restricted territories from their services include any trade or economic sanctions lists, such as the Office of Foreign Assets Control SDN lists, n the Restricted Territories (as defined in Okcoin’s Restricted Territories Addendum), any restricted or prohibited from engaging in any type of trading by any law enforcement agencies. The Service(s) may not be available in all markets and jurisdictions, and any others they may prohibit. For more information, see links:https://sanctionssearch.ofac.treas.gov/ https://support.okcoin.com/hc/en-us/articles/7349415516429More information about these companies can be found at: https://www.okcoin.com/licenses.htmlhttps://support.okcoin.com/hc/en-us/articles/360059514492-Terms-of-ServiceThey have social media presence on Twitter, Facebook, and Linkedin.Controversies: Arrest of Star Xu. The charges stemmed from claims that a number of investors ended up with large losses caused by a crash in the OKEx system—another platform created by Xu. He was released a day later after cooperating with the police.Xu was also taken into custody in 2019 after police detained him while investing the possibility of a backdoor listing in Hong Kong of OK Group after he purchased a 60% stake in LEAP Holdings Group, a Hong Kong-based construction and engineering firm. Okcoin assured investors that all services remained intact on the exchange. https://www.coindesk.com/markets/2020/10/16/okex-founder-star-xu-held-in-police-custody-report/ and https://www.financemagnates.com/cryptocurrency/exchange/okcoin-confirms-normal-operations-during-founder-arrest-in-china/ and https://www.investopedia.com/tech/what-okcoin/
