OKCoin Japan was founded in 2017, with their headquarters in Minato, Tokyo. They specialize in Blockchain, Cryptocurrency, Fintech, Internet, Bitcoin, Web System Development, and In-house Services. They have a social media presence, on Facebook, Twitter, and LinkedIn.

Aux Cayes FinTech Co. Ltd. (OKX), founded in 2017, is a cryptocurrency exchange offering services 20 million+ traders, in 200+ countries, offers 140+ cryptocurrency assets including privacy coins, 400+ trading pairs against BTC and USDT, provides a wallet service, an OKX pool (to stake your crypto for gains), DeFi platform, OKEx academy and more. OKX is headquartered in Seychelles. Their terms are governed by the laws of England and Wales. Any disputes will be submitted to the Hong Kong International Arbitration Centre.Restricted locations from using their services include: Hong Kong, Cuba, Iran, North Korea, Crimea, Sudan, Malaysia, Singapore, Syria, United States of America (including all U.S.A. territories like Puerto Rico), American Samoa, Guam, Northern Mariana Island, and the US Virgin Islands, Canada (limited to the provinces of Ontario and Quebec), the United Kingdom, Bangladesh, Bolivia, Ecuador, Kyrgyzstan and Malta. Also countries on the United Nations Security Council Sanctions List are prohibited from use. https://scsanctions.un.org/wh67ven-mali.htmlSupported currencies include: BTC, ETH, USDT, USDC, XRP, ADA, SOL, DOT, DOGE, SHIB, MATIC, DAI, and more, for a full list and more information, see link:https://www.okx.com/markets/pricesThey have social media presence on Twitter, Facebook, and Linkedin.Update: Okex.com was rebranded to OKX. https://www.coinspeaker.com/okex-rebrands-okx-defi-play-to-earnControversies: Arrest of Star Xu. The charges stemmed from claims that a number of investors ended up with large losses caused by a crash in the OKEx system—created by Xu. He was released a day later after cooperating with the police. Xu was also taken into custody in 2019 after police detained him while investing the possibility of a backdoor listing in Hong Kong of OK Group after he purchased a 60% stake in LEAP Holdings Group, a Hong Kong-based construction and engineering firm. OSL is Asia’s leading digital asset platform providing global counterparts with a suite of institutional products and a member of BC Technology Group (Stock Code: 863 HK), Asia’s leading public fintech and digital asset company.OSL Singapore (OSL SG Pte Ltd, UEN 201836009D) is recognised by the Singapore Fintech Association (SFA) as a certified Fin-tech company and operates with an exemption under Singapore's Payment Services Act (PSA).OSL is domiciled in Singapore.

Ovex (Pty) Ltd (OVEX), founded in 2017, is a digital asset exchange and OTC trading desk that supports 23+ cryptocurrency assets, including privacy coin Monero.OVEX is headquartered in Cape Town, South Africa. Their terms are governed by the laws of South Africa. Chameleon Capital Ltd is another registered location in Quebec, Canada. They offer services to residents of countries other than a CMA Country or trade in cryptocurrency – non-rand fiat pairs.The Services are not made available to residents or nationals of sanctioned countries, or otherwise prohibited countries who they determine based on their discretion. These countries could include: United States, Cuba, China, North Korea, Iran, and Russia, for a full list, see link:https://sanctionssearch.ofac.treas.gov/Supported currencies include: AAVE, ADA, AVAX, BCH, BNB, BTC, CRV, DOGE, DOT, ETH, and more. For a full list and more information see link: https://www.ovex.io/listings https://ovex.io/rfqThey have social media presence on Twitter, Facebook, and Linkedin.

OWNR Wallet OU (OWNR Wallet), founded in 2018, is a cryptocurrency wallet service that supports purchasing prepaid visa cards, crypto and virtual currencies. Users may use Visa prepaid cards as well as bank transfers.OWNR Wallet OU (registration code - 14555701), registered at Harju maakond, Tallinn, Kesklinna linnaosa, Vaike-Ameerika tn 8-421, 10129. They are governed by the laws of Estonia.OWNR Wallet Limited (registration number – 2955843) registered at 7/F MW Tower, 111 Bonham Strand, Sheung Wan, Hong Kong, as of June 30, 2020. They are governed by the laws of Hong Kong.They have many registered companies operating under OWNR WALLET OU. A full list of company legal names and locations can be viewed on the bottom of the companies Terms and Conditions page:https://ownrwallet.com/terms it is presumed the rest of these offices follow the applicable laws of Estonia as well.Supported currencies include: Bitcoin, Ethereum, Bitcoin Cash, Litecoin, Z Cash, Dogecoin, TRX, Dash and more.OWNR Wallet is available on all Android, MacOs, iOs, Windows, and Linux products. Currently they have a social media presence on Twitter, Facebook, and Linkedin.

Founded in 2017, Paribu is a Turkish cryptocurrency exchange claiming to have 4M+ users and a record volume of more than 2.7 billion dollars on April 2021 (https://destek.paribu.com/hc/tr/articles/115005841469-Paribu-Nedir-). Supports 55+ cryptocurrency assets from BTC, ETH, LTC, BCH, DeFi tokens (AAVE, UNISWAP) and Sports Tokens (Fenerbahce (FB), Galatasaray (GAL), Juventus (JUV), Atletico De Madrid (ATM), FC Barcelona (BAR), Manchester City FC (CITY), AS Rome (CENTURY)) and others. On the date of this report (22 Sept 2021), Paribu ranks 46th in terms of 24 hr volume (https://coinmarketcap.com/rankings/exchanges/). Services on the platform are provided via PARIBU TEKNOLOJI A.S., a company registered in Istanbul, Turkey. Governing law: Turkey. In addition, Paribu has established “Paribu Hub”, a platform providing certified trainings on Blockchain and Cryptocurrencies (https://www.paribu.com/blog/haberler/paribu-hub-kuruldu-ilk-egitim-blockchain-gelistirici-sertifika-programi/, https://www.paribu.com/hub/).

Patricia https://www.mypatricia.co proclaims itself as an alternative payment solutions company that facilitates the easy use of cryptocurrencies for everyday transactions. Patricia services enable its customers 1. to send, receive, buy and sell cryptocurrency such as bitcoin and Ethereum, via a cryptocurrency wallet hosted by Patricia. 2. to pay for bills and services such as airtime, data, electricity, cable TV via a fiat wallet hosted by Patricia. There are a number of inconsistencies with this exchange. Terms of Services state that services are provided by Patricia OU, with an address: Rannaku pst 12, Tallinn, 10917, Estonia (c/o Hannes Rosin). Reportedly Patricia relocated its headquarters from Nigeria to Estonia to rebound from a clampdown in Nigeria that nearly destroyed its business https://guardian.ng/technology/tech/patricia-technologies-relocates-headquarters-to-europe/ and https://nairametrics.com/2021/11/10/patricia-cryptocurrency-exchange-plans-to-raise-funds-after-fleeing-nigeria. TCs however, do not mention the applicable law. It is also unclear whether this company has a valid license, while research has not produced evidence that such a company engaged in cryptocurrencies is registered in Estonia. Some similar entries exist (probably unrelated): OÜ PATRICIA GRUPP, Registry code 12696685, dealing in catering and restaurants and Patricia OÜ, Registry code 10179649, engaged in rental and/or operating of own or leased real estate. https://www.teatmik.ee/en/search/patricia/1 and https://mtr.mkm.ee/taotluse_tulemus/555803 and https://ariregister.rik.ee/eng/company/10179649/Patricia-O%C3%9CPatricia Technologies Limited however, is a company presumably registered in Nigeria, with the Corporate Affairs Commission in Nigeria) with RC Number: 1484208. Research however, has not produced evidence of such a registration https://search.cac.gov.ng/list

Paybis is a cryptocurrency exchange based in Scotland claiming to serve 700K customers from 180+ countries, providing 30+ crypto & 47 fiat currencies (https://paybis.com/). Services are provided via "PAYBIS LTD", a private company incorporated on 28 April 2016 (company number SC533961) with registered office at 1 West Regent Street, Glasgow, Scotland, G2 1RW (https://paybis.com/policies/terms-of-service/ and https://find-and-update.company-information.service.gov.uk/company/SC533961). Paybis is registered with the Financial Conduct Authority of the UK (reference number 928013) until the 31st of March 2022 and its application to register on a permanent basis is currently pending determination.Governing law: England. The company is also included on the FinCEN’s MSB Registrant with MSB Registration Number: 31000175037491. Restricted jurisdictions include the state of New York (USA), while Paybis does not accept fiat-to-crypto orders from customers residing in selected US states and territories: Alaska, Florida, Louisiana, Nevada, New Mexico, Puerto Rico, Vermont, Washington, involving the following cryptocurrencies: Aave (AAVE), Axie Infinity (AXS), Binance Coin (BNB), Chiliz (CHZ), Holo (HOT), Shiba Inu (SHIB), SushiSwap (SUSHI) and TRON (TRX). Paybis does not accept orders that involve stable coins (i.e., Tether) from customers from Texas.(https://paybis.com/policies/terms-of-service/).The Customers from Alaska, Florida, Louisiana, Nevada, New Mexico, Puerto Rico, Vermont, and Washington are additionally required to read and accept Zero Hash LLC Services Agreement to be able to use the Services.Founded in 2015, Paxful claims to serve 6M+ users and provides peer-to-peer transactions for buying, selling and trading cryptocurrencies with over 350 ways to buy and sell Bitcoin(bank transactions, online wallets, gift cards, cash payments, debit/credit cards, digital currency) (https://www.linkedin.com/company/paxful-inc). Services are provided by "Paxful Inc." and its affiliates include but not limited to Paxful USA, Inc. (https://paxful.com/terms-of-service). According to Paxful, its primary location is Wilmington, Delaware (Governing law: Delaware, USA), but has offices in New York, Estonia, Hong Kong, Philippines, UK, Dubai, and St. Petersburg as well (https://www.linkedin.com/company/paxful-inc). Various countries have been identified as restricted jurisdictions, including the State of New York and Washington in the USA, Cuba, Iran, Iraq, Sudan, Syria, Burundi, Libya, North Korea, Somalia, Venezuela, Yemen, plus more on OFAC list. https://paxful.com/support/en-us/articles/360013470374-List-of-banned-countries-OFAC. Additionally, the services are not available for Tether (USDT), to users residing in the State of Texas (https://paxful.com/terms-of-service). In 2019, Paxful announced an integration onto BitMart, a premier global digital asset trading platform in the cryptocurrency market with over 600,000 users worldwide. The integration will allow users to make payments via Paxful on the BitMart platform, marking the first efforts of the latter in joining the fast growing peer-to-peer financial revolution (https://paxful.com/blog/peer-to-peer-bitcoin-marketplace-paxful-announces-a-joint-venture-with-bitmart-exchange/).

Paybis does not accept orders that involve stable coins (i.e., Tether) from customers from Texas.(https://paybis.com/policies/terms-of-service/).The Customers from Alaska, Florida, Louisiana, Nevada, New Mexico, Puerto Rico, Vermont, and Washington are additionally required to read and accept Zero Hash LLC Services Agreement to be able to use the Services.Founded in 2015, Paxful claims to serve 6M+ users and provides peer-to-peer transactions for buying, selling and trading cryptocurrencies with over 350 ways to buy and sell Bitcoin(bank transactions, online wallets, gift cards, cash payments, debit/credit cards, digital currency) (https://www.linkedin.com/company/paxful-inc). Services are provided by "Paxful Inc." and its affiliates include but not limited to Paxful USA, Inc. (https://paxful.com/terms-of-service). According to Paxful, its primary location is Wilmington, Delaware (Governing law: Delaware, USA), but has offices in New York, Estonia, Hong Kong, Philippines, UK, Dubai, and St. Petersburg as well (https://www.linkedin.com/company/paxful-inc). Various countries have been identified as restricted jurisdictions, including the State of New York and Washington in the USA, Cuba, Iran, Iraq, Sudan, Syria, Burundi, Libya, North Korea, Somalia, Venezuela, Yemen, plus more on OFAC list. https://paxful.com/support/en-us/articles/360013470374-List-of-banned-countries-OFAC. Additionally, the services are not available for Tether (USDT), to users residing in the State of Texas (https://paxful.com/terms-of-service). In 2019, Paxful announced an integration onto BitMart, a premier global digital asset trading platform in the cryptocurrency market with over 600,000 users worldwide. The integration will allow users to make payments via Paxful on the BitMart platform, marking the first efforts of the latter in joining the fast growing peer-to-peer financial revolution (https://paxful.com/blog/peer-to-peer-bitcoin-marketplace-paxful-announces-a-joint-venture-with-bitmart-exchange/).

According to Paxful, its primary location is Wilmington, Delaware (Governing law: Delaware, USA), but has offices in New York, Estonia, Hong Kong, Philippines, UK, Dubai, and St. Petersburg as well (https://www.linkedin.com/company/paxful-inc). Various countries have been identified as restricted jurisdictions, including the State of New York and Washington in the USA, Cuba, Iran, Iraq, Sudan, Syria, Burundi, Libya, North Korea, Somalia, Venezuela, Yemen, plus more on OFAC list. https://paxful.com/support/en-us/articles/360013470374-List-of-banned-countries-OFAC. Additionally, the services are not available for Tether (USDT), to users residing in the State of Texas (https://paxful.com/terms-of-service). In 2019, Paxful announced an integration onto BitMart, a premier global digital asset trading platform in the cryptocurrency market with over 600,000 users worldwide. The integration will allow users to make payments via Paxful on the BitMart platform, marking the first efforts of the latter in joining the fast growing peer-to-peer financial revolution (https://paxful.com/blog/peer-to-peer-bitcoin-marketplace-paxful-announces-a-joint-venture-with-bitmart-exchange/).

Paybis is a cryptocurrency exchange based in Scotland claiming to serve 700K customers from 180+ countries, providing 30+ crypto & 47 fiat currencies (https://paybis.com/). Services are provided via "PAYBIS LTD", a private company incorporated on 28 April 2016 (company number SC533961) with registered office at 1 West Regent Street, Glasgow, Scotland, G2 1RW (https://paybis.com/policies/terms-of-service/ and https://find-and-update.company-information.service.gov.uk/company/SC533961). Paybis is registered with the Financial Conduct Authority of the UK (reference number 928013) until the 31st of March 2022 and its application to register on a permanent basis is currently pending determination.Governing law: England. The company is also included on the FinCEN’s MSB Registrant with MSB Registration Number: 31000175037491. Restricted jurisdictions include the state of New York (USA), while Paybis does not accept fiat-to-crypto orders from customers residing in selected US states and territories: Alaska, Florida, Louisiana, Nevada, New Mexico, Puerto Rico, Vermont, Washington, involving the following cryptocurrencies: Aave (AAVE), Axie Infinity (AXS), Binance Coin (BNB), Chiliz (CHZ), Holo (HOT), Shiba Inu (SHIB), SushiSwap (SUSHI) and TRON (TRX). Paybis is a cryptocurrency exchange based in Scotland claiming to serve 700K customers from 180+ countries, providing 30+ crypto & 47 fiat currencies (https://paybis.com/). Services are provided via "PAYBIS LTD", a private company incorporated on 28 April 2016 (company number SC533961) with registered office at 1 West Regent Street, Glasgow, Scotland, G2 1RW (https://paybis.com/policies/terms-of-service/ and https://find-and-update.company-information.service.gov.uk/company/SC533961). Paybis is registered with the Financial Conduct Authority of the UK (reference number 928013) until the 31st of March 2022 and its application to register on a permanent basis is currently pending determination.Governing law: England. The company is also included on the FinCEN’s MSB Registrant with MSB Registration Number: 31000175037491. Restricted jurisdictions include the state of New York (USA), while Paybis does not accept fiat-to-crypto orders from customers residing in selected US states and territories: Alaska, Florida, Louisiana, Nevada, New Mexico, Puerto Rico, Vermont, Washington, involving the following cryptocurrencies: Aave (AAVE), Axie Infinity (AXS), Binance Coin (BNB), Chiliz (CHZ), Holo (HOT), Shiba Inu (SHIB), SushiSwap (SUSHI) and TRON (TRX). Paybis does not accept orders that involve stable coins (i.e., Tether) from customers from Texas.(https://paybis.com/policies/terms-of-service/).The Customers from Alaska, Florida, Louisiana, Nevada, New Mexico, Puerto Rico, Vermont, and Washington are additionally required to read and accept Zero Hash LLC Services Agreement to be able to use the Services.Founded in 2015, Paxful claims to serve 6M+ users and provides peer-to-peer transactions for buying, selling and trading cryptocurrencies with over 350 ways to buy and sell Bitcoin(bank transactions, online wallets, gift cards, cash payments, debit/credit cards, digital currency) (https://www.linkedin.com/company/paxful-inc). Services are provided by "Paxful Inc." and its affiliates include but not limited to Paxful USA, Inc. (https://paxful.com/terms-of-service). According to Paxful, its primary location is Wilmington, Delaware (Governing law: Delaware, USA), but has offices in New York, Estonia, Hong Kong, Philippines, UK, Dubai, and St. Petersburg as well (https://www.linkedin.com/company/paxful-inc). Various countries have been identified as restricted jurisdictions, including the State of New York and Washington in the USA, Cuba, Iran, Iraq, Sudan, Syria, Burundi, Libya, North Korea, Somalia, Venezuela, Yemen, plus more on OFAC list. https://paxful.com/support/en-us/articles/360013470374-List-of-banned-countries-OFAC. Additionally, the services are not available for Tether (USDT), to users residing in the State of Texas (https://paxful.com/terms-of-service). In 2019, Paxful announced an integration onto BitMart, a premier global digital asset trading platform in the cryptocurrency market with over 600,000 users worldwide. The integration will allow users to make payments via Paxful on the BitMart platform, marking the first efforts of the latter in joining the fast growing peer-to-peer financial revolution (https://paxful.com/blog/peer-to-peer-bitcoin-marketplace-paxful-announces-a-joint-venture-with-bitmart-exchange/).

PayBito, Hashcash Consultants Pte. Ltd., is headquartered and subpoenable in the United States. They also have locations in Australia, Singapore, United Arab Emirates, and India.The platform supports the leading fiat currencies of the world like Euro, USD and others, besides Bitcoin-Bitcoin cash, Ethereum, XRP, Litecoin, ERC20 and HCX.PayBito is a security centric, multi currency supported, Segwit enabled, high frequency trading platform with ERC20 compliance meticulously designed for digital assets. PayBito offers a complete White Label Cryptocurrency Exchange Software application to buy, sell and trade in cryptocurrencies.PayBito is a leading cryptocurrency asset trading platform operating in USA and India. The platform is designed and operated by a team with rich experience in Banking security systems, Cryptocurrency trading and Blockchain technology. Available in iOS and Android stores, PayBito claims to offer some of the best rates and top-notch security on the planet.

Founded in 2018, Paymium with the legal name Paymium SAS, has developed a marketplace dedicated to the trading of crypto-assets for individuals and investors. Paymium.com offers solutions for merchants and payment processors allowing them to accept payments in bitcoins, while avoiding currency risks and reducing transaction costs.Services are provided by "Paymium SAS" a company based in Paris, France. Paymium is registered as a Digital Asset Service Provider (DASP) with the Autorité des Marchés Financiers (AMF) under the registration number E2021-011. Applicable laws apply to french law,Paymium offers bitcoin for trade and has a social media presence on Twitter, Facebook, and Linkedin.

Founded in 1998 (originally named “Confinity”), PayPal claims to be one of the biggest payment providers remaining at the forefront of the digital payment revolution for more than 20 years, growing into a two-sided network that connects merchants and consumers in more than 200 markets around the world. PayPal is operating via PayPal Inc., whose corporate headquarters are in San Jose, California, and international headquarters in Singapore.For US customers PayPal has recently introduced crypto (including Bitcoin, Ethereum, Litecoin and Bitcoin Cash) as a funding option in eligible purchases. Users can also buy, hold, and sell crypto with PayPal. Paypal launched its cryptocurrency services in the UKin August 2021, and will let British customers buy, hold and sell digital currencies as well.All custody of and trading in Crypto Assets is performed for PayPal by its licensed service provider, Paxos Trust Company, LLC ("Paxos"). For New York residents, the Service Provider will be licensed or otherwise authorized by the New York State Department of Financial Services. To use PayPal’s “Cryptocurrencies Hub” (buying, selling, holding crypto and viewing market information and educational content), US customers should have a personal PayPal account and balance account. Hawaiian residents are not currently allowed to establish a Cryptocurrencies Hub. At this moment, transferring of crypto assets from a Cryptocurrencies Hub to an external cryptocurrency wallet, withdrawing or sending crypto assets to family and friends is not possible. PayPal plans to expand crypto in more regions in the future.PayPal has acquired HyperWallet, a crypto currency wallet for approximately $400 million USD. This transaction will strengthen PayPals Payout capabilities and increase their ability to provide an integrated suite of payment solutions. Article on acquisition:https://www.businesswire.com/news/home/20181115005757/en/PayPal-Completes-Acquisition-of-HyperwalletCurrently they have a social media presence on Twitter, Facebook ,and LinkedIn.

Pepperstone Group Limited is both domiciled and subpoenable in Australia.Pepperstone is an online Forex and CFD Broker providing traders across the globe with cutting-edge technology to trade the world’s markets. We are driven to provide traders with low-cost pricing across all our instruments including FX, CFDs, Cryptocurrencies and Commodities.Pepperstone is an ASIC, FCA, SCB, CMA, SCB, BaFin and DFSA regulated broker. Please refer to www.pepperstonegroup.com for more information about our companies. This information isn’t intended for distribution to/use by any person in any country where such distribution/use would be contrary to local laws.Pepperstone is built on an uncompromising level of service for all its clients, underpinned with what they claim is some of the best prices and execution speeds in the industry. Trade market-leading spreads with a global FX and CFD broker.Pepperstone was founded in 2010 in Melbourne, Australia by a team of experienced traders with a shared commitment to improve the world of online trading. Frustrated by delayed executions, expensive prices and poor customer support, we set out to provide traders around the world with superior technology, low-cost spreads and a genuine commitment to helping them master the trade.At Pepperstone, they claim to know what it’s like to trade. With the scale of a global fintech and the agility of a start-up, we’re here to arm you with everything you need to take on the global markets with confidence.

Perfect Money has a long list of partnerships, find at: https://perfectmoney.is/business-partners.htmlPerfect Money with the legal name "Startup Research & Investments Ltd." is a Internet payment system and payment processor for money transfers. Deals with transactions in the following formats: B2B, B2C, C2B, P2P. Depositing money into the system can be performed in various ways: wire transfers, electronic currency, exchange partners (fiat-to-fiat), store crypto-currency value. The use of Perfect Money system by US citizens and permanent residents is strictly prohibited.Perfect money allows you to buy Bitcoin, Gold Metal, USD and EUR currency online and are domiciled in Hong Kong. You can find Perfect Money on Twitter, Facebook, and Linkedin.

As of today's review (08/24/2022), the website is down for maintenance. The only information they provided was the hi@plasmapay.com email.From the looks on their Twitter account, it appears they might be migrating over to Plasma Finance. We currently have a card for that: https://app.pipefy.com/open-cards/493869831PlasmaPay is a blockchain and application infrastructure with a mission to decentralize the centralized financial services industry. Services include payment processing, sending & receiving payments (regardless of card provider or bank), cross-border transactions (all with zero commissions), as well as instant liquidity.PlasmaPay has a social media presence on Twitter.

Founded in 2008, the Plus500 trading platform is offered by Plus500UK Ltd, a UK based company with its offices located in the City of London. The company is authorized and regulated by the Financial Conduct Authority (FCA) to offer Contracts For Difference (CFD). The company is a rapidly growing CFD provider and currently offers its portfolio of over 2000 instruments. Plus500UK Ltd is a subsidiary of Plus500 Ltd; a company listed on the London Stock Exchange’s Main Market for Listed Companies, and headquartered in Haifa.Partners of Plus500 include: ATLETICO DE MADRID, BSC YOUNG BOYS, GLOWNY, ATALANTA, FXEMPIRE, finanzen.net, and Money.it.Plus500 is a leading provider of Contracts for Difference (CFDs), delivering trading facilities on shares, forex, commodities, cryptocurrencies, ETFs, options and indices, alongside innovative trading technology.

Founded in 2014, Poloniex is a cryptocurrency exchange platform that offers multiple crypto trading services, fiat-crypto exchange, and DeFi products.The platform supports over 200 spot trading pairs and 25 margin trading pairs. Users can trade the general popular cryptocurrencies such as Bitcoin, Ethereum, Binance, Tether, USD coin, Monero, Zcash, and more.Poloniex has an exchange tool where users can exchange between fiat currency and cryptocurrency. The fiat currency list includes $USD, $EUR, $CAD, $JPY, $RUB, and $UAH.Other features on this platform include, futures trading, ICOs, and a NFT marketplace.The arbitration will be conducted by a single, neutral arbitrator and shall take place in the county or parish in which you reside, or another mutually agreeable location, in the English language. The arbitrator may award any relief that a court of competent jurisdiction could award and the arbitral decision may be enforced in any court. Users who are a resident, national or agent of these countries cannot use Poloniex: national or agent of Afghanistan, Burma, the Canadian province of Ontario, the Chinese Mainland, Crimea of Ukraine, Cuba, Democratic Republic of Congo, Iran, Iraq, Ivory Coast, Lebanon, Libya, Mali, North Korea, Palestine, Somalia, Sudan, Syrian Arab Republic, Yemen, Zimbabwe, the United States and all US Territories or any other country to which the United States embargoes goods or imposes similar sanctions.Users may not use the Services to trade in Futures if they are a resident, national or agent of Burundi, Burma, Democratic Republic of Congo, Mali, Morocco, Somalia, The Chinese Mainland and Zimbabwe.In August 2021, the US Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC) released a statement that Poloniex agreed to pay more than $10 million to settle charges for operating an unregistered online digital asset exchange in connection with its operation of a trading platform that facilitated buying and selling of digital asset securities between 2017-2019 (https://www.sec.gov/news/press-release/2021-147).In August 2022, South Korea accuses Poloniex of illegal business activities without proper registration: https://www.coindesk.com/policy/2022/08/18/south-koreas-money-laundering-watchdog-flags-16-crypto-firms-for-operating-without-registration/

Polyx is a versatile ecosystem that enables users to buy, sell, exchange, and store cryptocurrency, as well as earn through staking and participating in token sales. Buyers and sellers can transact using funds that they deposit into their accounts.Sanctioned Jurisdiction: means any country or territory to the extent that such country or territory is the subject of any sanction issued by the United Nations, United States and/or the European Union.Sanctioned Person: means any individual or entity (a) identified on a sanctions list issued by the United Nations, United States and/or the European Union; (b) organized, domiciled or resident in a Sanctioned Jurisdiction; or (c) otherwise the subject or target of any sanctions, including by reason of ownership or control by one or more individuals or entities described in clauses (a) or (b). https://polyx.net/static/docs/ENAMLPolicy_site.pdfLaunched in 2018, Polyx is a cryptocurrency exchange, which allows its users to buy, sell, accept and store the following cryptocurrencies: BTC, ETH, BCH, XRP, USDT, EOS and LTC.Polyx is operated by Digitaltrade Ltd, a company incorporated under the laws of Saint Vincent and the Grenadines, business company number: 26561 BC 2021. Should the dispute not be settled in a mediation procedure, then the interested party can present the dispute before the Magistrate's Court of Saint Vincent and the Grenadines in accordance with the Company location.

PrimeBit Ltd. (operating under the trading name “PrimeBit”), a limited liability company with Company Registration Number: 25433 BC 2019 located in Griffith Corporate Centre, Beachmont, Kingstown VC0100, Saint Vincent and the Grenadines, and any of its designated and permitted successors, hereinafter referred to as the “Company” or “PrimeBit”.Regards to PrimeBit, in the event of any dispute, fraud suspicion, breach hereof or complaint from a Client, the Company has the right to apply the appropriate provisions of the Terms of Service and Affiliation Agreement.PrimeBit is a P2P crypto-products trading platform. Supports BTC, ETH, LTC, USDT. Services are provided by "PrimeBit Ltd" a company registered in Saint Vincent and the Grenadines. Citizens of USA, Canada, Japan (among others) are prohibited from using the services of this platform. Quickbit is a Swedish fintech company founded in 2016 with the goal of enabling more people and companies to use cryptocurrency on an everyday basis. A part of their business is to offer solutions for e-merchants to be paid in cryptocurrency, as well as offering user-friendly and secure solutions for people to easily use cryptocurrency. They offer the buying, selling, trading, and exchanging of cryptocurrencies. Minimum trades start at just $5. They currently support Bitcoin, Ethereum, Litecoin, Bitcoin Cash, Polkadot, Cardano, Chainlink, and Tether. They accept Visa and Mastercard for deposits. They also offer a Visa card for users to swap their crypto to Euros and pay wherever Visa is accepted, this card also offers free withdrawals at ATMs and offers international payments. The Quickbit mobile application is available for users to download on Google Play and the Apple App Store. Currently they have a social medai presence on Twitter, Instagram, Facebook, and LinkedIn.

Raido Financial is a global fintech ecosystem that combines a set of universal crypto tools for trading, exchange, financial and investment operations for all B2B and B2C crypto market players through the single platform. Raidos mission is to provide all the market stakeholders with the most efficient, comprehensive and secure tools for carrying out all needed crypto activities.Financial Raido provides a highlevel of protection for its clients thanks to the cold storage of assets and the use of our own crypto Node. The platform implemented several levels of protection of personal and commercial customer dataFinancial Raido provides crypto assets purchase / sale services for fiat funds (EUR). Cooperation with European financial companies gives an opportunity to provide low commissions for fiat operations with crypto assets.

Allow users to buy crypto without leaving your dApp or wallet. Increase conversion. Be ready for your next million users.Ramp is an easy way to let your users buy crypto directly from your dApp.It is an entirely new type of on-ramp: aggregating various sources of liquidity and payment methods to give your users the on-ramping process they deserve and your developers the easy integration they dreamed of.If you need to learn more about on-ramps and stuff, read on. If you're a pro already, go straight to the get started section.A production-level example is available here.So why do you need on-ramps at all?I know, your users already own crypto. That is true, for now. A majority of people in crypto got in early and they won't buy loads now. But majority in crypto is still... maybe 20k people. Terribly small market, isn't it?We think crypto deserves 100x more attention. To do this, we need to open up to those who don't have it yet. Do you really want to send them away from your dApp to Coinbase for days to get some DAI? No? Didn't think so too.Ramp can help you with this. Our product is designed to onboard the newbies into the crypto universe - with a clear and self-explanatory UX, approachable fees and wide offer of supported payment methods available straight from your dApp. We don't overcomplicate stuff with excessive KYC - the bare minimum will do for us. You, a developer, will like it too - just check the SDK package.

Established in 2009, RoboForex is an international broker. Supports 8 asset classes: Forex (40+ currency pairs), Stocks (access 12K+ stocks), Indices (portfolio of stocks that represent a particular market), ETFs, Soft Commodities (coffee, cocoa, sugar, corn, wheat, soybean, fruit), Energies (oil, natural gas, heating oil, ethanol) , Metals (gold, silver, platinum, palladium) and Cryptocurrencies (invest in 26 crypto instruments and access to trading CFDs on Bitcoin, Solana, Stellar, Ethereum, Litecoin, Ripple). Services are provided by RoboForex Ltd, a company registered in Belize, reg. number 128.572 regulated by the IFSC in Belize, license No. 000138/210,for "Trading in financial and commodity-based derivative instruments and other securities". IFSC is the regulator of financial services markets, while the activity of IFSC is regulated by the Ministry of Belize Securities and International Financial Services Commission Act (IFSC Act). RoboForex Ltd and its affiliates do not target UK clients, while the USA, Canada, Japan, Australia (among other countries) are prohibited jurisdictions. All card transactions on websites operated by RoboMarkets/RoboForex Group are processed by RoboMarkets Ltd (regulated by the CySEC, license No.191/13). The paying agent for VISA/MasterCard (Pasta Banka) is RoboGate Ltd (registration number is 112864-24, the legal address is 186 Main str., PO Box 453, Gibraltar). The paying agent for VISA/MasterCard (Connectum) is GuruHosting Ltd registration number is HE 310211, the legal address is Dimitriou Nikolaou 4, Office 101, Mesa Geitonia, 4006, Limassol, Cyprus). RoboForex Ltd is an "A" category member of the Financial Commission, and also is a participant of its Compensation Fund. The Compensation Fund is a service included with Financial Commission membership which provides protection up to €20,000 per case to any client of the company, which is a member of the Financial Commission, should a member refuse to adhere to a judgment from the Financial Commission.Restricts users from: USA, Canada, Japan, Australia, Bonaire, Curaçao, East Timor, Liberia, Saipan, Russia, Sint Eustatius, Tahiti, Turkey, Guinea-Bissau, Micronesia, Northern Mariana Islands, Svalbard and Jan Mayen, South Sudan, and other restricted countries.

Founded in 2014, SFOX is a cryptocurrency exchange that provides users a place to purchase and sell cryptocurrency. Customers also have access to trading algorithms, account management tools, general news and information, trading alerts, market data (including price and analytics), and educational information. Liquidity Pools are provided by over 50 different entities such as: Binance, Bittrex, and Gemini.According to their Terms and Conditions, when utilizing the Services to buy or sell cryptocurrency, the user will be directly buying from and directly selling to SFOX. The company does not offer exchange or clearance services. It also states that when a user does not trade or engage in any funding activity on the SFOX Site for an uninterrupted period of three months, SFOX reserves the right to charge and obtain an inactivity fee of $50 per month, with or without notice.Services are provided by one of the following SFOX parties:SFOX, Inc. - A licensed Money Services Business with FinCEN in the United States (Registration Number 31000211271273). For registered users who are US residents in the following states: Alaska, Arizona, Arkansas, California, Colorado, Delaware, Idaho, Indiana, Kansas, Kentucky, Maine, Maryland, Massachusetts, Michigan, Minnesota, Missouri, Montana, Nebraska, New Jersey, Oklahoma, Pennsylvania, Tennessee, Texas, Utah, Virginia, and Wisconsin. Governing law is that of the State of California, USA. Arbitration seat is also California.SAFE Trust Company, Inc - A Wyoming trust charter company that offers patented, geographically distributed MPC wallets and $200MM insurance. For registered users who are US residents in the following states: Alabama, Florida, Illinois, Iowa, Mississippi, New Hampshire, Ohio, Oregon, Vermont, Washington, West Virginia, and Wyoming. Governing Law is that of the State of Wyoming, USA. Arbitration seat is also Wyoming.SFOX BVI, - for users registered in The British Virgin Islands. Governing law is that of The British Virgin Islands and the seat of arbitration is also The British Virgin Islands.SFOX Pte. Ltd. - For users registered in Singapore. Governing law is that of Singapore. Arbitration seat is also in Singapore.Currently they have a social media presence on Twitter, Facebook, and LinkedIn.

Governing law is that of The British Virgin Islands and the seat of arbitration is also The British Virgin Islands.SFOX Pte. Ltd. - For users registered in Singapore. Governing law is that of Singapore. Arbitration seat is also in Singapore.Currently they have a social media presence on Twitter, Facebook, and LinkedIn.

Founded in 2014, SFOX is a cryptocurrency exchange that provides users a place to purchase and sell cryptocurrency. Customers also have access to trading algorithms, account management tools, general news and information, trading alerts, market data (including price and analytics), and educational information. Liquidity Pools are provided by over 50 different entities such as: Binance, Bittrex, and Gemini.According to their Terms and Conditions, when utilizing the Services to buy or sell cryptocurrency, the user will be directly buying from and directly selling to SFOX. The company does not offer exchange or clearance services. It also states that when a user does not trade or engage in any funding activity on the SFOX Site for an uninterrupted period of three months, SFOX reserves the right to charge and obtain an inactivity fee of $50 per month, with or without notice.Services are provided by one of the following SFOX parties:SFOX, Inc. - A licensed Money Services Business with FinCEN in the United States (Registration Number 31000211271273). For registered users who are US residents in the following states: Alaska, Arizona, Arkansas, California, Colorado, Delaware, Idaho, Indiana, Kansas, Kentucky, Maine, Maryland, Massachusetts, Michigan, Minnesota, Missouri, Montana, Nebraska, New Jersey, Oklahoma, Pennsylvania, Tennessee, Texas, Utah, Virginia, and Wisconsin. Governing law is that of the State of California, USA. Arbitration seat is also California.SAFE Trust Company, Inc - A Wyoming trust charter company that offers patented, geographically distributed MPC wallets and $200MM insurance. For registered users who are US residents in the following states: Alabama, Florida, Illinois, Iowa, Mississippi, New Hampshire, Ohio, Oregon, Vermont, Washington, West Virginia, and Wyoming. Governing Law is that of the State of Wyoming, USA. Arbitration seat is also Wyoming.SFOX BVI, - for users registered in The British Virgin Islands. Governing law is that of The British Virgin Islands and the seat of arbitration is also The British Virgin Islands.SFOX Pte. Ltd. - For users registered in Singapore. Governing law is that of Singapore. Arbitration seat is also in Singapore.Currently they have a social media presence on Twitter, Facebook, and LinkedIn.

At date of review (February 7, 2022) the site is non-operational. Currently no articles can be found as to why this exchange vanished, so using the Wayback Machine a close date of December 24, 2021 is being assessed as this was the last successful access to the site.Simex is a multifunctional online international digital asset management, investment (in new projects), and trading platform. Also offers transfers between accounts and to accounts of third parties, deposit/withdraw from linked debit cards including payments to third parties.Services are provided by "Simex Europe OU" a company in Tallinn, Estonia (registry number: 14234486 ). Terms and Conditions mention that the company has a license ( FRK000479) to provide virtual currency wallet services, and a license (FVR000567) to provide crypto-to-fiat services. However, it appears that both licenses have expired 30.03.2020 and that the company has not yet submitted its financial statements for 2019 and 2020 https://www.teatmik.ee/en/personlegal/14234486-Simex-Europe-O%C3%9C Applicable law: England and Wales (art 11.8 of TCs).

SimpleFX is cryptocurrency trading platform where users can invest and trade cryptocurrency. Users can trade cryptocurrency like Bitcoin and Ethereum.Other services include staking, contests, and community platform where users can share their trading ideas or strategies.Residents of United States, Albania, Algeria, Barbados, Botswana, Burkina Faso, Cambodia, Cayman Island, Cuba, Ecuador, Ethiopia, Ghana, Iran, Jamaica, Mauritius, Myanmar, Nicaragua, North Korea, Pakistan, Saint Vincent and the Grenadines, Panama, Senegal, Sri Lanka, Syrian Arab Republic, Tunisia, Uganda, Yemen, and Zimbabwe are restricted from their services.Services are provided by "SimplexFX Ltd." a company incorporated in St. Vincent and the Grenadines, with a legal entity identifier 21380042B8QJ87V4HA89. SimpleFX is domiciled and subpoenable in Saint Vincent and the Grenadines. They have a social media presence on Facebook and Twitter.

Simplex is a payment processor institution that enables users to pay or receive payments with Mastercard, VISA, Apple Pay, SWIFT, SEPA, crypto, and more.The cryptocurrency exchange platforms partnered with Simplex are: Harmony, AtomicWallet, Celsius Network, rockitcoin, paybis, edge, bitrue, abra, coinomi, TTNEX, coti, Trezor, KuCoin, TrustWallet, +1nvity, EXMO, CoinCloud, Coinswitch, changeNOW, Huobi, Binance, mycelium, DigiFinex, Lumi, bithumb, Guarda, Coinflip, gate.io, Monarch, alfacash, changelly, Coinmama, klever, BitMart, Polkadot, Poloniex, CROSS exchange, OKX, D'Cent, bitpay, HIVE, AltCoinTrader, MyEtherWallet, and TrueUSDFor selling/withdrawal, Simplex users can convert cryptocurrency to fiat currency. The only fiat currency available to exchange is Euro. The accepted cryptocurrencies available to convert are AAVE, BTC, COTI, ETH, TRX, TUSD, UNI, USDC, USDP, and USDT. For buying crypto, users will be redirected to one of their partnered exchanges. Simplex claims they support over 130+ crypto but do not specify which is available on their site.Simplex is domiciled in Lithuania. They have a social media presence on Twitter, LinkedIn and Facebook.Simplex has three legal names under their terms of use:Simplex Payment Service Limited is for Simplex UK Simplex Payment Services, UAB is Simplex Lithuania Simplex Inc. is Simplex US

Our website is temporarily closed due to an unplanned and mandatory server update.We will be at your service again as soon as possible. Thank you in advance for your understanding.' It appears that this message has been appearing some time now https://www.cryptowisser.com/exchange/sistemkoin/thus the exchange is presumed not operational.

Founded in 2016, Skilling Ltd., (previously Finovel Cyprus Ltd.), claims to be a world class CFD trading platform. They offer investments for OTCs and CFDs, trading of crypto, shares, indices, Forex, commodities, and soft commodities among other features.Skilling LTD is domiciled in Cyprus with headquartered address at 62 Athallasis Avenue, Strovolos 2012, Nicosia, Cyprus , Strovolos, Nicosia 2012, Cyprus. They are authorized and regulated by the Cyprus Securities and Exchange Commission under CIF license No. 357/18. They are also authorized to operate via their UK Branch, by the Financial Conduct Authority, under Reference Number 810951. They do not specify what laws they are governed by at this time.Currently they have a social media presence on Twitter, Instagram, Facebook, and LinkedIn as well as a YouTube Channel.

Founded in 2017, SMART VALOR was one of the first companies to embrace tokenization and Decentralized Finance (DeFi). Acknowledged by Forbes as one of Europe's top 10 technology SMEs, SMART VALOR today is leading the way with its cryptocurrency exchange and marketplace for digital assets, with users in 130+countries. They also enable banks and fintechs to offer digital assets to their customersThe Valor token is the native ERC20 token in the Smart Valor exchange. It allows it's holders to access certain benefits and discounts.Smart Valor offers multiple services including: Smart Valor - An exchange where users are able to Buy, sell and trade cryptocurrencies through the platform such as BTC, ETH, BCH, LTC, XLM, XRP, DASH, EOS and others.Digital Asset Wealth Management - Over-the-Counter (OTC) Services which offer personalized brokerage services for larger orders.Valor Prime - An NFT (Non Fungible Token) marketplace, which is still in the testing phase.Smart Valor Group is headquartered in Zug, Switzerland with offices in Liechtenstein, and Germany. They are comprised of three legal entities:SMART VALOR AG Switzerland (SMART VALOR CH) - A company incorporated under Swiss Law with its registered office in Zug, Switzerland. They are a Swiss financial intermediary, whose focus is to enable trading in Digital Assets to a wide community.SMART VALOR AG Liechtenstein (SMART VALOR FL) - A company incorporated under Liechtenstein Law with its registered office in Vaduz, Liechtenstein. They operate the VALOR Platform, a currency exchange allowing for trading in digital assets currently limited to payment and utility tokens. In addition, SMART VALOR FL offers services for storing digital assets. SMART VALOR Services GmbH (SMART VALOR DE) - A company incorporated under German Law with its registered office in Munich, Germany. SMART VALOR DE provides and develops the IT-infrastructure for the VALOR Platform and performs group internal services.Restricted Countries include: Afghanistan, Algeria, Bolivia, Ecuador, Iran, Iraq, Morocco, Nepal, North Korea, North Macedonia, Pakistan, Serbia, Syria, Uganda, USA, and Yemen.

SurBitcoin is a cryptocurrency exchange offering bitcoin and VEF (Venezuelan Bolivar Fuerte) transactions. SurBitcoin claims to be the first bitcoin exchange in Venezuela and member of BlinkTrade (a blockchain financial network). Services are provided via Inversiones V&K C.A. (RIF Nro. J-400221706), Venezuela of BlinkTrade (https://surbitcoin.com/en_US/#signup). The SurBitcoin offers both hot and cold bitcoin wallets. Although the platform offers the option of English language, the Terms and Condition are in Spanish only and are not translated.In 2017, major Venezuelan bank, ‘Banesco Bank’, closed down the bank account of SurBitcoin. The temporary suspension of SurBitcoin coincided with the local government arresting Venezuelan bitcoin miners, for utilizing the country’s resources, such as electricity, for mining Bitcoin. A few weeks later, operation of SurBitcoin resumed (https://cointelegraph.com/news/venezuelas-largest-bitcoin-exchange-resumes-trading-after-bank-conflict-resolution, https://www.newsbtc.com/news/surbitcoin-business-next-week/).

LegalName: Bee to Bee Tech Private Limited
OrgNotes: Techbank is an exchange that offers both personal and business loyalty accounts where users can purchase crypto, and mine crypto. Users can buy, sell and manage over 60 currencies in one place where CCRB is one of the base markets. TechBank will also be introducing Margin trading and BOT trading on the platform soon. Techbank offers a mobile app for TechBank services on iOs and Android as well as a TechBank DWallet app.They claim the CCRB Ecosystem is what creates the usability that makes their cryptocurrency truly innovative and unique. CCRB launched the concept of blockchain technology written on the dynamics of the “Proof of Spending Protocol – POSp” (Patent App No: GB1719487.9) The “POSp” Protocol validates transactions and the participating parties, to create new value after every successful transaction. The POSp concept covers all validated spending including public sector spending, private sector spending, trade spending, charity spending as well as any kind of transaction that is processed between two or more parties.Bee to Bee Tech Private Limited is the provider of the platform with its registered address at 203,2nd Floor, Ackruti Star, MIDC Central Rd, Andheri East, Mumbai, Maharashtra 400093. They are governed by the applicable laws of India.Currently they have a social media presence on Twitter, Instagram, and LinkedIn as well as a YouTube Channel.

ThinkMarkets is a premium, multi-asset, brokerage firm providing traders access to a wide range of markets including equities , forex, cryptocurrencies, commodities, indices, and futures. The information for ThinkMarkets, TF Global Markets Int Limited, is not directed to residents of the United States, Canada, the European Union, Australia, United Kingdom and Japan and is not intended for distribution to, or use by, any person in any country or jurisdiction where such distribution or use would be contrary to local law or regulation.Established in 2010, ThinkMarkets is a premium multi-asset online brokerage with headquarters in London and Melbourne and hubs in the Asia-Pacific, Middle East and North Africa, Europe and South America.They claim to provide quick and easy access to a wide range of markets including forex, CFDs on equities, cryptocurrencies, commodities, indices, futures and more. They deliver some of the most recognized trading solutions – the industry standard MetaTrader4, the next-generation Metatrader 5 and our in house developed platform ThinkTrader, awarded for Best Mobile Platform by the forex community.They also claim to use the latest technology to provide the best pricing and execution speed, delivering superior service to traders throughout their trading journey. We maintain some of the most competitive trading conditions in the market including tight spreads, low to zero commissions and variety of account types, tailored as per clients’ preferences and need.

April 23rd 2021 Turkish Police Detain 62 People Involved in the Thodex ExitOn April 21 2021, Turkish based crypto exchange Thodex unexpectedly shut down trading activities on its platform.https://thedailychain.com/crypto-traders-face-mayhem-after-thodex-halts-trading/With Koineks brand in 2017, most crypto currency diversity in the country, the crypto-currency sector in Turkey, most negotiated bank option, many innovations, such as the best-equipped customer service, and the first Bitcoin ATMs in the area have stepped in, bringing with us. Within a short time we became one of Turkey's fastest growing and largest crypto-currency trading platform.In line with the success we have achieved in our country, our experience and our growing goals, we have become globalized with our FinCen MSB (Money Service Business) license, which we obtained from the USA in 2020, and started to serve all over the world with our new brand name, Thodex.We offer our users worldwide crypto money experience with Thodex, which prioritizes investment security, quality service and user experience.

TideBit is a cryptocurrency trading platform that only allows citizens in Hong Kong, China, Taiwan, Vietnam, and Malaysia.Their trading platform supports Bitcoin, Ethereum, EOS, Tether, USD Coin, Bitcoin Cash, Litecoin, Ethereum Classic, HKX, USX, and TBT.TideBit Token ($TBT) is the platform's native token. Founded in August 2017 Tokens.net has been a cryptocurrency exchange from the United Kingdom. As of Feb 2021 this exchange has been closed, apparently due to the deflation of the ICO market, as explained in the website by its founder and owner Damien Merlak https://www.tokens.net/#announcement. The process of closure begun with this announcement on Feb 2021 and will finalise by Ap 2021. DTR (its native token) will be available for USDT swap at a fixed rate of 0.01124 USDT from February 16th, 2021 until July 1st, 2021.

Tokocrypto is a cryptocurrency exchange headquartered in Indonesia. They aim to help Indonesians gain a broader knowledge of cryptocurrency and to integrate blockchain technology into the society.On their platform, users can trade Bitcoin, Ethereum, Tether, Binance, Ripple, Cardano, Dogecoin, Polygon and many more.Other features of this platform include a NFT marketplace, charity, crypto event in Indonesia and launchpad.TokoToken ($TKO) is the native exchange platform token where it can be used in the exchange platform. The tokens are associated with fees discounts, airdrop entitlements, merchandise redemption, deposit/savings program and other incentives.In June 2020, Tokocrypto launched Binance IDR (BIDR) and industry-leading Rupiah-based stablecoin that is integral fiat gateway for millions of Indonesians both ERC20 and Binance Chain BEP-2.Tokocrypto is domiciled and subpoenable in Indonesia. They have social media presence on Facebook, Twitter and LinkedIn.

Founded in 2017, Tradesilvania SRL, is a cryptocurrency exchange. At this time they offer the buying, selling, and exchanging of 55+ cryptocurrencies such as Bitcoin, Ethereum, USD Tether, Polygon, Solana, Hedera and many others. They do accept Mastercard and Visa credit or debit cards for cryptocurrency purchases. The Tradesilvania app is available on Google Play and the Apple App Store.Tradesilvania is domiciled in Romania, and their registration number is 39400924. Only the residents of The European Union and European Economic Area such as Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Republic of Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Iceland, Liechtenstein and Norway are allowed at this time.Currently they have a social media presence on Twitter, LinkedIn, and Facebook.

On November 4, 2021, we announced that TradeStation plans to go public through a business combination with Quantum Fintech Acquisition Corporation (NYSE: QFTA), a special purpose acquisition company (SPAC). TradeStation’s parent company, Monex Group, Inc, will retain 100% of its existing equity in TradeStation. In addition, Monex and Galaxy Digital LP, a recognized innovator in the digital asset, cryptocurrency and blockchain technology sector, are co-anchoring the Private Investment in Public Equity (PIPE) component of the transaction, each with an investment of $50 million in TradeStation. Upon completion of the proposed transaction, TradeStation will be a publicly traded company listed on the New York Stock Exchange under the ticker symbol “TRDE.” The transaction is subject to shareholder and regulatory approvals and expected to close in the first half of 2022.TradeStation Group, Inc. is the parent company of online securities and futures brokerage firms and trading technology companies. It is headquartered in Plantation, Florida, and has offices in New York; Chicago; Richardson, Texas; London; Sydney; and Costa Rica. TradeStation is best known for the technical analysis software and electronic trading platform it provides to the active trader and certain institutional trader markets. TradeStation Group was a Nasdaq GS-listed company from 1997-2011, until acquired by Monex Group, a Tokyo Stock Exchange listed parent company of one of Japan's leading online securities brokerage firms.https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/TradeStation

There is an article online on CaijinGym.com stating they renamed to DGalaxy in June, 2021. That article can be found here: http://www.caijingym.com/qukuailian/74532.htmlThey are presumed closed 06/01/2021.UKEX is a regulated cryptocurrency exchange based in London, and created in 2018 by UDKE Ltd (EMD No.902789). The UKEX card account is managed by Contis Financial Services Ltd, whose company registration Number is 06085862, authorised by the Financial Conduct Authority (FCA) to issue eMoney (Electronic Money Institution 9000025), provide payment services and is a principal member of Visa Europe. Applicable law: England and Wales.Bitcoin, Bitcoin Cash, Ethereum, Litecoin, and Tether are the cryptocurrencies supported on this platform. $GBP and $EUR are the only accepted fiat currencies. Customers can use the UKEX-VISA/International UnionPay digital currency bank card and bank transfer opened by UKEX to utilize real-time transaction settlement services between legal currency and encrypted digital currency.

United Exchange is a simple platform that you can use to buy and sell Bitcoin, Ethereum, and other cryptocurrencies and store them in their secure wallets. It is domiciled in India and applicable law applies to Saint Vincent and the Grenadines.United Exchange has over 200 spot trading pairs and 25 margin trading pairs. United Exchange claims to be a trusted and intuitive platform for users, of all experience levels. As well as a 24/7 customer service experience.

United Exchange is a simple platform that you can use to buy and sell Bitcoin, Ethereum, and other cryptocurrencies and store them in their secure wallets. It is domiciled in India and applicable law applies to Saint Vincent and the Grenadines.United Exchange has over 200 spot trading pairs and 25 margin trading pairs. United Exchange claims to be a trusted and intuitive platform for users, of all experience levels. As well as a 24/7 customer service experience.

As used herein, “Unocoin and/or Company” refers to the holding company of Unocoin being Unocoin Technologies Private Limited (‘Company’), a private limited company incorporated under the laws of India and having its registered office on 2nd floor, Gurudas Building, S.S. Puram Main Road, Tumkur, India - 572102 its owners, directors, investors, employees or other related parties. Where the context so permits, depending upon the context, “Unocoin” may also refer to the services, products, website, content or other materials (collectively, “Materials”) provided by the Company.Unocoin's services shall be governed and construed in accordance with the laws of India. The parties agree to irrevocably submit to the exclusive jurisdiction of the courts in Bangalore for the resolution of any disputes arising from these Terms of Use.Serving since 2013, Unocoin is cryptocurrency exchange from India proclaiming to have 1.4M users. Users can purchase, sell, transfer Bitcoin and other cryptocurrencies and use Bitcoin for purchasing goods.Services are provided by "Unocoin Technologies PVT. Ltd, while "Unodax" is the holding company of Unocoin. Terms of service indicate that Unocoin services are strictly available for use only within India.

Upbit is a centralized multi-cryptocurrency exchange, supporting 39 digital currencies. They also offer staking opportunities and an NFT marketplace.For the users of Upbit Korea, by Dunamu Co.Ltd., the applicable law is that of The Republic of Korea. Dunamu was incorporated in Seoul, Korea in April 2012, then launched October 1st 2017, and is one of the country's leading fintech companies. Focused on asset management and investment, Dunamu operates Upbit, the crypto-asset exchange. Following a relevant Governmental mandate to operate lawfully an exchange until a Sept. 24, 2021 filing deadline, Upbit was the first cryptocurrency exchange to register with South Korea's Financial Intelligence Unit (FIU), and reportedly will start tightening restrictions on customers whose identities have not been verified. More on this can be found here: https://www.coindesk.com/business/2021/10/04/upbit-to-tighten-restrictions-on-non-verified-customers-in-south-koreaCurrently they have a social media presence on Twitter, Facebook, and LinkedIn.

Founded in 2013, Uphold is a multi assets digital trading platform. They support 72 cryptocurrencies and tokens, 27 fiat currencies, 1K + trading pairs, 6 stablecoins, 50 U.S. stocks and 4 precious metals.If a user resides in the US, Uphold HQ Inc. is the company responsible for providing services a company regulated by FinCEN, holding licenses in various US states. Applicable law is that of the State of New York, USA.If a user resides in Europe or Switzerland, Uphold Europe Limited is the company responsible for providing services (reg no. 09281410). They are a company in London, registered with the FCA as an EMD Agent of Optimus Cards UK Ltd. Applicable law is that of England and Wales.If a user resides anywhere outside of the US, Europe, UK, or Switzerland, Uphold Worldwide Ltd., reg no 16523, is the company responsible for providing services. They are registered in St.Johns, Antigua. Applicable law is also that of England and Wales.As Uphold is based in the United States it has appointed Uphold, Ltda a company incorporated in Portugal (Co. Number: PT513095136), to be its representative within the EEA. US customers have the option for a debit card, issued by Evolve Bank & Trust, pursuant to a license from Mastercard International. The T&C for the card can be found here: https://cdn.uphold.com/disclosures/uphold-debit-card-mastercard-agreement.pdfThey do not offer any services to the residents of the following countries: Anguilla, Antarctica, Armenia, Azerbaijan, Barbados, Bouvet Island, Cambodia, Central African Republic, Chad, Cuba, Eritrea, Fiji, French Southern Territories, Guinea, Heard and McDonald Islands, Iran, Lebanon, Liberia, Mali, Mauritius, North Korea, Palau, Samoa, Sudan, Syria, S. Minor Outlying Islands, or Vanuatu.Currently they have a social media presence on Facebook, Twitter, and LinkedIn.

ICUT Ltd. (UTEX) is a cryptocurrency exchange that offers many different services including buying and selling of cryptocurrencies, trading of crypto, Trading of the best private stocks that don't yet trade on the public markets as well as margin trading. Deposits with a Mastercard or Visa debit or credit card are supported.UTEX is headquartered in St. Vincent and the Grenadines. Their terms are also governed by the laws of St. Vincent and the Grenadines.Residents from the United States of America, Afghanistan, Bosnia and Herzegovina, Ethiopia, Guiana, Iraq, Laos, Sri Lanka, Trinidad and Tobago, Tunisia, Uganda, Vanuatu, Yemen, North Korea, Iran and Syria are prohibited from using this service.Supported currencies include: BTC, ETH, LTC, TRON, DASH, BTC Cash, and more. For a full list and more information, see link: https://utex.io/exchange-pro/BTC-USDThttps://utex.io/The UTEX mobile application is available for users to download on the Apple App Store.

Utorg OU (Utorg), founded in 2019, is a fintech company that offers to users exchanging virtual currency against a fiat currency, virtual currency wallet service, exchanging virtual currency against a virtual currency. Purchases can be made with Visa and Mastercard credit and debit cards. Utorg does not charge users any extra fees when purchasing Bitcoin. Utorg is incorporated in Tallinn, Estonia. They are governed by all applicable laws of Estonia. Any disputes will be submitted to the Estonian Court in Tallinn.Services are not available for the residents of Afghanistan, American Samoa, Austria, Bahamas, Cambodia, Central African Republic, Congo, Cuba, Ethiopia, Germany, Guam, Iran, Iraq, Japan, Libya, Netherlands, Nigeria, North Korea, Pakistan, Panama, Puerto Rico, Samoa, Serbia, Singapore, Somalia, Sudan, United States of America, US Virgin Islands, Venezuela, Yemen, and Zimbabwe among others. For full list, see link: https://utorg.pro/terms/Supported cryptocurrencies include: Bitcoin, Ethereum, Litecoin, Dogecoin, NEAR, TRX, USD Tether and a wide range of fiat currencies.They have social media presence on Twitter, Facebook, and LinkedIn.

BankName: Standard Bank Of South Africa Limited
OrgNotes: VALR (Pty) Ltd (VALR), launched on December 6, 2018, is a South African digital asset platform that allows its customers to buy, sell, store and transfer cryptocurrencies. Users can transact crypto-crypto and fiat-crypto and vice-versa.VALR is headquartered in South Africa. Their terms are governed by the laws of the Republic of South Africa. Any disputes will be submitted to the exclusive jurisdiction of the courts in Johannesburg, and in accordance with the Rules of the Arbitration Foundation of Southern Africa.Services are not available to any jurisdictions subject to United States embargo, UN sanctions, or on other government or international body sanctions lists, including the US Treasury Department’s Specially Designated Nationals List or the US Commerce Department’s Denied Persons List. Sanctions list link: https://sanctionssearch.ofac.treas.gov/Embargo list link: https://www.tradecompliance.pitt.edu/embargoed-and-sanctioned-countriesSupported currencies include: BTC, BCH, ETH, LTC, SOL, XRP, SHIB, USDC, LINK, LTC, and more. For a full list of currencies and more information regarding their markets, see links: https://www.valr.com/buysell https://www.valr.com/exchange/BTC/ZARInvestors of Valr include: Pantera, Cadenza, Alameda Research, Avon Ventures, Distributed Global, CMT Digital, Third Prime, GSR, Coinbase, Bittrex, Montegray, and 4Di.They have social media presence on Twitter, Facebook, and Linkedin.

BankName: Vietnam Technological Commercial Joint Stock Bank
OrgNotes: Founded in 2014, VBTC is a cryptocurrency exchange platform that allows users to swap between Vietnamese Dong and Bitcoin.On their Terms & Conditions page, the site claims they allow users to send/receive Bitcoin from other members on the site or outside of the site. In addition, using Bitcoin as a form of payment.VBTC is a member of the global BlinkTrade network that includes FoxBit in Brazil, SurBitcoin in Venezuela, ChileBit.NET in Chile, UrduBit in Pakistan.VBTC is domiciled in Vietnam. They have a social media presence on Twitter, LinkedIn, and Facebook.

BankName: Vietnam Prosperity Joint Stock Commercial Bank
OrgNotes: Founded in 2014, VBTC is a cryptocurrency exchange platform that allows users to swap between Vietnamese Dong and Bitcoin.On their Terms & Conditions page, the site claims they allow users to send/receive Bitcoin from other members on the site or outside of the site. In addition, using Bitcoin as a form of payment.VBTC is a member of the global BlinkTrade network that includes FoxBit in Brazil, SurBitcoin in Venezuela, ChileBit.NET in Chile, UrduBit in Pakistan.VBTC is domiciled in Vietnam. They have a social media presence on Twitter, LinkedIn, and Facebook.

LegalName: Vebitcoin Teknoloji Danışmanlık ve Dış Ticaret A.Ş.
OrgNotes: Vebitcoin https://www.vebitcoin.com has been a Turkish cryptocurrency exchange that is no longer active. Online sources report the exchange has ceased its activities citing financial strains before the Turkish authorities arrested four people linked to Vebitcoin for fraud in April 2021 (https://www.bbc.com/news/world-europe-56871403 and https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/turkey-arrests-four-cryptocurrency-platform-vebitcoin-over-fraud-2021-04-26/).

LegalName: Vebitcoin Teknoloji Danışmanlık ve Dış Ticaret A.Ş.
OrgNotes: Vebitcoin https://www.vebitcoin.com has been a Turkish cryptocurrency exchange that is no longer active. Online sources report the exchange has ceased its activities citing financial strains before the Turkish authorities arrested four people linked to Vebitcoin for fraud in April 2021 (https://www.bbc.com/news/world-europe-56871403 and https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/turkey-arrests-four-cryptocurrency-platform-vebitcoin-over-fraud-2021-04-26/).

Virtuse is a cryptocurrency exchange that is domiciled in Slovakia. Users are able to buy, trade or invest in Bitcoin and are able to set up a recurring investment from as little as 5€ a month. Virtuse allows clients to exchange over 20 fiat currencies for crypto. Clients can use debit and credit cards, as well as make and receive SEPA payments in their IBAN accounts. Virtuse claims 99% of users’ funds are kept in a cold storage with the world’s leading custodian guarded by multi-signature technology and a host of other controls. Virtuse Group Private Limited is registered in the EU commercial registry as a licensed virtual currency exchange and wallet service. They are governed by the applicable laws of Slovakia.They offer a mobile application that is available for users to download on Google Play and The Apple App Store. Currently they have a social media presence on Twitter, Instagram, Facebook, and LinkedIn as well as a YouTube Channel.

LegalName: SERVICIOS DE CRIPTOCARTERAS DIGITALES COINMX S. DE RL DE CV.
OrgNotes: Launched in 2014, VolaBit is a cryptocurrency exchange that is headquartered in Jalisco, Mexico. Users can buy, sell and trasmit cryptocurrencies (fiat-crypto-fiat). They support Bitcoin, Litecoin, Ripple, and USD Coin, among other cryptocurrencies. Owner and operator of the platform is Servicios de Criptocarteras Digitales COINMX S. DE RL DE CV. They are subpoenable in Mexico under the jurisdiction of The United Mexican States.Volabit's terms of service explain that as of the publication of the General Rules of the "Law to Regulate Financial Technology Institutions", it was determined that their operating model was not eligible to request authorization to carry out operations as a Financial Technology Institution (ITF) in its modality - platform of electronic payment funds. Thus, in accordance with said regulation from the date of publication of these terms Volabit will continue with its operations and or usual services with virtual assets directly with their users or clients, with the exception that temporarily, they will stop supporting the Mexican peso portfolio and will integrate USD Coin as the basis of their operation.Currently they have a social media presence on Twitter, LinkedIn, and Facebook.

WallTime is a cryptocurrency exchange that allows users to swap between Bitcoin and Brazilian Reals ($BRL). Users will need to create an account to use their swap tool.Services are provided by WallTime Servicos Digital LTDA, a company incorporated and registered under the laws of the Federal Republic of Brazil, registered with the CNPJ/MF (Cadastro Nacional de Pessoas Jurídicas) under No. 19.865.285/0001-51.WallTime is domiciled and subpoenable in Brazil. They have a social media presence on Twitter, Facebook, and LinkedIn.

Established in 2015, WeMoveCoins is based in Copenhagen as part of the entrepreneurial co-working network, Copenhagen Fintech Lab. WeMoveCoins ApS is a leading digital currency broker with customers in more than 120 countries around the world.Presently supports only BTC which can be bought, sold via debit/credit cards and bank transfers.WeMoveCoins.com is operated and owned by Monni ApS a company registered in Copenhagen, Denmark (CVR: 39653699), authorised by the Danish Financial Supervisory Authority under the Act on Measures to Prevent Money Laundering and Financing of Terrorism 2020, Firm Reference 41044, for the exchange between Virtual Currencies and FIAT Currencies. Applicable law: Danish law.

Launched in 2017, Wex cryptocurrency exchange (World Exchange) https://Wex.nz is no longer active. Wex has recently (Sept 2021) been in the news with former CEO being arrested for money laundering and activities on the dark market taking place via the platform. Additionally, Wex has been associated with another exchange “BTC-e” that was closed down for similar reasons of illegal activities (https://news.bitcoin.com/poland-confirms-arrest-of-former-wex-exchange-executive-in-warsaw/, https://cointelegraph.com/news/former-chief-of-russia-s-wex-crypto-exchange-arrested-in-poland, https://www.coindesk.com/business/2021/09/17/former-ceo-of-russian-crypto-exchange-wex-is-arrested-in-warsaw-report/).

WireX is a multi currency card provider where the cards can store crypto and fiat currencies. The cards can be used for a form of payment where Visa or Mastercards are accepted.Wirex achieved $1 billion of transaction volume in June 2017 and has offices in London, Tokyo and Kiev. Wirex is expected to offer contactless bitcoin payments, contactless cards, additional currencies and bitcoin-based financial products in the near future.Wirex recently announced that it has significantly disrupted the global payments industry by successfully integrating a multi-asset off-chain liquidity network - W-Pay - powered by smart contract technology, enabling ultra-low cost instant payments on a global scale. This means instant global multi-currency payment solutions, a fully automated trustless blockchain environment for M2M payments with zero blockchain fees, gateway fees, or customer chargebacks.SBI Wirex Asia was established in August 2017. This subsidiary of Wirex Limited has applied to register as a virtual currency exchange business pursuant to the Payment Service Act, which the Japanese government amended earlier this year.Countries sanctioned by the United Nations Security Council may be restricted from WireXapp services.Traditional Currency services are provided by UAB Wirex Cryptocurrency Services are provided by Wirex Digital d.o.o. https://wirexapp.com/terms-and-conditions

This subsidiary of Wirex Limited has applied to register as a virtual currency exchange business pursuant to the Payment Service Act, which the Japanese government amended earlier this year.Countries sanctioned by the United Nations Security Council may be restricted from WireXapp services.Traditional Currency services are provided by UAB Wirex Cryptocurrency Services are provided by Wirex Digital d.o.o. https://wirexapp.com/terms-and-conditions

WireX is a multi currency card provider where the cards can store crypto and fiat currencies. The cards can be used for a form of payment where Visa or Mastercards are accepted.Wirex achieved $1 billion of transaction volume in June 2017 and has offices in London, Tokyo and Kiev. Wirex is expected to offer contactless bitcoin payments, contactless cards, additional currencies and bitcoin-based financial products in the near future.Wirex recently announced that it has significantly disrupted the global payments industry by successfully integrating a multi-asset off-chain liquidity network - W-Pay - powered by smart contract technology, enabling ultra-low cost instant payments on a global scale. This means instant global multi-currency payment solutions, a fully automated trustless blockchain environment for M2M payments with zero blockchain fees, gateway fees, or customer chargebacks.SBI Wirex Asia was established in August 2017. This subsidiary of Wirex Limited has applied to register as a virtual currency exchange business pursuant to the Payment Service Act, which the Japanese government amended earlier this year.Countries sanctioned by the United Nations Security Council may be restricted from WireXapp services.Traditional Currency services are provided by UAB Wirex Cryptocurrency Services are provided by Wirex Digital d.o.o. https://wirexapp.com/terms-and-conditions

TorsaEst Group OU (Wisenex) is a platform that allows users to buy, sell, and trade cryptocurrencies online using Visa or MasterCard credit and debit cards. When an account is verified and the preferred payment method is added, transactions will become "instant". They do also accept any Mastercard and Visa credit or debit cards for the purchase of cryptocurrencies.Wisenex is headquartered in Tallinn, Estonia. Their terms are governed by the laws of Estonia, and any disputes will be settled by the courts of Estonia.Residents or citizens of jurisdictions that don't allow their services are prohibited from use of their website. These prohibited jurisdictions include United States, Canada, Indonesia, and Germany. Users are notified on the main screen, based on where they are located.Supported cryptocurrencies include: Bitcoin, Ethereum, USD Tether, Litecoin, and Bitcoin Cash. Supported Fiat currencies are USD and EUR.They do also accept any Mastercard and Visa credit or debit cards for the purchase of cryptocurrencies.
