At the time of this review 04/21/2022 the web domain is no longer accessible. They have no active social media accounts on any platform and there are no relative news articles online about this organization. The last active archive on the Wayback Machine is from 03/21/2022. The organization is presumed closed as of that date.Wynn-ex is a crypto exchange established in Estonia. Wynn-Ex claims to allow individuals or businesses around the world to buy and sell crypto currencies in the easiest and cheapest way.WYNN-EX is owned and operated by xrg3olb OÜ with Virtual Currency Service license number FVT000300 in Harju maakond, Tallinn, Mustamäe linnaosa, Akadeemia tee 33-319, 12618, Estonia.

Wyre Payments, Inc. (Wyre), founded in 2013 and headquartered in the United States, is a crypto powered payments company who leverages blockchain to facilitate cross-border payments. They have partnered with several cryptocurrency companies to provide users with a fiat gateway into and out of the crypto ecosystem. Affiliates of Wyre Payments Inc. include Wyre Payments Pty Ltd, Wyred OU, and Wyre Technology, Inc. Many DeFi projects and wallets have integrated with Wyre, including AirSwap, bZx, Dharma, Metamask, etc.Wyre allows cryptocurrency purchases and withdrawals to be made in-app, using the payment methods such as Apple Pay, Google Pay, and most major credit cards. The Wyre app is available on both Google Play and the Apple App Store.Their user agreement is governed by the laws of the State of Delaware. Any disputes will be settled in the exclusive jurisdiction of the state and federal courts located in Delaware.Some states in the United States are non-operational of ACH, wire transfers, or cards from their services. Other states are custodial wallet states. See link below for full lists:https://support.sendwyre.com/hc/en-us/articles/360055233754-Geographic-Restrictions-Restricted countries from their services include: Afghanistan, American Samoa, Angola, Anguilla, Barbados, Belarus, Bosnia & Herzegovina, Central African Republic, Congo (DRC), Cote d’Ivoire (Ivory Coast), Cuba, Ecuador, Eritrea, Ethiopia, Fiji, Guam, Guinea-Bissau, Guyana, Haiti, Iran, Iraq, Kosovo, Laos, Lebanon, Liberia, Libya, Macedonia, Myanmar, Nigeria, North-Korea, Palau, Panama, Papua NG, Russia, Samoa, Serbia, Seychelles, Somalia, Sudan, Syria, Trinidad and Tobago, Turkey, Turkmenistan, Ukraine, US Virgin Islands, Uzbekistan, Vanuatu, Venezuela, Yemen, and Zimbabwe.They have a social media presence on Twitter, Facebook, and LinkedIn.

Founded in 2014, Xapo Bank is a private banking service that offers an annual interest rate of 2% on USD holdings and 1% yield on Bitcoin holdings. Xapo Bank Limited is a company registered, domiciled, and incorporated in Gibraltar with company No. 111928. Xapo Bank Limited is regulated by the Gibraltar Financial Services Commission under the Financial Services Act 2019 as a ‘credit institution’ under Permission No. 23171. Xapo VASP Limited is a company registered and incorporated in Gibraltar with company No. 118088 and regulated by the Gibraltar Financial Services Commission under the Financial Services Act 2019 as a ‘DLT institution’ under Permission No. 26061. They are subpoenable in Gibraltar.Xapo has changed locations a few times, here are some location change articles: http://www.swissinfo.ch/eng/bitcoin-vault_xapo-shifting-services-from-hong-kong-to-switzerland/44695988https://bitcoinexchangeguide.com/xapo-crypto-custody-services-company-moves-major-operations-from-hong-kong-to-switzerlandhttps://www.coindesk.com/business/2020/06/12/xapo-suspends-credit-card-crypto-purchases-shifts-operations-to-gibraltarCurrently they have a social media presence on Twitter, Facebook, and LinkedIn.

Founded in 2014, xBTCe https://www.xbtce.com/ is a cryptocurrency exchange supporting Bitcoin, Ethereum, Litecoin Namecoin, and other, claiming to have 10K+ members. No Terms and Conditions appear on the website, no option for a new customer to sign-in, only login option for existing customers is available. Services are presumably provided by "Virtugate One Limited", a company located in Charlestown, Nevis, with this information appearing on the letterhead of the Privacy Policy and Risk Disclosure statement. US residents are not able to register with xBTCe. Saint Kitts & Nevis is not on the FATF List of Countries that have been identified as having strategic AML deficiencies  https://www.knowyourcountry.com/skitts1111.

At the time of this review, 08/10/2022, the homepage now shows a message stating they no longer accept new clients and that no new transactions will be approved. They have no presence on any social media platform and the only news articles pertaining to this organization are on Fintelegram, and are linked further below. Seeing as services started to dissipate in March of this year, and are now not allowing trades or new clients, they are presumed closed as of today, 08/10/2022.At the time of the review on (March 23, 2022) The Xchange Pro website offers some services, however, some of the links on the site are no longer available.XChangePro is a cryptocurrency exchange based in Estonia. Services have been provided by BlueData OÜ, which reportedly has been involved in supporting scams like Plutus, MDX500 or Blackstone500. More on this can be found here: https://fintelegram.com/plutus-racket-update-german-bafin-launched-investigationsBlueData OÜ used to have two licenses FVR000146 and FRK000122, however, both appear no longer valid as of Sept 2020, while it also appears the company has not submitted its annual reports since 2018. More on this can be found here: https://fintelegram.com/attention-estonian-scam-facilitator-xchangepro-is-no-longer-licensed

Founded in 2017, XCOEX is a cryptocurrency exchange which proclaims to serve customers in 40+ countries. The cryptocurrencies supported on this platform are Bitcoin, Ethereum, Litecoin, Ripple, and Bitcoin Cash. The fiat currencies allowed are EUR, USD, and payments via debit/credit cards. Services are provided by "XCOEX Limited OÜ," a private limited company registered in Estonia, registry code: 14562820. The restricted countries are: USA, Japan, Afghanistan, Bosnia and Herzegovina, Burundi, Iraq, Central African Republic, Congo, Guinea, Guinea-Bissau, Syria, Haiti, Lebanon, Libya, Mali, Iran, North Korea, British Columbia, Quebec, Myanmar, Nicaragua, Serbia, Somalia, South Sudan, Sudan,Tunisia, Yemen, and Zimbabwe.XCOEX is domiciled and subpoenable in Estonia.

XREX Inc was founded in 2018. XREX is headquartered in Taiwan having a registered business address atGrand Cayman, Cayman Islands. Governing law: Singapore.In Jan 2022, XREX acquired a Canadian FINTRAC license and is a member of the Travel Rule Information Sharing Alliance, a coalition of top crypto companies to combat money laundering and scams. XREX is in the process of applying to the Monetary Authority of Singapore for a Major Payment Institution license, and has completed the filing of its Compliance Statement on Anti-Money Laundering and Countering the Financing of Terrorism to Taiwan's Financial Supervisory Commission under company XREX Co. Ltd (Tax ID: 50897641).

XTB International Limited (XTB) is authorized and regulated by the International Financial Services Commission in Belize. XTB is registered in Belize under Registered Number 153,939 Company address: 35 Barrack Road, 3rd Floor, Belize City, Belize, C.A.They specialize in Forex, CFD, Indices, Commodities, Cryptocurrencies, Equity CFD, and ETFs.With more than 15 years experience, XTB is one of the largest stock exchange-listed FX & CFD brokers in the world. We have offices in over 13 countries including UK, Poland, Germany, France and Chile.

Young Platform Spa (youngplatform), headquartered in Italy, is a FinTech cryptocurrency exchange platform that offers multiple levels of trading and education.Young Platform provides an educational blog called the Young Platform Academy, where users can learn all about crypto and blockchain with explanations.For beginner traders, Young Platform provides an educational blog called the Young Platform Academy and an easy to use trading platform exchange.For experienced traders, they can use the Young Platform Pro where advanced trading tools are provided.For both experienced and beginner traders, users can use Young Platform Step where they can get rewards for participating in knowledge quizzes or be coached by experienced traders to read buy/sell signals.Young Platform is regulated by Italian law and applicable European legislation.They have a social media presence on Twitter, Facebook and Linkedin.

Zaif is a Japanese cryptocurrency exchange that offers multiple trading formats for its users. Cryptocurrencies supported on this platform are BTC, ETH, BCH, XEM, MONA, ZAIF and more.Services offered on here are bot trading, research, NFT marketplace and more.For CAICA Exchange Co., Ltd. Director of the Kinki Local Finance Bureau No. 00001 (Crypto Asset Exchange Business) Director of the Kinki Local Finance Bureau (Kinsho) No. 422 (Type 1 Financial Instruments Business) Member Associations: Japan Crypto Asset Trading AssociationThey have a social media presence on Twitter and Facebook.On September 2018, the exchange was hacked and the equivalent of $60 million in cryptocurrency was stolen. https://asia.nikkei.com/Spotlight/Cryptocurrencies/Japanese-cryptocurrency-exchange-Zaif-hacked-for-60m2The hack resulted in a suspension of withdrawals and deposits, and a bailout agreement with Fisco, a Japanese company that injected 5 billion yen in financial support to Tech Bureau. Following the hack, the Japanese regulator issued a series of warnings and orders to improve internal management and security processes. On February 12, 2020, Fisco integrated its own exchange that is Fisco Exchange and Zaif into one. Fisco changed corporation name from Fisco to Zaif Co.,Ltd and parent company which is Fisco Digital Asset Group was also changed to Zaif Holdings.

As of today's review (08/29/2022), the website does not allow VPN users for their site. To get in, VPN had to be temporarily disconnected. Once in, reviewer can turn VPN back on. Their terms & conditions and privacy page were mainly in French. There were no options to change it to english, so some information from that page might be inaccurate or missing due to language barrier.Zebitex is a cryptocurrency exchange platform that allows users to trade, buy, and sell cryptocurrency. Cryptocurrency offered on this platform include Bitcoin, Ethereum, Litecoin, Avalanche, USDT, and Monero.Services are provided via ‘DIGITAL EXCHANGE SAS’, and payment service operations are provided via ‘Olky Payment Service Provider SA’, a company registered with the RCS of Luxembourg (The Luxembourg Trade and Companies Register (Registre de commerce et des sociétés) under the number 793.115.320.00012). Olky Payment Service Provider SA has a second establishment in Grenoble, France under the number 793.115.320.00038, CIB 19733Zebitex started back in 2018 and is domiciled in France. They have a social media presence on Twitter, Facebook, and LinkedIn.Zebitex is founded by Christophe Villegas and Pierre-Guy Bareges, two widely-renowned figures on the French cryptocurrency stage. Zebitex is the third company in the portfolio of Villegas’ and Bareges’ Digital Service Group. The founders are also running the highly-successful and trusted ZeBitcoin exchange https://zebitcoin.com/en/ and DigyCode, the first prepaid service in France that allows for the exchange of euros against cryptocurrencies.On March 2021, ZEBITEX successfully registered with the French securities regulator, Autorite des Marches Financiers (AMF) as a digital asset service provider (PSAN) under registration number E2021-012. Their RCS Toulouse number is 882 241 571.

Zeply OU (Zeply), founded in 2019 and headquartered in Estonia, is a cryptocurrency exchange that allows users to buy, sell, and exchange Bitcoin for Euros and visa-versa. They accept deposits from Visa and Mastercard. Zeply also supports wire transfer withdrawals so users can receive funds directly to their bank accounts. They offer an app available to users on Google Play and the Apple App Store. Users are required to provide some KYC prior to registering for an account, including but not limited to; proof of address and proof of identification.Zeply currently restricts the residents of these countries, but not limited to: the United States, Australia, Curacao, Afghanistan, Mali, Viet Nam, British Virgin Islands, Japan, Russia, North and South Korea, Syria, Taiwan, Costa Rica, and many more. The full list can be viewed below:https://support.zeply.com/en/support/solutions/articles/44002148742-zeply-countries-which-are-unable-to-open-an-account-with-usZeply has a social media presence on Twitter, Facebook, and LinkedIn.

Zonda (previously Bitbay) is a regulated cryptocurrency exchange serving both business clients and individual clients. They allow the customers to buy and sell over 50 currencies and also allow users to exchange their crypto for fiat such as EUR, USD, GBP, and PLN. Zonda offers its users a mobile application that is available on GooglePlay and the Apple App Store. Zonda also offers an affiliate program where users can refer people to the Zonda Exchange and can earn up to 80% of the commissions Zonda makes from those referrals. Bitbay rebranded to Zonda Global on November 8, 2021 and they changed the name and design of their exchange.Services are provided by BB Trade Estonia OÜ. They are domiciled in Estonia with additional offices in India, Malta, and The United Kingdom. They are governed by the applicable laws of Estonia.They currently have a social media presence on Twitter, Instagram, Facebook, and LinkedIn.
